2814(mdo sde): mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis snang bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces
2815(mdo sde): bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de zhu bar sems pa legs so legs so// khyod ni skye bo la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /
2816(mdo sde): 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyis don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'ing da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/
2817(mdo sde): don gyis phyir zhugs pa yin no// 'jam dpal khyod gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshigs 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus skyes so// 'jam dpal de'i phyir legs
2818(mdo sde): par rab tu nyon la yid la zung dang bshad de/ bcom ldan 'das legaso zhes gsol te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan pa dang /
2819(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni rgyu med pa'i phyir mi gnas so// 'jam dpal thams cad ni 'dod chags dang
2820(mdo sde): zhe sdang dang / ti mug med pa'i phyir yongasu 'dzin pa med pa 'di/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir
2821(mdo sde): mi dmigs pa'i/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni mi 'khrugs pa'i phyir kun nas slong ba med pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'bral ba med pa'i phyir
2822(mdo sde): mi 'khrugs pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i phyir dbyer med pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid
2823(mdo sde): med pa'i phyir 'du shes med pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni med pa'i phyir mtshan nyid med pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/
2824(mdo sde): 'du byed mi dmigs pa'i phyir ya ma rla'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/ sems can mi dmigs pa'i phyir mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// 'jam
2825(mdo sde): dpal chos thams cad ni byed pa po mi dmigs phyir 'dus ma byas pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni mi dmigs pa'i phyir mthong ba po'o// 'jam dpal chos thams
2826(mdo sde): cad ni sems mi dmigs pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni tshad med pa'i mtha' yas pa'i mu'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni
2827(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sems can tshad med pa'i phyir tshad med pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad 'di lta ste/ gnyen po mi dmigs pa'i phyir sgrib pa med pa'o// 'jam dpal
2828(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/ mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir gnyen po med pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/ sna tshogs mi dmigs pa'i phyir mnyam pa'o// 'jam dpal
2829(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/ tha ma dang mchog dang mtshungs ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir sna tshogs med pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/ 'ong ba'i phyir mi 'pho ba'o// /
2830(mdo sde): 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/ 'byung ba med pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/ dus gsum mnyam pa'i phyir ltos pa med pa'o// 'jam
2831(mdo sde): dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/ 'ongs pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir dus gsum las 'das pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta
2832(mdo sde): ste/ dbye ba mi dmigs phyir rdo rje lta bu'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste rnam par 'jig pa med pa'i phyir g.yog med pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/
2833(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par mi rig pa'i phyir ma zhig pa'o// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste mi dmigs pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa yin te 'jam dpal
2834(mdo sde): ma chags pa'i tshig de dag ni mtshan ma med pa'i tshig go// ma spros tshag go rnyog pa med pa'i tshig go// ma nor ba'i tshig go// ma g.yos pa'i tshig go// mi 'bogs pa'i tshig go// bas kyi no
2835(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyis zil gyis mnon pa'o// nga rgyal can thams cad kyis zil ma non pa'o 'di ni mu stegs can dang phas kyi rgol ba rnams kyi ma yin no// dmigs par lta ba dang / gang zag
2836(mdo sde): du lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang mtshan mar lta ba la rnams kyis ma yin no// sems can 'du byed spyod pa thams cad kyis ma yin no// 'jam dpal de dag
2837(mdo sde): ni don las skyes pa'i tshig rnams yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ni der shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pa thob cing chos thams cad kyang rtogs par khong du chud pa
2838(mdo sde): yin no// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar gnas pa de ltar zhugs pa dag la ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams spobs pa nye bar sgrub po 'jam
2839(mdo sde): dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can rigs btsun pa ni wa dang rkang bzhi pa 'ongs pa thams cad mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur te/ than spu mi zing
2840(mdo sde): zhes byed pa tsam du yang mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa 'di lta bu dag la bslabs par gyur pa ni/ phas kyi rgol ba
2841(mdo sde): dang kun tu rgyu dmigs par lta ba can thams cad nas/ mngon par 'du byed pa can dag gi bar la/ 'jigs mi dang / skrag par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar seng ge'i
2842(mdo sde): sgra chen po sgrogs pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i phyir yon tan gyi bye brag de 'dra bar 'gyur na/ bla na med pa yang
2843(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa rnams lta ci smos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/
2844(mdo sde): ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces gsungs so// chos thams cad mi gnas te/ rang bzhin gyi na dben pa'i phyir/ de dag gis ni gnas med de phyir gnas pa med ces bya/
2845(mdo sde): chos rnam rang bzhin 'ong gsal bas/ de dag dngos po yod ma yin gang na dngos po med 'gyur ba de ni chos kyi rnam dag yin dngos po yod pa ma yin pas de na chags pa med pa
2846(mdo sde): yin gang na chags pa med gyur pa/ de yi phyir ni gsungs shes bya chos thams cad de 'dra ste/ de na tshig na yod ma yin/ chos rnams mang po'i brgya mtsho ni de ni gzungs shes
2847(mdo sde): gsungs pa yin gang na dngos po med gyur pa de na de yang ni rtos te/ gang na bdag du mi rtogs pa gzungs nyid yin par shes par gyis/ chos kun nye bar zhi ba ste/ rang
2848(mdo sde): bzhin gyi ni mtshan nyid med gang zhig ye shes der 'jug pa der gzungs sangs ni myur du 'thob chos rnams thams cad g.yo ba med/ de ni 'jig rten gyi med pa ste/
2849(mdo sde): gang na 'jig rten yod min pa de ni gzungs shes bya ba ya ni/ chos kun grub med pa med ste/ gang dngos po med pa dang gang na ci yang grub med pa de ni gzungs shes bya ba
2850(mdo sde): yin/ chos rnams thams cad bzung ba med de la thog ma yod ma yin/ gang la thog med gyur pa/ de phyir gzungasu shes par gyis/ chos rnams thams cad ma skyes te/
2851(mdo sde): rtog pa las ni kun tu byung / gang na rtog pa med gyur pa de phyir gzungasu shes rab kyis chos rnams thams cad med par gnas/ ma rtog pas ni bstan pa ste/ 'di la bstan pa cung
2852(mdo sde): // zad med// des na bstan ces bya ba yin// chos rnams thams cad ma 'dres te// 'di la ngo bo nyid kyang med// gang na chos su dmigs med pa// de ni de na tha dad med/
2853(mdo sde): chos rnams thams cad ma chags te// de ni na mkha' tshungs shing 'dra// chos kyi rang bzhin de yin te// gzungs shes bya bar 'di yin no// chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid gcig 'di na gcig
2854(mdo sde): kyang med pa ste/ 'di na rang bzhin tha dad med pas de dag mtshan nyid gcig/ chos cad mtshan nyid med// de na dngos po med pa ste// gang na dngos po med gyur pa// de phyir gzungs shes bya ba
2855(mdo sde): yin// chos rnams thams cad dben pas na// de na ngo bo nyid med de// gang na dngos po mi dmigs pa// de ni gzungasu shes par gyis// chos rnams thams cad mi gnas te// ldang bar byed pa
2856(mdo sde): 'ang med pa yin/ gang na ldang ba med gyur pa// de ni mya ngan 'das shes bya// chos kun mngon par 'dus ma byas// sems can dag kyang de na med// sems can rang bzhin gang yin pa// de ni gzungs
2857(mdo sde): shes bya ba yin// chos rnams thams cad ma byas te// byed pa po yang de na med gang dag las kyi bya ba med// de ni gzungs shes bya ba yin// mig ni yod pa ma yin pas// chos rnams thams
2858(mdo sde): ca mthong ba med// gang na mig ni mi dmigs pa de ni med ces bya ba yin// sems ni yin pa ma yin pas// chos rnam blar shes dang bral// sems dang shes pa med pas na// rnam par shes pa med pa/
2859(mdo sde): yin// gang na shes dang de bzhin du// mi shes pa yang med pa dang // gang na sems ni yod ma yin// de tsam gyis ni ye shes so// ji tsam du ni rnam rtog pa// ye shes dang ni mi 'gyur// rtog pa sgrub
2860(mdo sde): pa med gyur na// de la ye shes kyang bya// chos rnams thams cad dngos po med// ming tsam du yang bshad pa ste// ye shes dang ni mi shes pa// de yang de bzhin shes par gyis// chos
2861(mdo sde): rnams thams cad med pa ste// 'di na ci yang yod ma yin// gang na chos rnams yod min pa// de ni chos kyi mchog yin no// chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis/ tshad med par ni
2862(mdo sde): bstan ste// sems can rang bzhin gang yin pa// de ni gzungs shes bya ba yin// chos rnams thams cad g.yog yin te// de la snying po yod ma yin pa pa// gang na snying po yod min pa/
2863(mdo sde): de ni gzungs kyi mtshan nyid yin// chos rnams thams cad gnyen po med// de ltar mtshan nyid gcig pa ste// mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams kyi// gnyen po yod pa ma yin no// chos
2864(mdo sde): kun bye brag med pa ste// dam pa dang ni thams cad med// 'di la 'dra ba gang med// de yid phyir ni gzungs shes bya// mtshungs shes mnyam par zhugs pas na// chos kun la ni sna tshogs
2865(mdo sde): med// gang na sna tshogs yod min pa// de ni gsungs shes bya ba yin// chos rnams thams cad med pas na// 'dir ni 'ong ba yod ma yin// 'dir ni gzhar yang 'pho ba med//
2866(mdo sde): de ni chos kyi chos nyid yin// chos rnams thams cad ma 'ongs pas// 'dir ni 'du bar 'gyur ba med// gang na 'du ba yod min pa// de ni gzungs shes bya ba yin// chos kun bsam
2867(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab ste// de na yod dang med pa med// de ni 'dzin pa yod ma yin// de na gzungs kyi mtshan nyid do// rang bzhin gyis ni bdag med pas// chos rnams thams cad ltos pa med//
2868(mdo sde): gang yang bdag ni med bshad pa// de phyir dngos med shes rab kyis// khams gsum las ni 'das gyur// par gzungs la rab tu shes rab gyis// chos rnams/
2869(mdo sde): thob pa med pas na// de ni gzungs shes brjod pa yin// chos rnams thams cad rdo rje bzhin// de dag la ni tha dad med// de ltar dngos po stong pa ste// de yi phyir ni dngos po med/
2870(mdo sde): chos kun g.yo ba med pa ste// de dag gi ni bshig pa med// de dag la ni skye ba med// de yi phyir ni bshig pa med// chos rnams thams cad 'jig med na// yang dag rjes mthong ba ste/
2871(mdo sde): gang dag gi ni byang chub mchog/ de ni cung zad rtogs pa med// phra rab chos kyang mi dmigs pas// sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub bshad// chos rnams thams cad gzung du med// de ni
2872(mdo sde): byang chub mtshan nyid do// gzungs nyid rang bzhin med pa'i phyir// gzungs la gzugs ni blar bshad// gzhan du gzugs ni ma gtogs par// gzugs su dmigs par mi 'gyuraro// /
2873(mdo sde): gzugs la ngo bo nyid med kyang // ngo bo nyid ces bya ba yin// de bzhin ngo bo nyid shes na// gzungs ni nye bar 'byung ba yin// gzugs 'di bri bar bya ba// ming tsam la yang gnas
2874(mdo sde): ba ste// gzungs shes nges par brjod pa yin// chos de yod pa ma yin no// mig la gzugasu shes par bgyis// de ni 'khor los bstan pa ste// chos rnams kyi ni ma chags pa//
2875(mdo sde): de la gzungs shes bshad pa yin// de bzhin du sbyar te// yid ni gzugasu shes par gyis// de ni 'khor lo'i bstan pa ste// chos rnams kyis ni ma chags pa// gzungs zhes ni
2876(mdo sde): bshad pa yin// 'dir ni bshad pa mkha' yas pa// chos rnams de ltar shes gyur na// ji tsam chung zad dmigs med pa// thams cad ni gzungs shes bshad dmigs mi mthong bar mi gnas
2877(mdo sde): par ni 'chad byed de/ chos rnams thams cad dngos po med// mtshan ma med cing mtshan nyid med// gzungs 'dod gang zhig 'gro byed pa// chos rnams de ltar shes gyur cing // chags med
2878(mdo sde): par rab 'chad na// gzungs ni gzhag par gyur pa yin// 'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'ongs pa'i dus na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rigs
2879(mdo sde): ba dang / zhabasu ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos tra la la'i
2880(mdo sde): sgron ma zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur to// de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni rdul dang bral ba zhes bya bar gyur te/ mnyam pa ma nyams dga' ba mdzes pa lta na sdug pa dag pa 'byor pa rgyas pa/
2881(mdo sde): mi dang skye bo mang pos gangadra bar gyur to// 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams de'i bai dUr+ya las grub cing / gser skud mig mangs ril su bris te/ thams cad ni 'ang / rin po che'i shing ljon
2882(mdo sde): pa me tog dang / 'bras bur ldan par gyur to// sa chen po yang ka tsa li na de ka ltar reg na bde bar gyur to// 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na dud 'gro dang yi dgas dang lha ma yin
2883(mdo sde): thams cad med par gyur to// 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can gang dag skyes pa dag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang
2884(mdo sde): shin du yong su dag par gyur to// rnam pa phun sum tshogs shing thams cad yong su rdzog so// grong khyer de ni 'byung ba med ces bya bar gyur to 'jam dpal de'i/
2885(mdo sde): tshe ni mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo 'bum tshang bar gyur te/ ma tshang bar 'gyur yang 'chi ba'i dus byed pa med do// 'jam dpal grong khyer 'byung ba med ces bya ba der/ rgyal po rnam par
2886(mdo sde): rgyal zhabs bya ba zhig byung ste/ 'jam dpal rgyal po ba zhes bya ba de la/ bu stong yod par gyur to// yang 'jam dpal rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i bu stong dang lhan cig tu/
2887(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos ta la la'i sgron ma/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la na bza dang bshos dang / mal bstan dang / na ba'i gsol sman dang / yo byad rnams kyi
2888(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byas par gyur to// bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis kyang bkur sti byas par gyur bla mar byas par gyur sti stang byas par gyur/ rim gror byas par gyur/ mchod pa byas par
2889(mdo sde): gyur to// 'jam dpal de nas rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba bu stong dang lhan cig du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos tal la'i sgron ma chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kun tu
2890(mdo sde): zhus par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad par gyur te// thos ma thag tu rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba de/
2891(mdo sde): snying dang ldan cig du mas shes par gyur to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas skabs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa thob par gyur to/ 'jam dpal de skabs dang skar na/ de bzhin gnanas
2892(mdo sde): pa 'das kyang rung ste rigs bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la skabs pa rgyun mi 'chad ping spobs pa thogs med pa 'di 'dod pa des/ zab pa chags pa med pa 'di 'dra ba'i gnas
2893(mdo sde): kyi chos la brtson par bya// chos kyi tshig zab mo 'di lta bu gzung bar bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// kha ton du bya'o// chos zab mo'i rnam grangs 'di lta bu kun chub par byas
2894(mdo sde): nas/ gzhan la yang bstadan bya'o// chos thams cad la ser sna med par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das
2895(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to// ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sems can rnams kyi don la kyi slad du ci gnas kyang ma 'ong ba'i dus phyi mo'i tshe la/ chos kyi rnams grangs 'di slar yang
2896(mdo sde): spyod pa'i 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyi brlab du gsol de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas chos
2897(mdo sde): kye rnam grangs 'di byin gyis bslab so// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyi brlabs pa dang /
2898(mdo sde): chos la bzod pas 'dul ba dag bzad pa thob par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / 'jam dpal
2899(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' tha gres brtan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
2900(mdo sde): dpa' chen po gzhan dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten
2901(mdo sde): yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par sdod do// 'phags pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge
2902(mdo sde): 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya ta thA ga ta ma hA ka ru na nair de sha na ma ma hA ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de
2903(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa snying rje chen po bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dis
2904(mdo sde): skad bdag gi thos pa dus gcig na/ rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ril sngon rgyal ba bzhugs bzhugs pa/ mchod rten chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i sa'i snying
2905(mdo sde): go byang chub sems dpa' mngon par bstod pa chos kyi gdan lha dang / klung dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin gyis phyag byas pa'i sa phyogs/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yang
2906(mdo sde): dag par skul ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba/ chos kyi sgo mngon par brjod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba yon tan tshad med pa las yang dag par byang ba/ de bzhin gshegs
2907(mdo sde): pa'i spyod yul na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin tu bskor/ slob ma'i tshigs shin tu dul ba ni mtha'
2908(mdo sde): yas/ chos thams cad la mnga' dbang ni bsres// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yang dag pa'i cho ga ni mkhyen/ dbang po dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsnyes/ sems can thams cad
2909(mdo sde): kyi bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba/ kur tu 'joms pa ni mkhas/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyi grub pa ni rgyan ma bcad cing / dge slong stong phrag drag bcu'i dge slong dge 'dun chen po
2910(mdo sde): dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang shes pa/ glang po chen po bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa khur bor ba/ rang gi dor rjesu thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongasu zung ba/
2911(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams spor ba thams cad kun tu bcom pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/
2912(mdo sde): chos zab mo la gnas par mkhas pa/ chos kyi dmigs pa med pa las nges par byung ba/ spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa/ spyi ba'i gnas chen po gyur pa de bzhin gshegs
2913(mdo sde): pa'i bka' lang shin tu zhugs pa sha sta gon/ byang chub sems dpa' dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang / yang thabs cig ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ thams cad mkhyen
2914(mdo sde): ga chags pa med pa'i spyod yul gyis nges par byung ba/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i chos kyi sprin las lhas mthong dang / rig pa dang / mos pas glob byung zhing bdud rtsi'i chu'i
2915(mdo sde): char 'bebs pas/ 'tho' thams cad ches par bying ba/ sems can thams cad la sems dang / ma'am brjes su chags pa dang / khong kho ba dang bral ba dang / byang chub kyi
2916(mdo sde): phyogs kyi chos sna tshogs kyi lo tog yang dag par 'phel bar byed pa/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bas lhag pa ye shes kyi 'od zer rab tu gtong bas/
2917(mdo sde): ti mug kyi mun pa sel ba'i lam gyi snang ba thob pa kun tu ston pa dang / sems can gyi pad ma kha' byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sred pa'i chu skems
2918(mdo sde): ba dang / zhes pa'i las kyi mtha' la rab tu 'jug pa la mngon par shes pa chen po dang / zhi gnas kyis rgyu ba zla ba lta bur 'gro ba thams cad sems mnyam pas mngon par zhi bar
2919(mdo sde): bya ba'i bsam pa tshim par bya ba'i thabs la mkhas pas 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba kun tu ston pa ri rab lta bu'i lhag pa'i bsam pas/ tshangs pa'i gnas rin po che shin
2920(mdo sde): tu brtan te/ ngos bzhi nas yul gyi rlung thams cad kyis mi sgul cing / 'jig rten gyis chos las mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun snyan pa snang
2921(mdo sde): bar gyur pa/ rgya mtsho chen po ltar gzungs dang dran pa'i snod rgya chen po chos kyi chus yongasu gang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ri no ches 'gro thams cad nye bar 'tshe
2922(mdo sde): ga ri dgas kyi rgyal po ltar bden pa'i rkang pa dang / byams pa rab tu 'phel ba'i 'jug pa dang / zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gyi mig dang ldan zhing / chos zab mo la skrag
2923(mdo sde): ba med pas/ pha rol rgol ba thams cad 'jom pa bskal pa brgya stong phrag dpag tu med cing ma/ mtha' yas thug pa med par byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa rgyun ma
2924(mdo sde): bcad pas/ yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa sha stag dang thabs gcig pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas snang zhing sgrib med par lta ba
2925(mdo sde): zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhing thams cad kyi brgyan bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
2926(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung ba'i spyod pa'i blo gros shes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod lam thams cad kyi 'dul ba mi 'khrugs pa
2927(mdo sde): kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba dang // / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pa mtha' yas pa'i rtog gi rgyal mtshan rnam par 'phrul pa'i
2928(mdo sde): dbyangs shes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gser bzang po rnam par bas gsags pa'i 'od kyi gzi brjid kyi 'od zer ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems
2929(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis rnam par gdon mi za ba'i tshig la spobs pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dang / ye shes
2930(mdo sde): kyi tshogs dpag tu med pas brtan pas bsags pa zhes bya ba dang / de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang thabs gcig
2931(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu ston to// de nas bcom
2932(mdo sde): ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lo bcu drug bzhes te/ tshangs par spyod pa rgyas par gyur par mkhyen byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa chen po/
2933(mdo sde): de yang gzigs shing mkhyen te/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin par mkhyen nas/ 'di snyam du gang gi phyir ngas byang chub
2934(mdo sde): sems dpa'i rgya cher rje su yongasu bzung ba dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la gzung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs
2935(mdo sde): pa'i par 'phrul pa chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba'i sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam
2936(mdo sde): grangs yang dag par bya'o snyam du dgongaso// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du yang dag par ston
2937(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhub so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba
2938(mdo sde): de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag du de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag par snang la 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi bar du 'khor gyi khyams sangs rgyas kyi gnas/ de bzhin
2939(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas mngon par grub pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongasu spyong pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byed pa/ sems can tshad med pa'i bsam
2940(mdo sde): batshim par byed pa/ lha'i gzhal med khang thams cad zil gyis gnon pa phyogs bcu byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par skul pa'i bzhi byed r+ya dkar po'i dbyibs dang / 'dzam bu gling gi
2941(mdo sde): gser gyi khang pa dag dang / dpal gyi snying po rtab pas dag dang / rin po che'i a spu gar ba'i sgo gang dag dang / nor bu rin po che rdo'i snying kha khyer dag dang / rin po che dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi stegs
2942(mdo sde): bu dag dang / rin po che kun nas 'od kyi khang pa rtsegs pa dag dang / rin po che thams cad kyi gdab dang / mu tig gi do shal rab tu byas nges pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
2943(mdo sde): bsgreng ba dang / lha'i ngar gyi lda ldi mngon par spangs pas sngags pa bstan pa dpag tu med cing / thub pa med pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam zhig byung ste dkyil
2944(mdo sde): 'khor gyi khyams de yang tsan dan sbrul gyi snying bskas pa/ tsan dan dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i dra ba yid du 'ong pa dang / ldan pa/ dra'i mchog a ku ru dam pa'i snying po'i gdugs pa/ kri'i mu
2945(mdo sde): tig dang / rin po che'i me tog gyis rnam par sbas pa me tog sil ma bkam pa rin po che'i shing dang / rin po che bye ma kas mdzes par byas pa ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams
2946(mdo sde): cad na rgyan 'dzes pa bgrod pa ji snyed pa de thams cad 'khor gyi khyams de nyid na kun du snang ngo // der gang na seng ge'i khri bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dpag ta med pa// grangs med
2947(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs pa blta na sdug pa mthong / rab tu bzang ba/ yangs pa rgya che ba yid du 'ong ba yid dga' bar byed pa dag byung bar gyur to// gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir them
2948(mdo sde): kas kha khyer mi bdun gyi 'phang tsam gyis bskor ba/ rgyar dpag tshad tshad kyis yongasu bzung ba rin po che'i in 'dra ni la dang / ma hA ni las snying por gyur pa/ brgya byin
2949(mdo sde): thogs pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i gdugs can tshangs pa'i ne tso mchi dang / rin po che ser pos sbas pa/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba/ kun tu bskyod pas sgra byung ba/ sa'i steng nas/
2950(mdo sde): 'khor gyi khyams la thug gyi bar du gyen du mngon par 'phags pa dang / ba ma g.yo ba bzhi stong byung bar gyur to// gleng bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong
2951(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi thams cad du yang de lta bu'i them skas chen po dag byung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing mkhyen pa
2952(mdo sde): bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen 'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug du g.yos te/
2953(mdo sde): snang ba chen po yang byung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang thabs gcig nyan thos kyis tshogs kyis mdun du bdar te/ lha dang klus mngon par bstod cing me tog
2954(mdo sde): gi char chen po ni 'bebs bza'i char chen pos ni mngon par 'gegs/ phye ma dang / spos dang / byug pa'i char chen po ni 'thor/ sil snyan dang sgra dbyangs chen po can rab tu skyogs 'jigs 'jig rten
2955(mdo sde): gyi khams dpag tu med pa ni rab tu g.yo bar mdzad 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa ni snang bar mdzad cing / sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / sangs
2956(mdo sde): rgyas chos 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog du gyur chen po sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi byin chen po dang /
2957(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos bya rgod kyi phung po ri las mi snang gyur te lha dang / klu dang / gnod byin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang /
2958(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po bye ba khrag du zham ring du 'brang zhing nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi them sbas kyis dbus nas 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa ga la ba der gsheg so// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi la
2959(mdo sde): sogs pa rgya chen po bzhi ci'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them sgras su zhugs par rigs nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i me tog gi sprin char rab tu
2960(mdo sde): phab te/ thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ nyi zla med dang / nor bu'i 'od dang / lha yul pa'i lha 'di shin du dri med pa thub pas 'od kyis thams cad zil
2961(mdo sde): gyis mnan nas ngan song gsum po dag kyang zhi bar mdzad/ ri bo ra ri ba dang / ni khor yug rtse mo bsnyil te zhing rnams gsal bar gyur pas na/ dga' zhing yid rnams mgu nas don rnams
2962(mdo sde): thams cad grub pa'i rgyal ba la ni skyabasu mchi de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das
2963(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring du 'brang ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa gsum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnaMs kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par rig nas
2964(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir spos kyi sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ rdzu
2965(mdo sde): 'phrul dam pa brnyes shing rab tu mtshungs pa med pa rnam par 'phrul pa shin du ston/ rgyal ba nyi ma ji bzhin 'phags te zhing rnams bye ba rgya dag tu yang gda'/ rgyal bas
2966(mdo sde): rang gis yon tan kun gyi zhing rnams thams cad brgyan te shin du mdzes pa gang zhig shin du mnyam med mtshungs pa med cing rdzu 'phrul dbang du gyur la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas
2967(mdo sde): sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du 'brang ngo // de nas lha'i rgyal
2968(mdo sde): po rab mtshe ma la sogs pa mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyi/ bcom ldan 'das them skra su zhugs par rigs nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i na bza' sprin gyi
2969(mdo sde): char rab tu phab ste thal mo sbar nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ bder gshegs khyod kyi mkhyen pa mtha' yas yangs pas sems can bsam pa
2970(mdo sde): mkhyen/ mkha' 'dra'i lam gyi dus gsum dag la chags med thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sems kyi 'jug pa gcig gis 'gro ba'i sems kyi skrod pa thams cad mkhyen
2971(mdo sde): des na srid pa gsum po dag lus can rnams kyis mchod par 'os/ de nas mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'diso mngon par bstod nas/
2972(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du 'brang bar gyur to// de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skra su zhugs
2973(mdo sde): pa rig nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las phyir lha'i rin po che'i sprin gyi char rab tu phab te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces mngon par bstod pa/
2974(mdo sde): gang gi skud du sgra dang / yig ma mchis gang du'ang rgyu ba ma mchis pas khyod kyi chos rnams g.yo ba ma mchis dbang byur sbyar ma mig rgyu 'drar mkhyen nas/ bcom ldan 'das
2975(mdo sde): kyi thugs rjes sems can rnams la ched du chos mchog gsung pa na chos kyi dngos po'i rang bzhin mkhas pa bdag men gsung ba'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas dga' ldan
2976(mdo sde): gyi lha rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zham ring du 'brang ngo // de nas bci sa lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul
2977(mdo sde): la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them ska su zhugs par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i rgyan gyi sprin gyi char rab tu phab
2978(mdo sde): ste thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod pa/ chos kyi zong gis rang gi stobs bcu 'kha' 'dra 'od zer ldan pa dang / thugs rjes
2979(mdo sde): bstis nas byams pa'i dgongs pas sems can rnams la gzugs ston pa gru tshul chos la gnyi su med par zhugs kyang rgyal ba mtshungs par mkhyen chos kyi khyad par sems
2980(mdo sde): lhag don kun grub pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa 'dir mngon par
2981(mdo sde): bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du 'brang bar gyur to// de nas lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la smos pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them
2982(mdo sde): skra su zhugs pa dang / 'khor gyi khyam su mngon par phyogs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal gyi char
2983(mdo sde): rab tu phab ste thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// tshul khrims dri ma mi mnga' rnam dag rnam par nges pa'i
2984(mdo sde): 'dzin mchog mi g.yo bo/ mnyam med blo ldan rgya mtsho bar gnas shing srid las rna grol dbang sgyur zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo// rims kyi byams dang ldan pa'i thugs rje
2985(mdo sde): yis ni bden pa'i las kyi rnam la rab tu gnas mdzad pa rnam thar gsum gyi lam gyi khyim na gnas pa'i bder gshegs seng ge khyod la bdag cag phyag 'tshal/
2986(mdo sde): snying rje'i chu bo ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam phel ba/ zhi gnas mdab ma rnam par grol ba'i me tog rgyas slob ma'i tshogs kyi bung bas nges par bsnyen gyur pa bder gshegs pad+ma
2987(mdo sde): la ni spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo// mnga' bdag g.yo ba ma mchis tshul khrims sar gnas pa/ brtson 'grus mtshungs pa ma mchis stobs kyis yang dag 'phags yul
2988(mdo sde): gyi rlung rnams langs pa chen pos ma g.yos pa/ sangs rgyas ri bo dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshalo// mnga' bdag thugs rjes dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa blo gter blo mchog gi
2989(mdo sde): ni rab tu 'jom mdzad pa/ sems can rgya dag gis ni mang po mchod gyur pa bder gshegs zla ba khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal lo// mkha' ltar zhi ba'i rnam par thar pa'i lam
2990(mdo sde): gshegs pa shes rab tu 'od kyi phyogs bcu dag ni rgyas 'gengs shing skye bo mang po mtshungs med pad+ma kha 'byed pa sangs rgyas nyi ma dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mnga' ba dag phyogs
2991(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gsum po dag na yang 'dren pa khyod dang / mnyam par dmigs par ma gyur te khyod ni yon tan kun gyi yang dag grub pa lags/ bdag cag khyod la bstod pas
2992(mdo sde): ngom par 'gyur ma lags lha dbang klu dang lha ma yin gyis phyag bgyis pa lha mchog brgya dag gis kyang yang dag mngon bstod pa/ bsngags pa brgya phrag mang pos yang dag mngon bstod pa/
2993(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa stod 'os khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas/
2994(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das zham ring du 'brang ngo de nas bcom ldan 'das de ltar sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa tshad med pa lha brgya phrag stong gis mngon par bstod nas/ 'khor gyi khyams
2995(mdo sde): rin po che bkod par gshegs ste/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma mjed 'dir them smras nas 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par gshegs
2996(mdo sde): par shes pa de bzhin du stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang gshegs par shes so//
2997(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams stong gsum gyis yongs su bzung ba rin po che bkod par gdan seng ge'i khri ji ltar bshams pa la bzhugs so byang chub sems dpa' dang /
2998(mdo sde): nyan thos chen po dag kyang stan ji rigs pa la 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin rnam par thar pa'i sgrib pa med pa la sangs rgyas rnam par rol
2999(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhug so// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa la sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu
3000(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku'i sku'i khung bu re re nas kyang gang 'od zer gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed byung ste/ byung nas kyang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byaso//
3001(mdo sde): de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs rnams dang / 'og dang / steng dang phyogs mtshams rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas so 'jig rten gyi khams nyam
3002(mdo sde): rnams snang bar byas ma thag tu de nas sems can thams cad kyi sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyun bcad do// byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang / gshin rje'i
3003(mdo sde): 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba yang rgyun bcad do// sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la 'dod chags kyi gnod par ma gyur cig/ zhe sdang gi ma
3004(mdo sde): yin gti mug gis ma yin te/ nyon mongs pa gzhan gyis kyang gnod par ma gyur to// de'i sems can thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / pha ma bu'i 'du shes su gyur to//
3005(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par skul ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od de las tshig su bcad pa 'di dag 'byung ngo gang gis brtson 'grus stobs ni
3006(mdo sde): mtha' yas yangs pa brtan pa brtsams gyur te gang gis brtson 'grus chen po stobs kyis bskal pa dag las phyir phyogs spangs gang gis yon tan dag ni phyogs bcu rnams na
3007(mdo sde): mthu ldan rab brjod pa/ shAkya thub pa'i 'od yangs 'gro ba thams cad snang bar byed pa mdzes gang chos rgya chen bla na med mnyam la de de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ mkhas pa zla
3008(mdo sde): gros brtan pa dag ni bskal pa grangs med rtag tu nyan blo rgyas gang zhig rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa tshim skyed pa thub pa des ni gang phyir sems can bde bar bzhed
3009(mdo sde): pas 'od 'di phyung mngal bdag gang zhig brtson 'grus kyis ni bdud stobs mu stegs tshogs bcas pham mdzad pa pad+ma byung ba bzhin du 'phags shing phyogs bcu dag tu ji bzhin
3010(mdo sde): mdzes/ gang zhig nyi ma bzhin sku'i 'od kyi 'gro ba ma lus snang mdzad pa de'i chos kyi 'khor lo bzhag pa don chen gsan du rgyal ba gsheg su gsol rab tu bskor bar ma gyur mtshungs
3011(mdo sde): ba med cing rgyal ba kun gyis bkor sgyur ba 'khor lo dam pa stobs bcu sems can thugs rtse phyir ni de ring skor bar mdzad pa srog chags rnams kyi bstan par rnyed dka' legs pa rgya
3012(mdo sde): chen de ring byung bar 'gyur gang dag dang ba dang ba che yang don du gnyer ba dag de ring ltos de nas 'od dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad tshig su bcad pa
3013(mdo sde): 'di dag gis go bar byas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par bskul 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu bar g.yo byas sems can thams cad bde bar byas nyon mongs
3014(mdo sde): pa'i khams thams cad rnam par sbyangs mun pa mun nag thams cad bsal bdud kyi khyams thams cad mog mog por byas nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dag dang /
3015(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du slar 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dri med rnam dag rin chen
3016(mdo sde): 'od byang chub yan lag dang ldan pa'i chos rgyun mi 'chad pa'i 'od zer bkod pa'i rgyal po'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha' yas pa'i rin po che
3017(mdo sde): bsod nams bkod pas rgya che ba dang / ldan pa na byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems
3018(mdo sde): dpa' gang gi'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongasu bskor cing / mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyis zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la
3019(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyir te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
3020(mdo sde): bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan stong phrag bcur bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i nor bu be du ya'i dra ba'i char rab tu phab te/ bcom ldan
3021(mdo sde): 'das la tshigasu bcad pa 'di gnyis mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan rab tu mtshungs med yon tan pha rol phyin/ khyod kyi yon tan bsngags 'phreng phyogs bcu kun na
3022(mdo sde): brjod/ khyod kyis yon tan tshogs mchis zhing gang yon tan gter der ni chos don gnyer ba bdag cag rab tu mchi/ chos dbyings mnyam nyid rnam rtog ma mchis ji bzhin du/
3023(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dri med 'od kyi mnyam nyid mkhyen kyang / shin du bslabs pa'i sgyu ma mkhan lhar chos kyi rgyal/ sems can rnams lar dgrol slad tha dad bstan par mdzad
3024(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ shar phyogs logs su gnas te/
3025(mdo sde): rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rin can spobs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
3026(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' rin ce na srig shing zhes bya ba des bskul ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis
3027(mdo sde): yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar lhan cig du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas snang bar gyur nas skad cig yun tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir byin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po
3028(mdo sde): che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan stong phrag bcur bskor ba byas nas bcom
3029(mdo sde): ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing gser gyi dra bas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshig su bcad pa 'di gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// bcom
3030(mdo sde): ldan thugs rje'i sprin gyis 'jig rten rgyas bkang nas 'og gi glog phyung steng pa bdag med sgra bsgrags te/ yan lag brgyad pa'i lam gyis chu yis zhi mdzad cing / dkar po'i stobs dbang
3031(mdo sde): nags tshal gel ba 'phel bar mdzad bder gshegs shes rab 'od kyi gti mug mun gsal nas ring nas srid mtshor gnyid log sems sad mdzadade / lam yang bstan cing sred
3032(mdo sde): pa dag kyang skams par mdzad/ thar pa'i grong gnas rnams kyi mig kyang rnam par sbyong / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i stod pa tshad med pa/ de dag
3033(mdo sde): gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ lho phyogs logasu gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi bstan dag la 'khod do// de nas nub phyogs na
3034(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sgra bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i 'od de'i bskul
3035(mdo sde): ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang
3036(mdo sde): cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams me mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
3037(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan stong phrag bcur bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing nor bu mu tig gi do shal gyi dra bas/ bcom
3038(mdo sde): ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshogs su bcad pa 'di gnyis kyi bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// khyod kyi sku'i 'phrin las na mkha' 'dra zhing / smon lam dge bas dag
3039(mdo sde): pa bye ba phrag mang ldan/ dri med rnam par dag cing zag pa med pa des/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsam gyi mi khyab pas la khyod kyi tshig ni rgyun chags gsal zhing mtshungs pa
3040(mdo sde): ste/ 'gro ba bsam dag bsam pa mnyam nyid yongasu tshim bgyid sems kyi rgyu dang rnam rtog gang yang mi mnga' yang / sems can bsam pa rnams la rgyal dag bgyi ba 'byung / de nas
3041(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ nub phyogs log su gnas te rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi
3042(mdo sde): stobs kyi sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas byang phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rin cen spobs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po
3043(mdo sde): che thams cad kyi spras pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' bro mchog rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i 'od nges bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongasu
3044(mdo sde): bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cag thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/
3045(mdo sde): 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan stong phrag bcur
3046(mdo sde): bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing nor bu'i do shal dang rin po che'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshig su bcad pa 'di gnyis
3047(mdo sde): kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod de/ 'dzam bu'i chu gser bco ma lta bur ser ba'i sku kun nas spyan mnga' phyogs bcu dag tu rnam par mdzes mtshungs med sku la sems
3048(mdo sde): can gang dag nges rtog pa/ de dag skyon med pa de bzhir dga' ba thob par 'gyur gang gi ri rab brtsegs pa lta bu'i khrun tsam du/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa tshungs med rgyal ba bltas kyang ni/
3049(mdo sde): de yis rdzu 'phrul gyis stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi rnam par sbal pas rgyal ba'i spyi gtsug mthong mi nus/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i stong
3050(mdo sde): pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ byang phyogs logs su gnas te rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi bstan dag la 'khod do//
3051(mdo sde): de nas shar dang / lho'i mtshams phyogs ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad bcom pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa na byang chub sems dpa'
3052(mdo sde): kun nas snang ba zhes bya ba 'od nges bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig du sangs rgyas kyi zhing
3053(mdo sde): de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
3054(mdo sde): sngar 'dug nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan stong phrag bcur bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod
3055(mdo sde): pa'i las byed cing rin po che'i dra bas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bka' ste/ tshig su bcad pa 'di gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// spu'i
3056(mdo sde): sa mtha' dpung ma mchis pa'i zhing 'dzin kyang / sems can rnams la mi gnod zhing la gnod pas/ mig med rnams kyis rgyal ba'i spyod yul 'tshal bar bka' sangs
3057(mdo sde): rgyas sras ni rgyal ba'i byin gyis yang dag 'tshal/ zhing gcig phyogs la zhing mang rab 'jam ston mdzad de/ kun du bstan kyang rnam par 'phel dang 'grib ma mchis/
3058(mdo sde): bsam pa chen po dag ldan ci 'drar gyur de la/ dpal med rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pas de ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems/
3059(mdo sde): dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ shar dang lho phyogs mtshams log su gnas rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs
3060(mdo sde): kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos
3061(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyis khams mig bzang po na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po sems dpa' zhes bya
3062(mdo sde): ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing 'dun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyis zhing de
3063(mdo sde): nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyis khams mi mjed 'dir byin te/ 'khor gyis khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das
3064(mdo sde): kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan stong phrag bcur bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan
3065(mdo sde): 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing na bza'i dra bas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bka' ste/ tshigasu bcad pa 'di gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do//
3066(mdo sde): sems can dam pa g.yag rnga thogs pa ji bzhin du/ tshul khrims dri med nor bu rin chen 'dra ba srung / tshul khrims med gzigs mgon po shin du thugs rje zhing / bdag la
3067(mdo sde): bstod pa mi mdzad gzhan la smod mi mdzad/ ri rab ji bzhin khyod brtan bla ma rgya chen ston/ chu ba gtor zab mo bzhin du shin du gting dpag bka'/ srid pa dog par bcings
3068(mdo sde): pa kun nas grol ba ste/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig nyes pa chen pos bcings las grol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i stod pa tshad med pa dag gis/
3069(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas lho dang nub kyis mtshams phyogs log su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gyis bstan dag la 'khod do//
3070(mdo sde): de nub dang byang gis mtshams phyogs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od bkod pa'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyis zhing 'jig rten gyis khams mun pa dang / bral ba na/ byang chub sems
3071(mdo sde): dpa' 'od zer dra ba can zhes pa 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas
3072(mdo sde): kyis zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyis khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyis khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das
3073(mdo sde): kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ de bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan stong phrag bcu'i bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod
3074(mdo sde): pa'i las byed cing rgyan gyis dra bas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bka' stsal to// tshig su bcad pa 'di gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par sdud do// srid pa'i
3075(mdo sde): rang bzhin rgyur ma'i rang bzhin rtogs mdzad nas/ byed pa sgyu ma lta bu dngos med par ston sgyu ma lta bu'i sems can khams ni 'dul mdzul mdzad kyang 'di na sems can rang bzhin
3076(mdo sde): bya/ ma mchis/ dper na mi zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na/ gzugs mthong yang dag 'du shes de bzhin mthong
3077(mdo sde): ma lags/ 'dus byas dngos po ma mchis rmi lam 'dra bar gsungs chos rnams snang yang 'di na chos la chags ma mchis de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub
3078(mdo sde): sems dpa'i stong pa tshad med pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la mngon par stod nas nub dang byang gi mtshams phyogs log su gnas te/ rang gis rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i
3079(mdo sde): rang rang gi stan la 'khod do// de nas byang dang shar gyis 'tshams phyogs de na de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa rnam par sems dpa'i sangs rgyas
3080(mdo sde): kyi zhing 'jig rten gyis khams yongasu dag dri ma med par rab tu gnas pa na byang chub sems dpa' blo mtha' yas dri ma med ces bya/ ba des bskal ma thag du byang chub sems
3081(mdo sde): dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig du sangs rgyas kyis zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud
3082(mdo sde): tsam de la 'jig rten gyis khams mi 'jed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyis zhags
3083(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan stong phrag bcur bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing rtag tu sgra 'byung
3084(mdo sde): ba'i sil sbyin gyi dra bas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bka' ste/ tshig su bcad pa 'di gnyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// zab mo'i chos
3085(mdo sde): la mkhas shing rab tu zhi la mos khyod kyi chos kun stong zhing mtshan ma med par mkhyen khyod kyis thugs kyis dgongs pa 'jig rten kun ma mtshal/ mtha' yas
3086(mdo sde): blo mnga' sems kyis bsam pa mchog mkhyen/ sems can gcig gi spyod pa bzhin sems can kun gyis spyod/ gang dag dus gsum ldan pa de dag khyod kyis mkhyen/
3087(mdo sde): sems can 'du shes mi 'jug sems kyis 'du shes min/ 'du shes yongs su shes mkhas shing mnyam pa nyid dang ldan/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub
3088(mdo sde): sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ byang dang shar gyis phyogs mtshams logs su gnas te/ rang gis rdzu 'phrul
3089(mdo sde): gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gis bstan dag la 'khod do// de nas 'og gis phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ud pa la dmar po'i dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyis
3090(mdo sde): zhing 'jig rten gyis khams rnam par snang byed du snang ba na byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba 'od de bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang ga'i
3091(mdo sde): klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas/ mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la/ 'jig
3092(mdo sde): rten gyis khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyis khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom ldan 'das
3093(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan stong phrag bcur bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing nor bu rin po che'i gling gis
3094(mdo sde): phreng ba'i dra bas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshogs su bcad pa 'di gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ gal te phyod phyod zhing na ji/
3095(mdo sde): rnyed rdul mchis pa/ de rnyed bde gshegs sras po rgyal ba'i drung lhags te/ bskal pa bye ba stong mang zhu ba zhus pa dag/ de dag thams cad tshig gcig dus kyis go
3096(mdo sde): bar mdzad/ bro ba mkham pa rab rdzogs shes rab shin tu rdzogs gzugs dang ting nge 'dzin rab rdzogs bsod nams mtha' yas te/ bskal pa mang po mtha' yas
3097(mdo sde): bsngags par brjod kyang / skra tses rgya mtsho ji bzhin zad par mi nus so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i stod pa tshad med pa dag
3098(mdo sde): gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ 'og gi phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi bstan dag la 'khod do//
3099(mdo sde): de nas steng gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa sgra bsgrags mchog gi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyis kham rgyan gyis brgyan pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos
3100(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag du byang chub sems dpa'i gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed cig yongs su bskor cing mdun du
3101(mdo sde): bdar te/ lhan cig du sangs rgyas kyis zhing des mi snang bar 'gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyis khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyis
3102(mdo sde): khams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug nas de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das la lan stong
3103(mdo sde): phrag bcur bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing brgyan thams cad bkod pa dang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas/ bcom
3104(mdo sde): ldan 'das la mngon par bkab te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod/ bde gshegs sku'i 'phrin las mtha' dang dpung
3105(mdo sde): ma mchis/ mtha' yas gsung thugs dam pa min pa'i spyod yul min de ni sangs rgyas mkhyen gyi sems can gzhan gyis min/ dper na na mkha'i mtha' skye bo mi rnyed bzhin/
3106(mdo sde): mtshungs med dpyod pa mtha' dpung med ma ji bzhin du/ byang chub 'khor lo de bzhin 'on te mya ngan 'das sa bon ji bzhin de ltar 'bras bu 'byang ba ltar de bzhin phyogs bcur rgyal ba'i
3107(mdo sde): gnas kyang tshad ma mchis/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems pa'i bstod pa tshad med pa de dgis bum ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas steng gis bar snang la
3108(mdo sde): dong ste/ rang gis rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gis bstan dgal 'khod do// de ltar phyogs bcu dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu 'dus pa la sogs
3109(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa dag 'od des skul ma thag du skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyis khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyis khams rin po che bkod par bcom
3110(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa dang ldan bzhing mkhyen bzhin du ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/ gsung gsal ba'i sgra mdzad nas gsung gsal
3111(mdo sde): ba'i sgra/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams dbyangs kyi go bar gyur te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams 'di na gang dag dad pas dang zhing
3112(mdo sde): gnod du gyur pa'i dge slong ngam dang dge snyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung gsal ba'i sgra de thos nas/ lus dang sems tshim
3113(mdo sde): par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus ji ltar byung ba'i them gras dag nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'khor gyis khyams rin po bskod par phyin te/ de dag gyis bcom ldan 'das
3114(mdo sde): kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu ji ltar mtsham pa'i stan dgal 'khod do// gsung stsal ba'i sgra de nyid kyis tshangs pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs ris dang tshangs
3115(mdo sde): ba'i 'dun na 'don dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od can dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang /
3116(mdo sde): dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams 'phel dang / 'bras bu che dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang dang / shin
3117(mdo sde): tu mthong dang / 'og min gyis lha rnams kyang bskul nas/ skad cig yud tsam de la 'khor gyis khyams rin po che bkod par phyin te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la
3118(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ stan rab tu brtan pa dag la 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa chen po do mkhyen nas/ smin mtshams kyis mdzod spu nas
3119(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i stobs nye bar ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ste/ des thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la lan bdun bskor ba nas/ byang chub sems
3120(mdo sde): dpa'i tshogs de nyid kyis spyi bor mi snang bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyis snying chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i 'od nges reg ma thag du de'i tshe/ sangs
3121(mdo sde): rgyas kyis mthus byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin brgyan thams cad bkod pa bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang
3122(mdo sde): sbyar ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin brgyan thams cad bkod pa la snyoms par zhugs ma thag du/ de nas de'i tshe 'khor gyis khas rin po bkod pa'i dbus nas/ bcom ldan
3123(mdo sde): 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri phang du shing ta la bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgya bcu tsam du mtho ba rin po che thams cad kyis sbas pa/ kha khyer brgyan thams cad las byas pa ras bkod
3124(mdo sde): pa thams cad bting ba/ me tog sil ma sna tshogs thams cad bkram pa/ bla re yid du 'ong ba thams cad nga 'bres pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus
3125(mdo sde): thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung ba/ 'khor thams cad kyis mig gis bltas pa/ sems can thams cad kyis bsam pa ji lta bzhin du ston pa/ bsam pa tshim par byed pa
3126(mdo sde): zhig byung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan seng ge'i khri bskal par bsngags
3127(mdo sde): pa mtha' yas shes bya ba mngon par sprul nas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ gus pa dang bcas shing zhes dang bcas par thal mo sbar nas
3128(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ nyi ma 'od du 'gro ba'i dgos pa rab tu bgyid/ lha dbang gzi brjid yon tan sum bcu rtsa gsum dga'/ tshangs
3129(mdo sde): pa'i dbyangs kyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten rnams par mdzes/ sangs rgyas mthu'i yul gyis rnam par sprul pa 'di chos rnams dbang sgyur na mkha'i rang bzhin g.yo ba
3130(mdo sde): med rgyu ma mig sgyu lta bu chu'i zla 'dra zhing / rje med byed pa po dang tshor ba po med par/ mkhyen nas mgon po 'dir ni rnam par sgrub pa ston/ bkod pa sems kyi dbang
3131(mdo sde): 'gro sems ni gzugs can min rnams sgrub thams cad sems kyi rang bzhin dbang du 'gro/ bkod pa thams cad 'dir ni sgyur ma'i rang bzhin 'dra/ rnam bsgrub bdag gyis
3132(mdo sde): ma mchis gang na'ang gnas ma mchis/ gang gis sems sgyu ma mchis rang bzhin dag 'tshal ba/ de la 'gro bur gnas pa'i nyon mongs ma mchis so// tog dang kun rtog
3133(mdo sde): yongs su rtogs las sems grol ba/ de ni sgyu ma'i rnam par sprul pa sna tshogs ston/ sa steng rdul tsam mngon par 'phags pa ma mchis kyang / sa steng nor bu rin chen sna
3134(mdo sde): tshogs kun tu bstan/ gdan gang bzhugs nas sems can bye ba 'dul gyur pa/ khyod kyi seng ge'i khri gdan rab mdzes bdag gis gyis/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan mchog
3135(mdo sde): dang dar gyis phreng ba bsgreng / de na gang tu'ang 'gro ba ma mchis 'od ma mchis/ khyod kyis gang nas chos rnams 'du ba mkhyen nas kyang / sems can dam pa rnam par 'phrul
3136(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs ston/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan legs shing shin tu spangs pa'i gsung 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa bsod nams gzi brjid mang bdag la thugs rtse'i slad
3137(mdo sde): du 'dzegs te gdan la bzhugs rga dang 'chi dang na ba gcod pa'i chos bshang gsol khyod la bsnyen bkur bskyed dang chos ni mnyan slad du rnam dag sems can 'di rnams phyogs
3138(mdo sde): bcu dag nas lhags/ gang gi don du lhags pa'i don de stsal du gsol seng ge'i gdan la zhugs te chos kyang bshad du gsol de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
3139(mdo sde): dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i lhags pa'i bsams pa mkhyen nas gdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
3140(mdo sde): sgribs pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa skyes nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i
3141(mdo sde): sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyis rnam grangs byang chub sems lam bkod pa la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos zab mo thams cad dang stobs bcu dang /
3142(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa yongasu sgrub pa dang / ye shes kyis 'byung gnas chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i gzungs kyis phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug pa so sor yang dag
3143(mdo sde): par rig pa la rnam par gdon mi za ba la gzhol ba'i sgor 'jug pa mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes la gzhol ba'i sgor 'jug pa/ phyir mi ldog par
3144(mdo sde): 'khor lo mi skyo ba'i chos ston pa/ theg pa thams cad theg pa gcig du mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par 'du ba/ chos dbyings tshul gcig cing 'dres pa la 'jug
3145(mdo sde): pa sems can thams cad bsam pa dang dbang po la 'jug pa ston pa snying po dang ldan pa chos thams cad gdon mi za ba bdud kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam
3146(mdo sde): par 'jom par byed pa/ tshul bzhin gyis chos kyi tshul la gzhol par 'jug pa nyon mongs pa dang ltar bar gyur pa/ thams cad 'dul ba chags pa med pa'i
3147(mdo sde): ye shes su 'jug pa med par ye shes ston pa sangs rgyas kyis mnyam pa nyid kyis ye shes la 'jug pa/ chags pa med pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi sgor 'jug
3148(mdo sde): pa chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par nges par ston pa/ rtog pa med pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa/ mnyam pa med pa nyid du 'jug pa bsod nams dang /
3149(mdo sde): ye shes kyis tshogs thams cad bsags pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo mnyam pa nyid rtogs par byed pa sangs rgyas kyis sku dang / gsung
3150(mdo sde): dang thugs mnyam pa nyid kyis rgyan dang ldan pa dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang mos pa dang / shes rab zad ming shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa/
3151(mdo sde): nyan thos kyis theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa'i tshul la 'jug pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir lus dang / ngag dang /
3152(mdo sde): sems rab tu bden par shes theg pa chen pos 'dul ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis dbang bskur ba rab tu thob pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i
3153(mdo sde): yon tan thams cad brjod pa'i phyir chos thams la dbang sgyur ba'i tshul la 'jug pa 'di ltar bus chos kyis rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu bstan pa
3154(mdo sde): dang / snyan pa dang / bshad pa dang / klags pa dang / gzungs pa dang / rnam par shes par byas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams
3155(mdo sde): cad kyis bsam pa yongs su bskang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul pa yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'khor gyis the tsom thams cad gcad
3156(mdo sde): ba dang / bdud kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad tshar gcad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'bar bar bya ba dang sangs rgyas
3157(mdo sde): kyis mdzad pa chen po yongs su thob par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs so// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bstan pa
3158(mdo sde): bam po gnyis pa// de nas sangs rgyas kyis mthus byang chub sems dpa'i rin chen srog shing zhes bya bas sangs rgyas kyis brgyan bkod pa zhes
3159(mdo sde): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang bya'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab so// de nas sangs rgyas kyis mthus byang chub
3160(mdo sde): sems dpa' sgra bsgrags stobs kyis rgyal pos pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis lags pa rnaMs su
3161(mdo sde): me tog gis lnga ldi dag dang / me tog gi phur ma rnams byin gyis brlabs te/ me tog gi lnga ldi dang / me tog gi phur ma de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems
3162(mdo sde): dpa'i tshogs thams cad la mngon par thor ro// de nas sangs rgyas kyis mthus byang chub sems dpa'i blo mchog rgya mtshos dri bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
3163(mdo sde): zhugs nas/ thams cad ldang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis sbrus khung bu thams cad du tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri byin gyis rlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyis mthus byang chub sems
3164(mdo sde): dpa' 'od zer dra ba can gyis 'od bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la lus kyis 'od mtha' yas byin gyis
3165(mdo sde): brlab so// de nas sangs rgyas kyis mthus byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po sems dpa' mig mi 'dzums pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams
3166(mdo sde): cad dang pa'i 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par phyogs shing mig mi 'dzums par byin gyis brlabaso// de nas sangs rgyas kyis mthus byang chub sems dpa' blo mtha'
3167(mdo sde): yas dri med chos la mchog tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chos ston du gnyer zhing chos la dga' ba dang /
3168(mdo sde): mos par byin gyis brlab so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pas rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
3169(mdo sde): snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sgrib pa lnga rnam par sel bar byin gyis brlab so// de nas sangs rgyas kyis mthus byang chub sems dpa'
3170(mdo sde): chos thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos brjod pa med spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pUR+Ya nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor byang chub kyi sems
3171(mdo sde): dran zhing de bzhin gshegs la dmigs pa mi brjed par byin gyis brlabaso de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyis mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpa'
3172(mdo sde): bos zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor bdud dang phyir rgol
3173(mdo sde): ba bcom par byin gyis brlabaso// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyis mthus byang chub sems dpa' bdud rab tu bcom pas bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jom
3174(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud rab tu 'joms pa/ bdud kyis dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la
3175(mdo sde): snyoms par zhugs ma thag du de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams na bdud bye ba phrag rgya ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dpung bcas te/ g.yog 'khor
3176(mdo sde): dang bcas te myur bar ringasu rung gis bdud kyis gnas mi snang bar gyur te/ 'khor gyis khams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'khor nas de dag gis
3177(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lha'i mchod pa rnam pa brgya stong phrag du mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas gus pa bcas shing zhes dang bcas
3178(mdo sde): bar thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la gsol pa 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das chos bshad du gsol/ bde bar
3179(mdo sde): gshegs pa chos bshad du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud rab tu 'jom pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis/ bdag bdud kyis sug las 'dor zhing slan cad sems can
3180(mdo sde): rnams la mig dang bral ba'i las mi bgyid bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la dbugs 'byung ba stsol cig dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zad du mchis te/ bdag cag chos/
3181(mdo sde): nyan par bgyi do/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud de dag dbugs 'byung ba'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po dag legs so leg so// gang gis
3182(mdo sde): phyir khyed bdud kyis las kyang 'or la de bzhin gshegs pa la chos bshad par gsol ba yang thob shig dang / de nyid khyod kyis lam thams cad las 'da' ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro// /
3183(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i phyir ro// grogs po dag 'di lta ste dper na mun nag lo dur mar bsags pa ni mar me gcig
3184(mdo sde): gis med par 'gyur ro// grogs po dag de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i mun pa mun nag bskal par brgyar bsags pa yang / ye shes kyi stobs skyed pa gcig gis med
3185(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// grogs po dag 'di lha ste dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor cig dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig dang / nor bu rin po che chen po gcig gis mun nag
3186(mdo sde): thams cad sel te grogs po dag de bzhin du dge ba'i sems lhags mthong dang ldan pa/ gcig mi shes pa'i mug nag thams cad sel te/ grogs po dag de'i phyir khyed
3187(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rims kyis mi shes pa'i mun pa nun nag thams cad bsal nas chos kyis snang ba chen po thob par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos/
3188(mdo sde): kyi dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par 'gyur te 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
3189(mdo sde): ldan 'das rgyas kyis yul de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa dang / kun tu bstan pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// deng ni de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub
3190(mdo sde): sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgri ba med pa'i sgo zhes bgyi ba 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyis rnam grangs bshad bzhed par the tsom ma mchis so//
3191(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das e ma byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dus pa ni che ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
3192(mdo sde): cho ga dgos pa/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes chen pos rnam par rol pa phyogs bcur sgra bsgrags pa/ sems shin tu byang bar bgyis te dri ma mchis pa rig pa dang /
3193(mdo sde): rnam par grol bas snang bar gyur pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstong bcing bsngags pa/ chos thams cad la dbang phyug gyis dbang sgyur ba/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams
3194(mdo sde): cad kyis pha rol tu son pa/ thabs la mkhas pa thams cad las nges par skyes pa bdud kyis las dang / brtsod pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal ba pha rol tu rgol
3195(mdo sde): ba dang / ngan pa'i tshogs can gyis tshogs thams cad rab tu 'dul ba/ tshigs thams cad rab tu dbyer ba bstan pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa
3196(mdo sde): chags pa mchis pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang khrel yod pa dang / mos pa dang gzugs dang / ye shes rab tu thob pa/ byin gyis brlabs/
3197(mdo sde): pa ma mchis shing spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa sems can thams cad kyis dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma lags pa shes pa la mkhas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis mos
3198(mdo sde): pa ji lta bzhin du chos ston pa 'khrul pa ma mchis par kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa'i chos ston pa sems can thams cad kyis sgra dang skad la mkhas pa/ mi 'am ci dang / bya ka la bying ka/
3199(mdo sde): dang / khrung khrung gi sgra dang / tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs can shin tu gnyer bgyid pas sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa byams pa chen po dang /
3200(mdo sde): snying rje chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa can brtan zhing shin tu gnas la mi g.yo zhing ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid pa chos kyis rgyal mtshan yang dag par bsgreng bar bgyid pa//
3201(mdo sde): rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi shigs pa'i 'khor yugs lta bu smon pa ma mchis pa'i smon lam dang / ldan pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bas zab mo lha bka' zhing rtogs bka' ba la
3202(mdo sde): zhugs pa chad pa dang / rtag pa'i mtha' gnyi ga dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad dang / bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par bcad pa/ tshogs can chen
3203(mdo sde): po'i tshogs kyi rgyal po yongs su 'gug pa/ ded dpon chen po bskal pa grangs med par chos rin po ches bsod nams yang dag par bsgrubs pa sman pa'i rgyal po
3204(mdo sde): chen po sems can thams cad kyis nyon mongs gzugs can ma lags pa'i nad gso bar bgyid pa/ seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrog la bzhi
3205(mdo sde): rgyud dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la mi sgrags pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos lus legs par brgyan pa gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin bgyid
3206(mdo sde): pa thams cad la sems dpa' bdud bzhi dang / nyon mongs pa'i yul 'dul ba/ gnyan pa lta bur gyur pa dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyis yan lag
3207(mdo sde): dang / bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa shin tu yongasu sbyang ba bgyis pa/ sems can thams cad rab bsgrol
3208(mdo sde): ba la brtson pa ri rab lta bur gyur pa 'jig rten gyis chos brgyad po rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang grags pa dang / grags pa ma mchis pa dang / sman pa dang //
3209(mdo sde): bstod pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal las log pa dga' ba dang / dang ba dang mchog du dga' ba'i chos la sems zhugs pa chos rin po che rnam par mthor ba/
3210(mdo sde): shes rab kyis ngoms nas bgyid pa pad+ma lta bu 'dus byas kyis chos thams cad kyis mi gos pa/ 'od kyis dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ zla ba dang / nyi ma dang /
3211(mdo sde): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i 'od mog mogo por bgyid pa/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ chos rin po che thams cad yang dag par gzhol ba/
3212(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum gyis gdung mi gcod pa/ sems can thams cad yongasu smin par gyid pa dang / 'dul ba'i cho gas 'tshal ba/ sangs rgyas
3213(mdo sde): kyis chos rin po che thams cad kyis mdzod yang dag par 'dzin pa/ bsngags pa mtha' yas pa dang / yang dag par ldan pa bsod nams tshad ma mchis
3214(mdo sde): pa bsam pa rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la nye bar gyur pa/ phyi mi'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par bsngags pa/ mthar
3215(mdo sde): mi phyin pa 'di lta bu rnams kyis 'dus pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de la bdag 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la
3216(mdo sde): 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba/ sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bgyid 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyis rnam grangs bshad pa bzhed pa snyam bgyid do// /
3217(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni phan 'dogs par gyur pa/ sems can thams cad tshami par 'gyur ba/ ma 'ongs pa'i byeng chub
3218(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pa/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsams pa yongs
3219(mdo sde): su spyod pa/ spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul gcig la 'jug pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs
3220(mdo sde): bya// rgyas kyis chos la dbang bskur ba/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems can rnams kyi rgyu dang / 'bras bu//
3221(mdo sde): chud mi za ba nges pa'i sems can rnams la rkyen nye bar sgrub pa/ ma nges pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po nye bar bsgrub pa/ legs pa nyid du nges
3222(mdo sde): pa'i sems can rnams 'dzud pa/ theg pa gsum la mos pa'i sems can rnams la rnam par dgod pa ston pa ste ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das sangs
3223(mdo sde): rgyas 'byung ba ni lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rgyan lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung bar
3224(mdo sde): gyur na/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'di lta bu 'di dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis 'khor gyis
3225(mdo sde): khyams 'dir sems bskyed pa gcig gis bkod pa gang byin gyis brlabs pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bskal pa brgya/
3226(mdo sde): phrag stong du yang ston pa'i rngo mi thog go/ bcom ldan 'das de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid de/ e ma ji tsam du gang rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul
3227(mdo sde): 'di lta bu 'di mthong yang / nyan thos kyis theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis theg pa la re ba skyed pa'i sems can shes rab 'tshal ba can de dag ni ngo mtshar
3228(mdo sde): che ba snyam bgyid do/ de ci'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bskyed pa nyid kyis/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
3229(mdo sde): cad zil gyis non pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can gyis mi la la zhig nor bu rin po bai dUr+ya bor nas/
3230(mdo sde): nor bu 'ching bu la dmigs pa snyam du sems dpa' dang / bcom ldan 'das gang dag theg pa chen po bor nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis theg pa la
3231(mdo sde): dmigs par bgyi bar snyam du sems pa'i sems can dag ni 'dra ba nyid du bdag la gda'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag sems
3232(mdo sde): thag pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni ring por mi thogs par chos 'di lta bu dang ldan par
3233(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyis dbadu phyug gis rgyal pos bstan pa 'di bshad na lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'khor de las srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya
3234(mdo sde): stong phrag sum bcus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed do/ rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba 'dus par le'u'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
3235(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa chen po de gzigs nas/ e ma byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa 'di dag ni chos don du nyer ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyis mdzod
3236(mdo sde): zam tog @'dzin par mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod la 'jug pas/ nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo'i le'u chos kyis rnam grangs
3237(mdo sde): rab tu bshad pa'i phyir mi 'jigs pas spobs pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer skyes bu chen po'i mtshan spyi gtsug nas phyung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer de byung ma thag
3238(mdo sde): du de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la la bdun bskor ba byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyis dbang phyug gi rgyal po lus la
3239(mdo sde): lan brgyad bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyis dbang phyug gis rgyal po'i spyi gtsug tu mi snang por gyur to// 'od nges byang chub sems
3240(mdo sde): dpa' gzungs kyis dbang phyug gis rgyal po de la reg ma thag du de nas sangs rgyas kyis mthus byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos thams cad
3241(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'od dang / seng ge'i khri dang lus brgya gyur du zil gyis mnan nas/ lha me lhan ne'o// de nas byang chub sems
3242(mdo sde): dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos/ de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa rig nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa
3243(mdo sde): gcig du gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i
3244(mdo sde): gtsug gyi drang zad gyis steng gi bar snang la rin po che'i gdugs de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba/ su ba ni bai dur+ya g.yogs ma ni gser snying po ni rin po che na rtse
3245(mdo sde): 'am ci rtsibs ni in 'dra ni la las byas na/ mu tig ga di shal rab du sbyangs pa/ dar gyi lnga lding mdzes par byas pa/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba 'khrol ba byang chub
3246(mdo sde): sems dpa'i lus kyis gzungs pa/ rgyar stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams kyis tshad tsam zhig byin gyis brlabs so// de bzhin gshegs
3247(mdo sde): pa la mchod pa'i lam gyis phyir rin po che'i gdugs de lta bu byin gyis brlabs nas me togs gi char yang phab ste/ sil bsnyen dang sgra dbyangs rtags tu rgyun mi
3248(mdo sde): 'chad par sgra 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// kun du snang ba kun nas 'od zer can
3249(mdo sde): don rnams ma lus ston pa kun sa spyod rang sbyang chos kyis ngo bo nyid la mkhas bsam gyis mi khyab yon tan kun dang ldan/ skyes bu khyu mchog gi ni 'od zer phyung /
3250(mdo sde): zhal yang rnam par spyod zhing 'od mdzad pa/ 'dren pa des ni bdag gis lus la yang / lan brgyad bskor ba bgyis nas spyi bor zhing / mi'i 'dren pa'i 'od kyis reg
3251(mdo sde): pas na/ gang dag bdag gis sngon thob dang 'dran pa dang / blo gros spobs pa snang ba de bzhin gzungs rnam pa stong du khyad par 'phags par 'gyur ba dag
3252(mdo sde): / lus rab sems ni rnam par dag bdag gis blo gros dga' mgu mnyam par 'gyur/
3253(mdo sde): gzhan yang sangs rgyas mkhyen pa mtha' yas dang / spobs pa bdag gi lus la rab tu zhugs// sangs rgyas mthu chen bsnyen par bka' ba la//
