3254(mdo sde): nyams chung dag gis mnyes par bgyis mi nus/ sangs rgyas gnas nas 'gro kun phan slad du/ sangs rgyas la ni zhu ba zhu bar 'tshal/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub
3255(mdo sde): sems dpa' spyod 'jug dang / 'jig rten rnams 'dren dag gis 'byung ba dang / sna dang nges 'byung rnam par sprul pa dang / dbang bskur ye shes so sor zhu
3256(mdo sde): bar 'tshal/ theg mchog dam pa rtogs par khong cud cing / mtha' yas rgya che ba yi 'khor lhags dang / gang dag rgya chen chos don gnyer ba dag/
3257(mdo sde): de dag phan slang sangs rgyas la yang zhu/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor shin du tshar bcad cing / sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di ni shin tu gzung / bcom ldan 'das
3258(mdo sde): phung po ma mchis dam chos mdzod/ lus can rnams la bshad pa'i dus 'di lags/ skyes bu khyu mchog mkhyen pa mtha' yas pas/ bcom ldan 'das de
3259(mdo sde): bdag gis blo mi chung bde gshegs mkhyen pa shes pas mi dpogs pas/ mkhas pa yangs pa bdag ni zhu bar 'tshal/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das khyod
3260(mdo sde): kyi mkhyen 'jug dang / ji ltar yun rings nas ni bslabs pa dang / chos kyis dbang phyug rgyal po rab brlabs pa/ 'dren pa rnams kyis spyod
3261(mdo sde): yul bshad du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dbang phyug gis rgyal pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
3262(mdo sde): bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs dpa'i yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab byang chub sems dpa'i
3263(mdo sde): spyod yul ni tshad ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa ni yongasu mi skyong bar chos ston pa lags par rig cing / de bzhin gshegs pa ni
3264(mdo sde): sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i thugs rje chen po la gnas par mthong nas/ don 'di zhu bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
3265(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyis rgyan dag ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rgyan gang dag gis brgyan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na
3266(mdo sde): mdzes pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyis snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob nas/ gti mug gis mun pa dang bral zhing
3267(mdo sde): the tsom mchis pa dang / chos kyis sgo chen po shin tu yongs su sbyang ba rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
3268(mdo sde): can thams cad mi gtong ba'i snying rje chen po dang snying rje chen po la gnas pa chos dang ldan zhing sems can
3269(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub sems dpa'i las
3270(mdo sde): yang dag par la zhugs pa dang / legs par bgyid pa'i las bgyid pa dang / las kyis mtha' gdung ba ma mchis pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan
3271(mdo sde): 'angs ci nas byang chub sems dpa' 'dud dang phyir rgol ba bcom zhing the tsom dang bral nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /
3272(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i yul la mngon du 'phags par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis bsam pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / sems
3273(mdo sde): can thams cad kyis sems kyi spyod pa dag yongasu 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyis
3274(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor tshad gcod par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / myur du chos thams cad
3275(mdo sde): la dbang thob par 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pas bro shin tu rnam par nges pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas mngon par 'phags pa'i
3276(mdo sde): chos kyi sgo de legs par bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gis rgyal po
3277(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod legaso leg so// khyod ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul tshad med pa la rnam par gnod mi za ba thob
3278(mdo sde): nas/ khyod blo rnam par gdon mi za ba 'di lta bus/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di lta bu 'dri bar sems dpa' ni skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so// de'i
3279(mdo sde): phyir rigs kyis bu khyod shin tu legs par nyon la yid la bzung shig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yon tan 'di dag dang / byang chub
3280(mdo sde): sems dpa'i yon tan tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / myur du chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba thob par 'gyur ba ngas khyod
3281(mdo sde): la bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan
3282(mdo sde): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyun ni bzhi po 'di dag go// bzhi gang zhe na 'di
3283(mdo sde): lta ste/ tshul khrims kyis brgyan dang / ting nge 'dzin gi brgyan dang / shes rab kyi rgyan dang / gzungs kyis rgyan dang / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
3284(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyis rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis tshul khrims kyi rgyan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi
3285(mdo sde): bu de byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni gcig go/ gcig gang zhes na 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la gnod pa mi byed pa ste/ byang
3286(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' zhe sdang gi sems med pa ni sems can thams cad yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba ste/ rigs bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis tshul
3287(mdo sde): khrims kyis rgyan gcig go// rigs kyis bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni gnyis po 'di dag go/ gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste ngan
3288(mdo sde): 'gro'i sgo gcod pa dang / bde 'gro'i sgo 'byed pa ste/ gnyis po 'di dag go/ rigs kyis bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis tshul khrims kyis rgyan
3289(mdo sde): ni gsum po 'di dag go/ gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste lus rnam par dag pa dang / ngag rnam par dag pa dang / yid rnam par dag pa ste/ gsum po 'di dag
3290(mdo sde): go/ rigs kyis bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag go// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ gang 'dod pa de 'byor pa dang /
3291(mdo sde): gang spyod pa de yang dag par 'phrul pa dang / gang 'dod pa thob pa dang / gang rtsom pa de nyams 'og du chud par byed pa ste bzhi po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu
3292(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis tshul khrims kyis brgyan ni lnga po 'di dag go// lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste tshul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgyu med pa yin/ shes
3293(mdo sde): rab sgyu med pa yin/ rnam par grol ba sgyu med pa yin rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba sgyu med pa yin yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bla na med pa bsgyu
3294(mdo sde): med pa yin te/ lnga po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyis rgyan ni drug po 'di dag go// drug gang zhes na 'a
3295(mdo sde): ste/ yid la bcags pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir skyon med pa'i tshul khrims dang / kha na mtho ba med pa'i tshul khrims kyis phyir nyams pa med
3296(mdo sde): pa'i tshul khrims dang 'dren pa ma yin pa'i tshul khrims kyis phyir 'dren pas yin pa'i tshul khrims dang / dge ba'i chos shan tu rnam par 'phel ba'i phyir thun tshigs ma
3297(mdo sde): yin pa'i tshul khrims dang / gang gis 'dod par 'gro ba'i tshul khrims kyis phyir rab dga'i tshul khrim dang / gzhan la rag ma las pa'i shes pas rang gis dbang sgyur ba'i tshul
3298(mdo sde): khrim de drug po 'di dag go// ris kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnam kyi tshul khrim kyi rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag go/ bdun gang zhe na 'di lta ste tshul khrim dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa rnam par dag pa dang /
3299(mdo sde): bzod pa rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa dang / bsam gtan rnam par dag pa dang shes rab rnam par dag pa dang / thabs rnam par dag pa dang / bag yod pa rnam par
3300(mdo sde): dag pa ste/ bdun po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyis rgyan ni brgyad po 'di dag go// brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste spobs
3301(mdo sde): pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / sa phun sum tshogs pa dang / rnams par 'pho ba med pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / lhong ba med pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / khon du 'dzin pa
3302(mdo sde): med pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dal ba phun tshogs pa dang / dge ba'i gshes gasnyen mgu bar byed pa phun
3303(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa ste/ brgyad po 'di dag gi/ rigs kyis bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag go// dgra gang zhes na 'di lta ste 'jigs pa
3304(mdo sde): med pa yin skrag pa med pa yin/ bsams pa yin nye bar zhi ba yin/ bsil ba yin bcings pa lhod pa yin/ sems las su rung ba yin sems can shes pa yin/ zhi ba'i sa rjes
3305(mdo sde): su thob pa yin te dgu po// 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag go// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste mtshan dang dpe byad
3306(mdo sde): bzang po yongasu rdzogs pa'i phyir lus kyis rgyan dang / ji skad smras pa/ de bzhin byed pa'i phyir ngag gi rgyan dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir sems kyis rgyan dang / smon lam
3307(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir zhing gi rgyan dang / bsam pa yongs su spong pa'i phyir sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i rgyan dang / sdig pa thams cad mi byed phyir skyes pa'i rgyan dang /
3308(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa la rjes su slob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyan dang / nga rgyal med pa'i phyir shes pa'i rgyan dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu bsngo ba'i
3309(mdo sde): phyir byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan dang / tshul khrims kyi ba la gnas pa mi 'dor ba'i phyir stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rgyan te/ rigs kyi
3310(mdo sde): bya bcu pa 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan no// rigs kyis bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyan gang zhe na rigs kyi
3311(mdo sde): phra byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tinge 'dzin gyis rgyan ni gcig go// gcig gang zhes na 'di lta ste sems can thams cad la byams pa ste/ 'di dag ni gcig go// rigs bu
3312(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tinge 'dzin gyis rgyan gnyis po 'di dag go gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ drang ba dang mnyen pa ste/ gnyis po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub
3313(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyan ni gsum po 'di dag go// gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste sgyu med pa dang g.yo med pa dang / bcos pa med pa ste/ gsum po 'di
3314(mdo sde): dgo// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag go// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'dod pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang /
3315(mdo sde): zhe sdang gis 'gro ba ma yis par 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba ste/ bzhi po 'di dgo//
3316(mdo sde): rigs kyis bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin ni rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag go// lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sgring ba lnga spong ba'o// ldag
3317(mdo sde): zhe na 'dod par bya bar la 'dod pa dang / gnod sems dang rmugs pa dang gnyid dang rgod pa dang / 'gyod pa dang / the tsom ste sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag spong ba'o// rigs kyi
3318(mdo sde): bu byang chub sems da' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyan ni drug po 'di dag go// drag gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa
3319(mdo sde): dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / gtong pa rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa ste drag po 'di dag go// rigs
3320(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyud ni bdun po 'di dag go// bdun gang zhe na 'di sta ste/ byang chub sems mi brjed pa'i byang chub kyi
3321(mdo sde): yan lag bdun bsgom pa ste/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyis yan lag dang chos ba tu 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyis yan lag dang / btson 'grus yang dag byang chub
3322(mdo sde): kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyis
3323(mdo sde): yan lag da ste/ bdun po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyan ni brgyad po 'di dag go// brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste 'phags
3324(mdo sde): ba'i lam yan lag brgyad po bsgom pa ste/ 'di ltar yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtogs pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i/
3325(mdo sde): lam gyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te// brgyad po 'di dag
3326(mdo sde): gorigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyan ni dgu po 'di dgo// dgu gang zhes na 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
3327(mdo sde): brjed pa med pa'i sems kyi snying chen po'i gnas la gnas te/ sems can thams cad yod su mi gtong bar gnas nas/ 'dod pa rnams las dben pa/ sdig pa'i mi dge
3328(mdo sde): ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rnams par rtog pa dang / bcas pa rnam par sdod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam tan dang po
3329(mdo sde): rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rnams par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi ste// nang shin du dang zhing sems kyi rgyun cig tu gyur par/ rnams par rtog par
3330(mdo sde): med cing rnam par dpyod pa med/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de dga' ba'i 'dod chags
3331(mdo sde): dang bral te/ btang snyoms can du gnas la dran pa dang / ldan zhing shes bzhin gyis dre ba la lus kyis tshor te/ gang 'phags pa rnams kyi btang snyoms can dran pa dang ldan
3332(mdo sde): zhing bde bar gnas pa'o// zhes brjod pa dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de bde ba yang
3333(mdo sde): spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs te/ yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba lnga nas nub pas bde ba yang med sdug bsngal yang med de btang snyoms dang / dran pas yongasu
3334(mdo sde): dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las shin tu 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub
3335(mdo sde): nasartasna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ namakha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ namakha' mtha' yas skyes ched rdzogs par byas te/ gnas so// de na rnam pa
3336(mdo sde): thams cad du namakha' mtha' yas skye mched las shin tu 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnams shes mtha' yas skyes mched rdzogs par byas
3337(mdo sde): te gnas so// de rnams pa thams cad du rnam shes tha' yas skyes mched las shin tu 'das te/ ci yang med do snyam nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas
3338(mdo sde): te gnas so// de rnams pa thams cad du ci'ang med pa'i skye mched las shin tu 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rnam pa/
3339(mdo sde): thams cad du 'du shes med min skye mched las shin tu 'das te 'dus shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyom par 'jug pa la snyems par 'jug kyang / thabs mkhas pas
3340(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du'ang mi byed la/ sngon gyis byin brlabs kyis yang langs nas/ sems can rnams kyang yongasu smin par byed pa te/ ting nge 'dzin
3341(mdo sde): gyis rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnam kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag go// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste mi 'khrul pas nges par
3342(mdo sde): sems dpa' dang / zhi gnas yong su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mngon par brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang nang du yang ga 'jog sbeng pa dang / dge ba'i rtse ba rnams chung mi za ba dang / sems
3343(mdo sde): dben pa dang / lus shin tu sbyangs pa dang / chos rnams la sems shing 'jal la so sor rtogs pa dang / sems la dbang sgyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i rigs rab tu thob
3344(mdo sde): pa ste/ rigs kyis du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis teng nge 'dzin gyis rgyan ni bcu po 'jig go// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis shes rab kyi rgyan
3345(mdo sde): gang zhe na 'di lta ste rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnam kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni gcig po// gcig gang zhe na 'di lta ste chos thams cad la the tsom med pa ste/ 'di ni
3346(mdo sde): gcig go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni gnyis po 'dig bo// gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste 'byod pa dang bra' ba dang kun nas ldang ba dang
3347(mdo sde): dral ba ste gnyis po 'di dag go rigs kyi dra byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyad ni gsum po 'di dag go// gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ gti mug spong ba dang /
3348(mdo sde): / ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs nges par gcog pa dang / mun pa mun nag sel ba ste gsum po'i 'di dag go// rigs kyi dra byang chub sems dpa'/
3349(mdo sde): rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag go// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal yongasu shes par bya ba'i shes pa dang / kun tu 'byung ba spong ba'i snang
3350(mdo sde): ba dang // 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba'i 'od dang / lam sgom pa'i byin gyis brlab ste/ bzhi po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnam kyi shes rab
3351(mdo sde): kyi rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag go// lnga po gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dmigs pa med pas tshul khrims kyis phung po yongs su dag pa dang / shes rab kyi mchog gi bsam
3352(mdo sde): gtan pa yin pas ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / gnyis dang bral bas rnam par grol ba'i phung po yongasu dag pa dang / dus sum mnyam pa/
3353(mdo sde): nyid bas rnam par grol ba ye shes kyis mthong ba'i phung po yongs su dag pa ste/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid bas chos kyi phung po yongs su dag pa ste/
3354(mdo sde): lnga po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnam kyi rgyun drug po 'di dag go// drug gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'khor gsum yongasu dag pa'i sbyin pa'i pha
3355(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa ni sgyu ma dang mnyam pa nyid pas/ bdag gis 'khor ba yongasu dag pa dang / rmi lam dang mnyam pa nyid pas/ sems can gyis 'khor yongasu
3356(mdo sde): dag pa dang rnam par smin pa la re ba med pas byang chub kyi 'khor yongs su dog go/ 'khor gsum yong su dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzug
3357(mdo sde): brnyan lta bu'i phyir lus kyis 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / brag chag lta bu'i shis pas gang gis 'khor yongasu dag pa dang / rgyu ma dang mnyam pa nyid bas
3358(mdo sde): sems kyi la khor yongasu dgo'/ 'khor gsum po yongasu dag pa'i gzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyes par smras pa'i tshigs rnam la khong khro ba spong ba yongasu dag
3359(mdo sde): pa dang / bstod pa dang / bsngags pa dang / rjes su chags pa spong ba yongs su dag pa dang / yan lag dang / nyin lag gcod pa dag la chos kyi sku la rab tu rtog
3360(mdo sde): ba yongs su dag pa'o// 'khor gsum yongasu dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khor ba rmi lam lta bur mos pas/ yongasu mi skyo ba yongs su dag pa dang
3361(mdo sde): rdo rje lta bur bsam pa brtan po yong su dag pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad las grol sa blad pa med pa dang / dor ba med pa yongasu dag pa'o// 'khor gsum yongasu dag
3362(mdo sde): pa'i bsam gastan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'gyur bar shes pas de la ma chags pa yongasu dag pa dang mngon par zhe na med pas lhag mthong yongasu dag pa dang mngon
3363(mdo sde): par shes pa skyes pas dmigs pas yongasu dag pa'o// 'khor gsum yongasu dag pa'i thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sems can yongasasu smin par byed pas bsdu bar
3364(mdo sde): dngos po yongasu dag pa dang dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pas gzungs yongasu dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyis rgyan gyis phyir smon/
3365(mdo sde): lam yongasu dag pa ste/ drug po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnam kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag go/ bdun gang zhes na 'di lta ste/ dran pa
3366(mdo sde): nye bar gzhag pa rnam la dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa dang / yang dag par spongs pa rnam la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par shes pa dang / rdzun 'phrul
3367(mdo sde): gyi rkang pa rnam kyi lus dang sems dben pa dang / dbang po rnam la dbang po yongasu shes pa dang / stobs rnam kyi bdud dang nyon mongs pa thams cad tshar gcod pa/
3368(mdo sde): dang / byang chub kyis yan lag rnam kyi chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang / lam rnams la 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med par shes pa ste/ bdun po 'di dag go/ rigs kyis bu
3369(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyis rgyan ni brgyad po 'di dag go// brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste shin tu zhi ba'i phyir zhi gnas shes pa dang / rab rib dang bral ba'i phyir lhag
3370(mdo sde): mthong shes pa dang chos kyi phung po rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir phung po shes pa dang / na mkha' khams dang mnyam pa nyid kyis phyir khams shes pa dang grong stong dang mnyam pa nyid kyi
3371(mdo sde): skye mched shes pa dang bdag med pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shes pa dang / mi 'khrugs pa'i phyir bden pa dang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pas chos
3372(mdo sde): thams cad nges par shes pa ste brgyad po 'di dgo// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis shes rab kyis rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag go// dugu gang zhe na 'di lta ste
3373(mdo sde): bsngon gyi mtha' dag pas 'das pa shes pa dang / phyir mi'i mtha' dag pas ma 'ongs pa shes dang / bar gyis mtha' dag pas da ltar byung ba shes pa dang / rgyu chung
3374(mdo sde): mi zabs nges pa rnams shes pa dang / rkyen nye bar sgrub pas ma nges pa rnams shes pa dang / yongasu smin par byed pas/ legs pa nyid du nges pa rnams shes pa dang / chos
3375(mdo sde): kyi skus rab tu phye ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad nyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyis phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang /
3376(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'i phyir phags pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa ste dgu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyis
3377(mdo sde): rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag go// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ rnams par bsgrub pa mtshan nyid kyis phyir sgyu ma lta bur shes pa dang / yongs su rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis
3378(mdo sde): phyir rmi lam lta bur shes pa dang / rnam par 'phrul ba'i mtshan nyid kyis phyir smig rgyu lta bur shes pa dang / 'pho ba med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis phyir gzugs panyam
3379(mdo sde): pa lta bur shes pa dang du/ du 'phrod kyis mtshan nyid kyi phyir mig yor lta bur shes pa dang // rkyen gyis mtshan nyid kyis phyir brag cha lta bur shes pa dang / chos kyis dbyings 'dres pa
3380(mdo sde): med pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / de bzhin nyid gnas med pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / de bzhin nyid gnas med pa'i mtshan nyid du
3381(mdo sde): shes pa dang yang dag pa'i mtha' mi 'khrugs pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang 'dus byas dag 'das ma byas kyis mtshan nyid du shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
3382(mdo sde): rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyis rgyan gang zhes na rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
3383(mdo sde): gzungs kyi rgyan ni gcig go// gcig gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dran par byed pa med pa ste/ 'di ni gcig go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs
3384(mdo sde): gyi rgyan ni gnyis po 'di dag go// gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ kun tu 'dzin pa dang / 'dzin pa ste/ gnyis po 'di dag go// rags kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
3385(mdo sde): rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni gsum po 'di dgo// gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ don la mkhas pa dang / tshig 'brul mkhas pa dang / nges pa'i tshig la mkhas pa ste/
3386(mdo sde): gsum po 'di dgo// rags kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag go// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i tshig dang /
3387(mdo sde): rtsub pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang / rab tu grol ba'i tshigs dang / rdzun pa med pa'i tshig ste/ bzhi po 'di dag go// rags kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams
3388(mdo sde): kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag go// lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ thos pa thams cad kyi nang nas don la don rtog pa dang / yi ge tshogs thams cad kyis nang nas ye
3389(mdo sde): shes la rton pa dang / mdo sde thams cad kyi nang nas nges pa'i don gyis mdo sde la rton pa pa dang / gang zag gi sgra thams cad las chos nyid la rton pa dang / 'jig
3390(mdo sde): rten thams cad las 'jig rten las 'das pa la rten pa ste/ lnga po 'di dag go// rigs kyi du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni drug po
3391(mdo sde): 'di dag go// drug gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ ji skad smras pa de zhin du byed pa dang / dben pa'i rje su mthun pa'i tshig rab tu thob pa dang /
3392(mdo sde): nga rgyal med pas gzungs par 'os pa'i tshig dang g.yo ba med pas blang bar 'os pa'i tshig dang snying rjes chen po la spor bas 'brus bus yod pa'i// chos ston pa dang /
3393(mdo sde): smod la mkhas pas phyed par chos ston pa dang / 'jig rten shes pas dus su ma chos sten pa ste drug po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
3394(mdo sde): rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag go// 'dun gang zhen 'di lta ste/ 'gyogs pa'i spobs pa dang / shugs can gyi slengs pa dang / myur ba'i
3395(mdo sde): spobs pa dang / chags med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / 'phrul pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / gshin tu nges kyi tshig ni
3396(mdo sde): spobs pa ste/ bdun po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni brgyan ni brgyad po 'di
3397(mdo sde): dag go// brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lha'i skad shes pa dang klu'i skad shes pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi skad shes pa dang / dri za'i skad shes pa dang /
3398(mdo sde): lha ma yin gyi skad shes pa dang / na mkha' lding gi skad shes pa dang / mi 'am ci'i skad shes pa dang / lto'i bye chen po'i skad shes pa nas/ sems can thams
3399(mdo sde): can gyi bar gyi skad shes pa ste// brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni dgu 'di dag go// dgu gang zhe na
3400(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ 'khor gyis nang du zla gong ba med pa dang / smra ba'i nang du zhum pa med pa dang / chos bshad pa'i nang du 'jigs pa med pa dang / 'di
3401(mdo sde): nganems la nges par 'byung ba shes pa dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams la snrel bzhi bsten pa shes pa dang / yang dag rwa zhugs pa rnams la rjes su thun pa
3402(mdo sde): bstan pa shes pa dang / khengs pa dag la lag na rdo rje ston pa dang / mngon par chags pa med pa rnams la sreg pa'i skal pa ston pa dang / yongasu smin pa rnams la
3403(mdo sde): thegs pa'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston ste/ dgu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byad sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag go// bcu gang zhen
3404(mdo sde): ngor snyan pa rgyun mang po med pa dang /
3405(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dogs pa thams cad la the tsom med pa ston pa shes pa dang / blos chos skye ba'i sgo dang shes rab kyi snang ba gzhan la rag ma las pa dang / yi ge
3406(mdo sde): bsten pa bzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa tha' yas pa yang dag par rab tu brjod pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i skyon mu med par brjod pa
3407(mdo sde): dang / rnams par spangs pa'i bsngags pa tshed med pa ston pa dang dbang po thams cad la gzhol bar 'jug pa chags pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis
3408(mdo sde): gnang ba'i so sor yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis do ning nyid rgya cher bstan
3409(mdo sde): pa'i phyir tshigasu cad pa 'di dag gsung so// gang gis thog tshog ma pa 'di mdzes pa// blo gro chen po rnam kyi tshul khrim ting nge 'dzin de bzhin shes
3410(mdo sde): rab mchog/ shin tu rnams des don dang de bzhin gzungs// de ni lus can gyi yid 'ong dga' lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid dag cing de yi nams
3411(mdo sde): par ltung ba kun chad pa/ 'di ni tshul khrims ldan pa'i rgyan yin no// lha mi rnams kyis nang du mkhas pa ste de ni smon lam ji lter 'dod bzhin 'grub
3412(mdo sde): nan tan snying por byed pa dang yang ldan 'di ni tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan yin no// de yi ting nge 'dzin sgyu ma ma yin te/ shes rag rnams blol de
3413(mdo sde): bzhin ye shes mthong de yi mya ngan las 'das pa sgyu ma min// 'di ni tshul khrims rnams par dag pa'i rgyan/
3414(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi med tshul khrims rnam par dag/ tshul khrims thun tshags ma yin 'dren pa med/ de yi rang dga' de bzhin rang dbang yin 'di
3415(mdo sde): ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan tshul khrims kyis ni sbyin pa dag par gyur ro// bzod pa dag cing de bzhin btson 'grus dag/ bsam gartan dag
3416(mdo sde): gcing de bzhin shes rab dag thabs dang de bzhin bag yod dag pa yin// g.yo ba med cing brtan la shin tu gnas/ sa tshogs thob cing rnal 'byor
3417(mdo sde): 'phro med/ lhod pa spangs shing dag nga sra gso yang sla/ 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan/ brtson 'grus 'bar zhing tshul khrims bsngags
3418(mdo sde): pa ste/ de yi sems ni nam yang bdung mi 'gyur// de la yid la bcags pa 'gyur med do// 'di gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan/ 'jigs
3419(mdo sde): pa med cing mi skrag mi zhum ste/ bsam pa nges shing zhi la yid rang bzhi/ 'dir ni de yi bcing ba lhod par 'gyur/ 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan
3420(mdo sde): grags chen sems ni las su rung ba yin/ de ni dul zhing de bzhin bcang shes yid 'di ni rang lus mtshan gyis rgyan byed pa/ 'di ni gang dag tshul khrim/
3421(mdo sde): dag par brgyad/ de ni dzin dgang smras pa de bzhin byed/ mangs pa de ni ngag gi rgyan thob te/ sa don nyin mongs med pas rtag sems can
3422(mdo sde): 'di ni gang dag rgyal khrims dag pa'i rgyan/ khyad par 'phag pa'i zhing ni legs par brgyan/ theg pa mchog la sems can yongs su smin byed/
3423(mdo sde): gang phyir sdig pa thams cad mi byed pas// rang gi skyes pa legs par brgyan par byed byang chub spong pa rtag tu rgyan byed cing byang chub snying po dam pa brgyan par byed/
3424(mdo sde): stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dag brgyan byed cing / nga rgyal med pas shes pa legs par brgyan/ de ni byams sa sems can kun khyab ste/
3425(mdo sde): mkhas brtag du drang dang / mnyen pa yin pa lo med cing sgyu med bcos pa med gti mug 'ang
3426(mdo sde): dang 'jigs pas 'gro ba yin/ de ni sgrib pa lnga po rnam par sel/ bag yod gyur nas rjes su dran drug sgom
3427(mdo sde): byang chub yan lag bdun da lam bsgom ste/ mthar gyis dgu dang ting nges 'dzin bsam gtan byed/
3428(mdo sde): rnal 'byor pa ni zhig nas des sems spyod/ de ni tshul bzhin dag/ ba chud mi gzinadaben dang shin tu dbyangs dang /
3429(mdo sde): so sor rtog 'phags pa'i rigs la dbang ni sbyar ba yin/ chos rnams la ni the tsom med par 'gyur/ de la kun nas ldang dang 'gyur ba med de/
3430(mdo sde): lam rig gti mug pa med/ bden pa snang zhing yongs su shes pa shes/ tshul khrims dag pa dmigs pa med pa ste/ shes rab dam pa bsam gtan ting nge 'dzin dag/
3431(mdo sde): gnyis gsal nas ni rnams par dgrol ba dag lhag pa'i nga rgyal med cing shes pa dag dus gsum dag la ye shes mthong mi chags/ 'dod chags bral ba'i shes pas
3432(mdo sde): chos kyang dag dag nas 'dir ni de la rlom sems med/ 'di ni gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyan shes rab skyi ni sbyin pa brgyan gyur te/ rmi lam sgyu mtsho la med pa'i phyir// /
3433(mdo sde): bdag dang byang chub de bzhin sems can rnams 'khor gsum po bdag de ni rnam par sbyong / shes rab kyis ni tshul khrims rgyan gyur te/ gzugs rnyen sgyu ma brag cha
3434(mdo sde): 'dra ba'i phyir/ lus dang ngag rnams dang ni de bzhin sems 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par spyod/ shes rab kyis ni bzod pa brgyan gyur te/ mkhas dang ma thob ma
3435(mdo sde): yin na dma' bar 'gyur min dang / dam pa'i chos sku rtag tu rab rtog pa/ 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnams par sbyong / shes rab kyis ni brtson 'grus brgyan gyur
3436(mdo sde): te/ skyo ba med cing bsam pa bstan pa dang / don blang ba med cing dor med pa/ 'khor gsum po dag de ni par spyod shes rab kyis ni bsam gtan rgyan gyur te/
3437(mdo sde): de lam chags gyur dang lhag mthong dang / mkhas pa mngon par shes pa dang / 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par spyod/ shes rab kyis ni thabs kyang brgyan byed
3438(mdo sde): de/ shin tu sdad dang gzungs dang yang dag smon/ 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnams spong zhing / sems can chos dang de bzhin zhing rnams spong dran pa nye bar
3439(mdo sde): gzhag la dran mi 'jug yang dag spongs pa rnams la gnyis med de/ rdzu 'phrul gyis no lus dang sems kyang dben sems can gyis ni dbang po kun mi shes 'ad
3440(mdo sde): dang nyon mongs rnams kyis zil mi gnon chos kyis rang bzhin tshul bzhin rjes rtogs de bzhin lam la 'od med 'gro ba med/ 'di ni gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i
3441(mdo sde): rgya na de ni shin tu zhi bas zhig nas shes de yi lhag mthong spyod yul 'tha' yas te/ chos kyis phung po ji bzhin phung po shes/ khams ni nam mkha' mtshungs shing 'dra
3442(mdo sde): bar shes des ni stong pa lta bur skyes ma ched shes rten pas bsags pas chos rnams bdag med de/ don dam bden par 'khrug pa med par shes/ tshul bzhin gyis
3443(mdo sde): ni nges par rtogs pa shes gsum pa la ni chags med ye shes 'jug rnam par bzhags phyir phung po gsum yang shes/ dkon mchogs su ma ni mtshan nyid gcig
3444(mdo sde): du shes 'di ni gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyan/ rnam bsgrubs mtshan nyid sgyu ma lta bur shes yongs brtag rtsa ba rmi lam ji bzhin no// rnam 'phrul mtshan nyid smrig
3445(mdo sde): rgyu 'dra ba ste/ 'pho med chos rnams gzugs brnyen mtshan nyid do// 'du 'phrod byung ba mig yor lta bu ste/ rkyen rnams kyis ni
3446(mdo sde): brags cha ci bzhin no// chos kyis dbyangs ni rtags tu ma 'dres shes de bzhin nyid ni gnas med de bar shes/ yang dag 'tha' ni rtag tu mi g.yo chos/ 'das
3447(mdo sde): ma byas dang 'dus byas gnyis su med/ shes rab zab cing blon rib yangs pa/ brgyan nas sangs rgyas chos rnams tshol bar byed/ don nam yang dran pa brjed
3448(mdo sde): pa med/ chos rnams kun tu 'dzin cing 'dzin par byed// don dang tshig 'bral ni rtag tu mkhas/ des tshigs shes pa rtags par rtogs khong chud// chags
3449(mdo sde): med tshigs dang rtsub pa ma yin dang / rab tu grol ba'i tshigs dang brdzun med tshig thos pa kun don rtag tu rtog pa dang / mkhas pa de ni ye shes rton par byed/ de
3450(mdo sde): don mdo sde rtogs par rab tu shes/ gang zag med pa'i chos nyid rten byed cing / 'jig rten 'das pa'i chos nyid la yang rton/ de ni gzungs kyi rgyan par gyur pa yin//
3451(mdo sde): de yi tshig ni bden pa'i rjesu mthun/ gzung bar 'os dngos su 'ongs pa yin/ de yi chos bstan de ni 'bras bu yod/ phyed pa dang ni dus su rgyun chags 'jug de yi slob
3452(mdo sde): pa 'gyogs pa skye ba ste// shugs can dang ni myur dang / rtag mi chags rgyun cad med dang 'khrul med nges pa'i tshigs/ nges par rgyas pa'i phreng bas legs rgyan bzhi
3453(mdo sde): lha dang klu'i skad ni rab tu shes/ gnod sbyin dga'ang dri za lha ma yin/ mkha' lding mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che sems can kun gyi skad kyang rab tu shes/ 'khor lhag/
3454(mdo sde): shes nas spa gong med pa ste// smra ba mthong nas zhum par 'gyur ba'ang med 'jigs pa med par chos kyi gtam brjod/ 'dre ba rnams la nges 'byung rab tu shes/ lcag
3455(mdo sde): pa'i nga rgyal can mthong snrel bzhi yi gtam brjod rnal 'byor mthong nas rjesu mthun/ nga rgyal can la lag na rdo rje stom// yul mngon chags la sreg pa'i skal ba ste/
3456(mdo sde): theg pa gsum gyis rim pa'i gtam yang rjod dogs pa kun gyi the tsom gcod pa ste/ blo'i chos rnam mngon sum 'gyur yin de yi shes rab nam yang gzhan mi ltos
3457(mdo sde): yi ge thams cad rtag tu zad med shes don rnams nges pa dag la rgyun cang med/ de ni sangs rgyas chos rnams mtha' yas brjod/ de ni gzungs kyis brgyan pa 'gyur ba yin
3458(mdo sde): kun nas nyon mongs skyon ni mtha' yas shes rnam par byang ba'i phan yon thugs pa med de bzhin sems can dbang po thams cad shes/ sangs rgyas gnang ba'i so so rigs pa
3459(mdo sde): thob/ de ni gzungs kyis rgyan par gyur pa ste/ de yi yon tan 'di dag gzhan dag dang / bskal bar rgyur chad med par rab brjod kyang yon tan mtha' ni rtogs par mi
3460(mdo sde): nus so// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bstan pa// bam po gsum pa// / bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan yang byang chub sems
3461(mdo sde): dpa' gzungs kyis dbang phyug gi rgyal po la bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyis bu snang ba gang dag gis snang bar 'gyur na/ byang chub se
3462(mdo sde): dpa'i mun pa mun nag dang bral zhin byang chub sems dpa'i spod pa yongasu dag pa spod par 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go//
3463(mdo sde): brgyad gang zhes na 'di lta ste/ dran pa'i snang ba dang blo gros kyi snang ba dang / rtogs pa'i snang ba dang / chos kyi snang ba dang / shes pa'i snang ba dang / mngon par shes
3464(mdo sde): pa'i snang ba dang / bsgrub pa'i snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems rnams kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran
3465(mdo sde): pa'i snang ba ni gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sngon byas pa'i dge ba'i
3466(mdo sde): rtsa ba chud mi gzod pa dang / dge ba'i tsA ba ma byas pa sogs pa dang / thos pa'i chos rnams mi brjed pa dang / don rnams par gnod mi zab rjes su thob pa dang /
3467(mdo sde): yul drug gis 'phrogs pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos spong zhing dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dran pa rgya chen po phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang /
3468(mdo sde): de dran pa phun sum tshogs par rigs nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi grong khyor srungs par 'jogs pa dang / dran pa sngon du 'gro bas cho
3469(mdo sde): thams cad la snang ba thob pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dran pa'i snang ba ni rgyad po 'di dag go/ rigs kyis bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams/
3470(mdo sde): kyis blo gros kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ don gyis blo gros yin gyis tshigs 'bru'i blo gros ma yin pa dang / ye shes kyis blo gros yin gyis
3471(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa'i blo gros ma yin blo gros ma yin pa dang bslabs chos blo gros yin gyis chud nyon mongs pa'i blo gros ma yin pa dang / rigs pa'i blo gros yin gyis bgal
3472(mdo sde): pa'i blo gros ma yin pa dang / byang chub kyi sems kyis blo gros yin gyis nyan thos dang / rang sangs kyis blo gros ma yin pa dang bslabs che'i blo gros yin gyi chud ma du'i
3473(mdo sde): blo gros ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis blo gros yin gyis bdun gyi blo gros ma yin pa dang / snying rje chen po'i blo gros yin gyi sems can la rnams par 'tshe ba'i blo/
3474(mdo sde): gros ma yin pa ste/ rigs bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis blo gros kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa'i snang
3475(mdo sde): ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / dgongs te bstan pa rnams rtogs par khong du chud par
3476(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / sems can gyis bsam pa rnams rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag pa rigs pa'i shes pa rnams rtogs par khong du chud bar 'gyur
3477(mdo sde): ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / snrel zhi rgyud brtan pa rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur
3478(mdo sde): ba dang / spyi'u tshugs kyis rgyud bstan pa rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba ste// rig
3479(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rtogs pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go//
3480(mdo sde): brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams la las kyi bya ba la 'jug pa ston pas 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang thar pa 'dod pa rnams la shes rab kyi ston pa
3481(mdo sde): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / lam shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir sgribs med pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang 'dod pa dang srid pa dang / ma rigs pa dang lta ba'i
3482(mdo sde): zag pa mi slong ba'i phyir zag pa med pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / 'phags pa rnams kyi skyon med pa mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir 'das ma byas kyis chos kyi snang ba dang /
3483(mdo sde): blo bur gyis nyon mongs pa la shin tu rtogs pa'i phyir/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir rnams pa
3484(mdo sde): byang ba'i chos kyi snang ba dang / chos rnam shin du nye bar zhi ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos kyi snang ba ste// rigs kyis bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
3485(mdo sde): chos kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis shes pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// brgyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste brgya
3486(mdo sde): pa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i snang ba dang / dgra bcom
3487(mdo sde): pa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis shes pa'i snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
3488(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i snang ba ste/ rigs kyis bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
3489(mdo sde): bden pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bden pa bsgom pa gang gis skyon med par 'jug pa de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa bsgom
3490(mdo sde): ba gang gis 'bras bu dang po thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang / bden bsgom pa gang gis 'bras bu gnyis pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang / bden
3491(mdo sde): pa bsgom pa dag gis 'bras bu gsum pa thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa bsgom pa gang gis 'bras bu bzhi pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snga
3492(mdo sde): ba dang / bden bsgom pa gang gis sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa bsgom pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa rab tu
3493(mdo sde): ma thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa bsgom pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/
3494(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ste/ rigs kyis bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bden pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams//
3495(mdo sde): kyi mngon par shes pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lha'i migs gis gzugs thams cad yang dag par mthong ba'i gsal bI
3496(mdo sde): snang ba dang / lha'i rna bas sgra thams cad thos pa'i phyir nges par rtogs pa'i snang ba dang / mngon gyis gnas bskal pa grangs med pa rjes su dran pa'i phyir rjes
3497(mdo sde): dran pa'i snang ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems la lta ba'i phyir rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i snang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par rdzu
3498(mdo sde): 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i phyir// na mkha' sgrib pa med pa'i snang ba dang / zag pa med pa'i shes pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir shes pa'i snang ba dang /
3499(mdo sde): sems can thams cad nye bar 'tshe ba'i phyir gsod nams kyis tshegs kyi snang ba dang / sems can thams cad dogs pa gcod pa'i phyir ye shes kyis tshegs kyi snang
3500(mdo sde): ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrub pa'i snang ba ni/
3501(mdo sde): dgu po 'di gago/ dgu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sgrub pas ye shes rab kyi snang ba dang / sgrub pas blo'i snang ba dang / sgrub pas yang dag pa'i lta ba'i snang ba dang / sgrub
3502(mdo sde): pas zhig nas kyi snang ba dang / sgrub pas lhag mthong gi snang ba dang / sgrub pas sems can gyis bsam pa'i snang ba dang / sgrub pas 'khrugs pa med par sems rnaMrnas
3503(mdo sde): bar grol ba'i snang ba dang / sgrub po'i shin tu mthar thug pa'i snang ba ste rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrub pa'i snang ba ni dgu po 'di dag go// de nas btso/
3504(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigasu gcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// dran pa de dang yang dag 'dres pas na/ sngon cad las dge ba bsag pa chud mi bzod/ phra bar bsngo ba phun
3505(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa de/ phyi phyir zhing ni yang dag sgrub par byed/ thos pa'i chos rnams la ni brjod pa med/ rnam par gdon mi za ba myur du mthong / nye bar zhi bas yul rnam
3506(mdo sde): las ni sbas/ dran dang ldan pa mi dge rnams las bral/ dran pa rgya chen po 'di ni shin tu bsags/ bya ba bya ba dag ni rnams par byed/ dran pa dag dang ldan par rig nas
3507(mdo sde): ni/ rgyal ba rang byung dag gis byin gyis rlob/ dam pa'i chos kyis grong khyer skyong byed pa de ni 'gro ba rnams la chos ston nus/ shes rab ldan pa mun pa rnams bral te/ lha
3508(mdo sde): dang mi rnams kyis ni don kyang byed/ blo gros snang ba bzang ldan tho gyur nas/ dogs pa dang ni the tsom rnams kyang bcong drar dang ldan pa rang 'byung ye shes kyis/
3509(mdo sde): byang chub myur du rjes su rtogs par byed/ de ni don gyis blo gros can yin gyis tshigs 'bru'i rjesu mi sgyu la'ang min/ sems can dag pa ye shes
3510(mdo sde): blo gros can/ rnam par shes pa'i blo 'dod ma yin pa/ chos kyi blo gros ldan par 'gyur ba de/ nyon mongs blo gros sel cing gti mug bral/ shes rab dang ni thabs kyis
3511(mdo sde): tshul pa/ de ni rgyal ba'i byang chub 'gal med byed/ de ni sangs rgyas 'gyur ba'i blo gros ldan nyan thos 'gyur min rang rgyal 'gyur ba min/ rtag tu brlabs chen blo gros
3512(mdo sde): can yin gyis/ de ni blo gros chung ngu 'dod ma yin sangs rgyas blo gros rtag tu ldan yin gyi/ bdud kyis blo gros su ni 'gyur ma yin/ blo gros ldan pa snying rje cher gzhol
3513(mdo sde): gyis/ sems can gang la'ang rnam par 'tshe ba min/ chos 'ga' bstan pa gang yin de la ni the tsom med cing rtogs par khong du chud/ de ni dgongs te gsungs la 'khor
3514(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing / sems cad spyod pa rnams la rtogs dang ldan so sor yang dag rigs la rtogs ldan zhing de ye shes pa 'jug pa chags pa med/ rkyer 'byung byed pa po
3515(mdo sde): dang rnam bral bar rten pa'i chos rnams dag ni rab tu shes/ de ni snrel bzhi'i rgyud la 'khas gyur cing / spri'u tshugs tshul ni rtog par khong du chud/ sangs rgyas kyis ni chos
3516(mdo sde): rnams ji snyed pa thams cad kyang ni rtogs par khong du chud / 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi snang ba yis/ lha mi rnams kyi las kyi bya ba shes/ 'jig rten las ni 'das pa'i ye
3517(mdo sde): shes kyi// shes rab snang ba dang ni ldan pa yin kha na ma thob bcas pa dang ma thos med/ ye shes rab tu gsal ba chen po 'jugs/ lam ni shin tu bsgom par gyur
3518(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ rtag tu 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston to// zag par bcas dang zag pa med pa yin/ chos la de yi snang ba rab tu 'jug de ni zag pa thams cad spongs byed/
3519(mdo sde): cing / lha dang mi rnams kyis ni don kyang byed/ 'dus ma byas dang 'dus byas chos rnams la/ de yi shes pa rtag tu rab 'jug de na de yi dri bral bar rib med/ skyon sde
3520(mdo sde): thob nas spang ba rnams kyang spong / rnam par byang dang kun nas nyon mongs la de yi shes pa sgrib pa med pa 'jug/ rang bzhin gyis ni sems 'od gsal ba dang / kun na/
3521(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa yi chu la yang shos ji ltar mya ngan 'das par 'gyur ni/ skye ba med cing 'byung ba med par shes/ 'di 'dra 'di ni theg pa chen po la/ chos kyi snang ba mtha'
3522(mdo sde): yas gyur pa yin/ de ni brgyad pa yin ni shes pa dang rgyun du zhugs la 'jug pa dang / lan cig phyir 'og shes pa dang / phyir mi 'ong la shes pa 'jug pa dang / de ni dgra
3523(mdo sde): bcom pa dang rang rgyal dang / 'jig rten mgon po byang chub sems dpa' dag kun la de ye shes dang sgrub rnams lhag ma lus pa med par rab tu 'jug gang gis 'bras bu thob
3524(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang / 'khrugs med don dam nges par 'byung 'gyur ba// de la rab sgom smra ba dpa' bo rnams bden pa'i snang ba dag dang ldan pa yin/ bden pa dag ni sgom
3525(mdo sde): pa byas pas na/ skyon med 'jug dang 'bras bu dang po 'thob/ gnyis dang gsum dang de bzhin bzhi dang / rang rgyal rnams kyi 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ sgom/
3526(mdo sde): ba gang gi su ni smra ba'i rtags// de dag bzod pa dag ni thob 'gyur dang / gang gis rgyal ba byang chub 'tshang rgya ba bden pa de dag la ni snang bar 'gyur/ lha yi mig gi su ni de yis
3527(mdo sde): kyang / gzugs kyi rnam pa dag ni thams cad mthong / lha yi rna ba nges par rtogs pa yis/ phyogs bcu dag gis sgra rnams rtogs par 'gyur/ sngon gyi gnas shes pa mi
3528(mdo sde): snang ba yis/ bskal pa khrag khrig dag ni rje su dran/ 'od gsal ba ye shes pa'i snang ba yis/ gzhan gyi sems kyi spod pa rnams la mkhas/ rdzu 'phrul gyis ni shes kyi
3529(mdo sde): snang ba yis/ phyogs bcu'i zhing ni khrag khrig dag nam su 'gro// zag pa med pa'i shes pa'i snang ba ni nam mkha' dang ni 'tshungs shing 'dra ba yin/ bsod nams kyis ni snang
3530(mdo sde): ba mtha' yas pas pa'i mngon shes thob pa 'gro ba nyes par 'tshe/ de ye shes pa chags pa med pa yis/ 'gro ba'i dogs pa dag ni bcod par byed/ nan tan snying por byed
3531(mdo sde): pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ dran dang blo gros rtogs dang chos shes snang bden pa la ni snang ba mtha' yas te/ mngon par shes pa'i snang bar gyur/ pa yin sgrubs pas ye shes dang ni shes
3532(mdo sde): rab dang / rgya chen blo dang spobs pa mtha' yas dang / yang dag lba ba dang ni lhag mthong dang / shin tu 'khrugs pa med par mthar thug gyur/ snang ba shin tu rnam par dag pa
3533(mdo sde): brgyad / 'di dag mthu chen gang la yod pa ni/ re shig byang chub thob par kyang / de ni sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gzhan yang byang chub sems
3534(mdo sde): dpa' gzungs kyis dbang phyug gi rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams pa bcu drug gis/ sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i
3535(mdo sde): snying rje chen po ske'o// bcu drug gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni 'jig tshogs la lta bas bcing ba lta ba
3536(mdo sde): sna tshogs dang 'dres pa dag ste// lta ba thams cad spangs pa'i phyir de dag la chos bsten par bya'o// snyams du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen
3537(mdo sde): po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni yod pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log tu gyur nas/ mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes sdug bsngal la bde bar 'du shes bdag med
3538(mdo sde): ba la bdag tu 'du shes/ mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa dag ste/ de dag gis phyin ci log thams cad spangs pa'i phyir chos brtan par bya'o// snyam du sems can
3539(mdo sde): rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di ni ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga'ir 'dzin pa la gnas pa dngos po med pa la dngos por 'du
3540(mdo sde): shes pa dag ste/ de dag gi ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga'ir 'dzin pa spo ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o// snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye
3541(mdo sde): dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni sgrib pa lngas bsgribs te/ 'ad ba'i gzugs rngus zugs pa khong khrob med pa chugs pa dang / gnyis las chag
3542(mdo sde): pa dang dam pa ma yin pa la 'gyod pa kun nas langs pa/ zab mo chos rnams la nges pa ma thob pa dag ste/ de dag gi sgrib pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o//
3543(mdo sde): snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skyed pa dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni skye mched drug gis chags pas chags te/ mig gis
3544(mdo sde): gzugs mthong nas/ mtshan mar 'dzin cing mngon chag su 'dzin pa yin rna bas sgra thos snas dri bsnams lces ro myangs lus kyis reg bya rnams la regs/ yid kyi cho
3545(mdo sde): rnams rnam par shes nas mtshan mar 'dzin cing mngon rtags su 'dzin pa dag yin te/ de dag gi skyes mched drug gis chags pa spangs pa'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o snyam du so//
3546(mdo sde): can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni nga rgyal dang / lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i
3547(mdo sde): nga rgyal dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang / cung zad ces pa'i nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal gyis bcom pas chung ngu dag pas bdag parace'o snyam du bdag la rlom sems su/
3548(mdo sde): byed pa la 'chungs pa dag pas ni ches che ba dag pas kyang 'gasaches che'o snyams du bdag la rlom sems su byed pa/ gzugs la bdag du khas len pa nas/ rnam par shes
3549(mdo sde): pa'i bar la bdag tu khas len pa/ ma thob par bdag la thobs pa snyam du shes pa bdag cag ni 'phags pa'o snyam du bdag la sems dpa' logs pa'i lta bar mos bad/
3550(mdo sde): ste/ de dag gi nga rgyal rnams pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir/ chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skyes pa dang / kye ma
3551(mdo sde): sems can 'di dag ni lam ngan par zhugs nas 'phags pa'i lam dang bral ba dag ste/ de dag lam ngan pa spang / 'phags pa'i lam thob par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan pa
3552(mdo sde): bya'o// snyam du sems can rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni chung ma dang bu dang bu mo la yongasu zhen pas zhen/
3553(mdo sde): pa'i phyir sred pa'i kho la por sgyur nas/ rang dga' med pa rang dbang med pa dag ste de dag gang gis 'dod par 'gro bar rang dgar dbang yod par bye ba'i phyir chos bstan
3554(mdo sde): par bya'o// snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni phan tshun mi mthun pa khro ba dang zhe sdang dang /
3555(mdo sde): gnod sems mang ba dag ste/ de dag gis khro ba dang / zhe sdang dang / gnod sems pang ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems pa
3556(mdo sde): snying rje chen po skyes pa dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su 'dzin cing / dge ba'i shes gnyen dang bral nas/ sdig pa'i las byed pa
3557(mdo sde): ma rtog#dag ste/ de dag dge ba'i shes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par byed pa sdig pa'i las rnam par bzlogs pa'i phyir/ chos bstan par bya'o snyam
3558(mdo sde): du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni brkam pa chags pa'i zil gyis non pa ngoms mi myong ba 'phag
3559(mdo sde): pa'i shes rab dang bral ba dang ste/ de dag gis chags pa spangs pa dang / 'phags pa'i shes rab skyes pa'i phyir/ chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la
3560(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni las ma mthong ba chad pa dang rtag pa la gnas pa dag ste/ de dag rten cing 'brel bar
3561(mdo sde): 'byung ba zab mo'i las kyis bya ba la gzung ba'i phyir/ chos ston par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sos
3562(mdo sde): can 'di dag ni ma rigs pa dang / ti mug gis longs par gyur pa/ bdag dang / sems can dang srog dang / sob pa dang / gang zag du mngon par zhen pa dag ste de dag
3563(mdo sde): gis 'phags pa'i shes rab kyis mig rnam par dag pas bya ba dang / lba bar gyur pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir/ chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnam
3564(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba/ phung po lnga'i gshed mas zin pa dag ste/
3565(mdo sde): de dag khams gsum thams cad nas/ 'byung bar bya'i phyir chos bstan pa bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang /
3566(mdo sde): kye ma sems can 'di dag ni bdud zhi zhags pa'i bcings pa bcings pa g.yo ba dang / snyems pas kun tu dkris pa dag ste de dag gis g.yo ba dang snyems pa spang
3567(mdo sde): ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo
3568(mdo sde): bcad cing ngan 'gro'i sgo phye ba dag ste/ de dag la mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo dbye ba dang / ngan 'gro'i sgo bcod pa'i phyir/ chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can
3569(mdo sde): rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba ste// rigs kyi bu rnam pa bcu drug po 'di dag gis sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//
3570(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis las ma 'dres pa gsum bcu rtsa bzhi gnyis ste/ de dag la brtson na byang chub sems dpa' rnams leg par
3571(mdo sde): byed pa rnams yin no// sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste// sems can gti mug gi nyid kyis logs pa dang / bdag shes rab kyis sad par mthong nas/ shes
3572(mdo sde): rab kyis sems can rnams sad par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' las ma 'dres pa dang pa'o// sems can gang chung ngu la mos pa dang / bdag chen po la mos
3573(mdo sde): pa mthong nas theg pa chen po la sems can rnams yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can dag chos ma yin pa 'dod pa dang /
3574(mdo sde): bdag chos la gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams chos 'dod pa la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dga' 'tsho ba yongasu ma dag pa dang / bdag 'tsho ba yongs
3575(mdo sde): su dag par mthong nas sems can rnams 'tsho ba yongasu dag pa la sbyor ba dang / sems can dag lta bar byur bying ba dang / bdag yang dag pa'i lta ba la zhugs par mthong na
3576(mdo sde): sems can rnams 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag ma rig par gyur cing tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa bsags par
3577(mdo sde): mthong zhing bdag rig pa'i rjes su mthun zhing tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la gnas par rigs nas/ sems can rnams rig pa'i rjes su mthun zhing tshul bzhin yid la byed
3578(mdo sde): ba la gnas par rigs nas/ sems can rnams rig pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag log pa'i chos la
3579(mdo sde): gnas pa dang bdag yang dag pa'i chos la zhugs par mthong nas yang dag pa'i chos bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sems can dag/
3580(mdo sde): ser sna can du gyur te// kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang bdag 'dogs pa thams cad yongasu gtor bar mthong nas/ sems can rnams 'dog pa thams ca
3581(mdo sde): yongs su gtong ba la sbyor ba dang / sems can dag dang tshul ngan pa can du 'gyur te// sdom pa la mi gnas pa dang bdag tshul khrims yongasu dag par mthong nas/
3582(mdo sde): sems can rnams tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag gnod sems mang zhing khro ba'i shes ches pa dang / bdag bzod pa'i stobs dang /
3583(mdo sde): byams pa la gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams bzod pa'i stobs dang / byams pa la gnas pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can dag le lo can
3584(mdo sde): du gyur te// brtson 'grus chung ba dang / bdag le log med cing brtson 'grus brtsams par mthong nas sems can rnams brtson 'grus rtsom pa la sbyor ba dang / sems
3585(mdo sde): can dag sems g.yengs shing dran pa nyams pa dang bdag mnyam par bzhag ste/ bsam gtan byed par mthong nas/ sems can rnam sems migayengs pa dang / dran pa
3586(mdo sde): dang shes bzhin la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag 'tshal bar shes rab tu gyur te/ dman zhing gti mug dang ldan pa dang / bdag shes rab dang ldan zhing / gti mug
3587(mdo sde): dang gral bar mthong nas sems can rnam shes rab chen po dang / gti mug dang bral ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can dag rigs ma yin par lhung zhing yang bri
3588(mdo sde): byed pa brtsams pa dang / bdag thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yang dag pa'i lam brtsams mthong nas/ sems can rnams thabs mkhas pa dang yang dge pa'i brtsom pa
3589(mdo sde): yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can dag nyon mongs pas bcom zhing kun tu rtogs pa dang / rnam par rtogs pa dang / yongasu
3590(mdo sde): rtog pa'i spong yul par gyur pa dang bdag nyon mongs pa thams cad las log par mthong nas/ sems can rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad spongs pa la rab tu 'god
3591(mdo sde): pa dang / sems can dag 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i bcings pas bcings shing dmigs pa la rab tu gnas pa dang / bdag 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongasu shes pa dang //
3592(mdo sde): ldan zhing dmigs pa bcings pa las yongasu grol bar mthong nas sems can rnam 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongasu shes pa dang / dmigs pa dang bral ba la sbyor ba dang /
3593(mdo sde): sems can dag ma dul zhing ma sba ste/ byang ba ma yin pa dang / bdag dul zhing sbas te byang bar mthong nas/ sems can rnams dul ba dang sbas pa dang / byang ba la rab tu
3594(mdo sde): 'god pa// dang sems can dag byas pa mi gzo zhing byas pa mi shes te dge ba'i rtsa 'jom pa dang / bdag byas pa gzong zhing byas pa shes te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrung bar
3595(mdo sde): gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa shes pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chung mi gzon pa la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag chu bor lhung
3596(mdo sde): zhing sdig pa 'dod pa'i dbang du song ba dang / bdag chu bor thams cad la shin tu 'das par mthong nas sems can rnams bor thams cad las shin tu 'da' ba la
3597(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / sems can dag dka' blo mi 'de zhing mthun par 'dzin pa ma yin pa dang / bka' blo bde zhing mthun par 'dzin par mthong nas// sems can rnams bkan
3598(mdo sde): blo bde zhing mthun par 'dzin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang sems can dag phongs pa mang zhing dam pa ma yin pa la yongasu zhen dang / bdag pa ma 'ongs pa mang
3599(mdo sde): zhing dge ba bdud rtsi la gnas par mthong nas/ sems can rnams yongasu zhen pa dang / bral zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gnas par sbyor ba dang / sems can dbul zhing 'phags
3600(mdo sde): pa'i nor dang bral ba dang / bdag 'phags pa'i nor dang ma bral zhing nor bdun dang ldan par mthong nas sems can rnams 'phags pa'i nor thob par bya ba la rab tu
3601(mdo sde): 'god pa dang / sems can dag rtag tun zhing khams rnams pa bzhi po'i myur du gdug pa'i dug gyis zin pa dang / bdag nang med cing bde ba la 'gyur ba med pa mtho
3602(mdo sde): nas sems can rnams nad thams cad bong ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can dag mi shes pa'i mun pas kun tu btibs shing ye shes kyi snang ba
3603(mdo sde): thobs par mthong nas sems can rnams ye shes kyi snang ba chen po la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag khams gsum la chags pas chags shing rgyud lnga'i 'gro ba'i khor na
3604(mdo sde): 'khor lo'i rjes su 'jug par mthong zhing / bdag khams gsum yongasu shes pa la mkhas pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can dgagayon phyogs kyi
3605(mdo sde): lam du zhugs shing g.yas phyogs kyi lam dang bral ba dang / bdag yas phyogs kyis lam la gnas par mthong nas sems can rnam g.yas phyogs
3606(mdo sde): kyis lam la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag lus dang srog chags shing nyes pa mthong ba dang / bdag lus dang srogs la mi lta zhing nyes pa mthong ba yin par
3607(mdo sde): mthong nas/ sems can rnams lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / nyes pa mthong ba la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun
3608(mdo sde): dang bral ba dang / bdag dkon mchog gsum gyis rigs rgyun mi gcod par mthong nas sems can rnams dkon mchog gsum gyis rigs rgyun mi gcod pa la 'jud pa dang
3609(mdo sde): sems can rnams dam pa'i chos las nyams pa dang / bdag dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin par gnas pa mthong nas sems can rnams dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin la
3610(mdo sde): rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag ston pa rin po che dang ring du gnas shing rje su dran pa drug dang bral ba dang / bdag rje su dran pa drug ma btang bar mthong nas sems can
3611(mdo sde): rnams rjesu dran pa drug bsgoms pa la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs pa dang / bdag las dang nyon mongs pa dang bral
3612(mdo sde): bar mthong nas sems can rnam las dang nyon mongs pa dang bral ba la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag mi dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan zhing / dag pa'i chos thos
3613(mdo sde): cang dang ldan zhing / dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa dang / bdag mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs shing dge ba'i chos thams dang ldan par thong nas/ sems can rnas
3614(mdo sde): mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spongs pa dang dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa la rab tu 'god pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i las sum bcu
3615(mdo sde): rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yang dag phul yin te/ de dag la gnas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams legs par byed pa rnams yin no// /
3616(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa'i las mi chad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sems can rnams kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo ji snyed par byang chub ses
3617(mdo sde): dpa' rnam byang ba'i sgo yang dag par sgrub par bya ba yang de snyed do// rigs kyi bu gal te gang dag gang ga'i glugis bye ma snyed kyis 'jig sten gyis khams kyi sems kyi
3618(mdo sde): de dag thams cad nyan thos kyis theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis theg pa la rab tu gnas par gyur kyang / sems can de dag thams kyis las gang yin pa te// /
3619(mdo sde): sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi rgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro// stong gi cha dang / rgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya phrag stong gi chadang
3620(mdo sde): grangs dang / bgrang ba dang dpe' dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag ni rang gi rgyud kyi nyon mongs pa spangs par nye bar gnas/
3621(mdo sde): pa yin gyi byang chub sems dpa' dag ni sems can thams cad kyis nyon mongs pa spong bar nye bar gnas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar
3622(mdo sde): na sems can thams cad kyi las gang yin pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi las gang yin pa bas/ 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i las mnyi
3623(mdo sde): mchog ces brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na byis pa so so'i skye'o rnams kyis las ni phyin ci log dang ldan pa/ nyan thos dang sangs rgyas kyi las ni nye tshe ba dang ldan pa yi
3624(mdo sde): gyis byang chub sems dpa'i las ni phyin ci logs med cing ched med pa'i yon tan rtsom pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyu 'dis sems can thams cad dang nyan
3625(mdo sde): thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis non to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyis dbang phyug gi rgyal po tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab
3626(mdo sde): tu dga' ste dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/ rjesu yid rang nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di
3627(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba dang / byang chub sem
3628(mdo sde): dpa' snying rje chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i las la sgre bar gsungs pa de dag ni ngo mtshar to// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
3629(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yang bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sems can dag las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis thugs rje chen po
3630(mdo sde): 'jug de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po ni ji tsam rnam pa ni gang lags rtags ni gang lags/ mtshan ma ni gang lags gnas ni gang lags/ sangs
3631(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'phrin las ni ji ltar mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las ni ji tsam rnam pa ni gang lags/ mtshan ma ni gang lags/ gnas/
3632(mdo sde): ni gang lags/ de ni bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las rnams mngon gsum du bdag cag la
3633(mdo sde): legs par yang dag par shad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gis rgyal po/
3634(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyis khyod de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying chen po dang / de bzhi
3635(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i las la 'jug pa tsam cung zad cig khyod la bshad par bya'o// rigs kyi bu sems can rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam kyi snying
3636(mdo sde): rje chen po ni skyes pa yang med/ 'jigs pa yang med de zhes brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snying rje chen
3637(mdo sde): bo'i ni rtag tu 'jug pa'i phyir// de ni bskal bgrangs med par yongasu srung ba byas yang dag par bskyed ste/ sngogs pa yang me'o//
3638(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snying rje chen po ni ma btang ba sems can thams cad la gnas pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po de ni ji tsam
3639(mdo sde): du las yong su thob par bya bar slab pa yin pa de ma du tshad med/ de tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de tsam du mi bzad cing / de tsam du ring du song ba'o// de
3640(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar byang chub thob pa de bzhin lhar sems can rnams la snying rje chen po 'jugs go/ byang chub ci 'dra ba snying
3641(mdo sde): rje chen po yang de 'dra'o// de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub ji ltar thob ce na/ de bzhin gshegs pas rtsa ba med pa dang gnas med par byang chub thob bo// de
3642(mdo sde): la rtsa ba ni gang gnas ni gang gnas ni gang zhe na 'jig tshogs ni rtsa ba'o// yang dag pa ma yin pa yongasu brtag pa ni gnaso// de gnyis ni de bzhin gshegs
3643(mdo sde): bas byang chub dang mnyam pa gnyis kyis mnyam par yong su shes te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas rtsa ba med pa dang / gnas med par byang chub mngon pa
3644(mdo sde): rdzogs par sangs rgyas shes bya'o// sems can 'di dag gis ni rtsa ba med pa dang / gnas med pa'i chos 'di dag khong du chud bas de dag gis khong du chud pa/
3645(mdo sde): bya'o snyam du/ sems can rnam la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// rigs kyi bu byang chub ni zhi ba dang nye ba 'i ba'o// de la zhi ba ni gang nye bar zhi
3646(mdo sde): ba ni gang zhe na nang ni zhi ba'o// phyi ni nye bar zhi ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na mig ni bdag dang / bdag gis stong ste/ de ni de'i rang bzhin no// na ba dang / sna dang / lce dang /
3647(mdo sde): lus dang / yid ni bdag dang bdag gi stong ste de ni de'i rang bzhin no// mig stong par yongasu shes nas gzugs rnams la mi rgyug te/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o// /
3648(mdo sde): rna ba stong par yongasu shes nas/ sgra rnams la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o// sna stong par yongasu shes nas dri rnams la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar
3649(mdo sde): zhi ba zhes bya'o// lce stong par yongasu shes nas/ ro rnams la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o// lus stong par yongasu shes nas/ reg bya rnams la
3650(mdo sde): mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o// yid stong par yong su shes nas/ chos rnams la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o// sems can 'di
3651(mdo sde): ngag gis ni zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go//
3652(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir/ byang chub rang zhin 'od gsal bya'o// ci'i phyir rang bzhin 'od gsal ba zhes bya zhe na/ rang bzhin gang
3653(mdo sde): yin pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/ na mkha' dang 'tshungs pa na mkha'i rang bzhin na mkha' dang mnyam par gzhol ba/ na mkha'
3654(mdo sde): dang mnyam pas mnyam pa ste/ rang bzhin de ni shin tu 'ong gsal ba nyid do// byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis ni rang bzhin 'od gsal ba 'di khong du ma chud pas/
3655(mdo sde): blo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kun nas nyon mongs te/ rang bzhin 'od gsal ba de dag gi khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs
3656(mdo sde): ba'i snying po rje chen po 'jug go// rigs kyis bu byang chub ni blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa'o// de la blang ba med pa ni gang zhe na/ blang ba med pa zhes bya ba ni
3657(mdo sde): chos thams mi 'dzin pa'o// dor ba med pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad mi 'dor ba'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med par chu ror 'jug
3658(mdo sde): ba dang ji ltar de bzhin nyid la pha rol med pa dang / pha rol med pa ma yin par yang dag par rje su mi mthong ba de ltar rgal to// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
3659(mdo sde): chos thams cad pha rol med pa dang / pha rol dang / bral bar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// byis so so'i
3660(mdo sde): skye bo dag gis ni blang ba med dang / dor ba med pa 'di khong du chud ma chud pas/ de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o// snya ma du sems can rnam la/ de bzhin gshegs
3661(mdo sde): pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// rigs bu byang chub ni mtshan ma med pa dang dmigs pa med pa'o// de la mtshan ma de pa ni gang zhe na/ mig gis rnam par shes pa dmigasu med pa
3662(mdo sde): ni mtshan ma med pa'o// gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ni dmigs pa de ba'o// rna'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o// sgra gnyen
3663(mdo sde): du med pa ni dmig su med pa'o// sna'i rnams par shes pa dmig su med pa ni mtshan ma pa'o// dri snyam du med pa ni dmigs pa med pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa dmig
3664(mdo sde): su med pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o// ro myong du med pa ni dmigasu med pa'o// lus kyis rnams par shes pa dmigs su med pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o// regs bya reg byar
3665(mdo sde): med pa ni dmigs pa med pa'o// yid kyi rnams par shes pa dmig su med pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o// chos yang dag par rje su mi mthong ba ni dmigs pa med pa'o// /
3666(mdo sde): de ltar na mtshan ma med pa dang / dmigasu med pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yulo// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang zhe na/ gang khams gsum pa'i spyod
3667(mdo sde): yul ma yin pa de ni 'phags pa rnam kyi spyod yul lo// de ltar gang spyod yul ma yin pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo// 'phags pa'i spyod yul 'di
3668(mdo sde): byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis khong du chud pas/ de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go//
3669(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub ni 'das pa ma yin ma 'ongs pa ma yin da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ dus gsum mnyam pa 'khor gsum yongasu
3670(mdo sde): chad pa'o de la 'khor gsum yong su chad pa gang zhe na gang lags la sems mi 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa la rnam par shes pa mi rgyug dang / da ltar byung ba la yid la byed
3671(mdo sde): pa mi 'jugs pa'o// de sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa mi gas pas la rtogs par mi byed ma 'ongs pa la mi sems/ de ltar byung ba spros par mi byed do// /
3672(mdo sde): de ltar dus gsum ma nyams pa nyid dang / 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas/ de dag gi khong du chud par bya'o snya
3673(mdo sde): du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub ni lus med cing 'dus ma byas pa'o// de la lus med pa ni
3674(mdo sde): gang mig gi rnam par shes pas rnam par bya ba ma yin/ rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid kyis rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa'o// /
3675(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas shes bya ba ni gang la skyes pa med pa dang 'jig pa med pa dang / nas pa med pa ste de ni mtshan nyid gsum dang / bral ba'i 'dus ma byas shes bya'o// /
3676(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas ji ltar 'dus kyang de bzhin du khong du chud par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni med pa'o// med pa gang yin
3677(mdo sde): ba de la ni gnyis med do// lus med pa dang 'dus ma byas 'di byis pa so so'i skye bo dag gis khong du chung bas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnam
3678(mdo sde): la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po la 'jug go// rigs kyi bu byang chub ces bya ba de ni de byer med par gang da gnas so// de la gnas ni gang byer med pa ni
3679(mdo sde): gang zhe na de bzhin nyid ni gnas so// gnas med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// chos kyis dbyings ni gnas so// tha dad pa ma yin pa ni dbyer med pa'o// yang dag pa'i
3680(mdo sde): mtha' med ma nas so// g.yo ba med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// stong pa ni gnas so// gamigasu med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// mtshan ma med pa ni gnas so// rnam par rtog
3681(mdo sde): pa med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// smon pa med pa ni gnas so// smon lam 'debs med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// sems can med pa nyid ni gnaso// sems can ngo bo nyid
3682(mdo sde): med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// na mkha' ni gnaso// dmigasu med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// skyes pa med pa ni gnaso// 'gog pa med pa ni dbyer med pa'o 'das ma byas
3683(mdo sde): ni gnas so// rgyu ba med pa dbyer med pa'o// byang chub ni gnas so// nye bar zhi ba ni dbyer med pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa ni gnas so// mngon par grub pa
3684(mdo sde): med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// de ltar dbyer med pa dang / gnas 'di sems can rnam kyis khong du chud pas/ de dag gis khong du chud pa'o snyams du sems can
3685(mdo sde): rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// rigs kyi bu byang chub ni lus kyis kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi
3686(mdo sde): brgya'o// sems kyis kyang ma yin no// de'i phyi'i zhe na/ lus ni blun po'o sems ni sgyu ma lta bu// gang lus dang sems 'di lta bur khong du chud par de ni tha
3687(mdo sde): skad btags nas byang chub ces bya ba'i byang chub ni lus ma sems sam/ chos sam/ chos ma yin pa 'am yang dag pa 'am/ yang dag pa ma yin pa 'am/
3688(mdo sde): bden pa 'am/ brdzun pa gang gis kyang brjod par bya ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub chos thams cad kyis brjod par bya ba ma yin no// byang chub la ni/
3689(mdo sde): gang gi tshig du tha snyed bdag par 'gyur ba'i dbyibs ci yang med de/ ji ltar na mkha' dbyings med cing bzod par bya ba ma yin pa de bzhin du byang chub kyang dbyings
3690(mdo sde): med cing brjod par bya ba ma yin no// de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongasu 'tshal nas/ chos thams cad ni brjod par bya ba ma yin pa ste/ chos la tshigs me/
3691(mdo sde): ngo // tshigs la yang chos med do// chos kyis tshul gyi rnams pa 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud bar bya'o snyams du sem
3692(mdo sde): can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// rigs kyi bu byang chub ni bzung du med pa dang gzhi med pa'o// de la gzung du med pa ni gang zhe na/
3693(mdo sde): sna yis su med pa ni gni med pa'o//
3694(mdo sde): mig yongs su shes pa ni bzung du med pa'o// gzugs dmigasu med pa ni gzhi med pa'o// rna ba yongs su shes pa ni gzhi med pa'o// sna yongs su shes
3695(mdo sde): ni gzung du med pa'o dri dmigs su med pa ni bzhi med pa'o lce yongs su shes shes pa ni gzung du med pa'o// ro dmigs su med pa ni gzhi med pa'o// lus yongs
3696(mdo sde): su shes pa ni gzung du med pa'o// reg bya dmigs su med pa ni bzhi med pa'o// yid yongs su shes pa ni gzung du med pa'o// chos dmigs su med pa ni gzhi rtse
3697(mdo sde): pa'o// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub gzung du med pa dang gzhi med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang
3698(mdo sde): mig gzung du med gzugs bzhi ma yin/ rnam par shes pa gnas sha med do// rna ba gzung du med sgra gzhi ma yin/ rnam par shes pa gnas med do// sna gzung du me/
3699(mdo sde): dri gzhi ma yin/ rnam par shes pa gnas med do// lce gzung du med/ ro bzhi ma yin rnam par shes pa gnas med do// lus gzung du med reg bya gzhi ma yin rnam
3700(mdo sde): par shes pa gnas med do// yid gzung du med chos gzhi ma yin rnam par shes pa gnas med do// de rnams par shes pa gnas med pas sems can thams cad
3701(mdo sde): sems kyis gnas rnam par tu shes so// sems can de dag gis sems kyis gnas rnams gang zhe na sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas ni bzhi po 'di dag go//
3702(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe 'di lta ste/ gzugs sems can rnams kyi sems kyi sems nas dang tsher ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byas dag/ sems/
3703(mdo sde): can rnams kyi gnas te sems kyi gnas te sems can rnams kyi de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas gnas med par mkhyen to// gnas med pa'i mtha' 'di sesaM
3704(mdo sde): can rnams kyi khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du ses rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen 'o drug go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub ces
3705(mdo sde): bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi tshigs bla dag so// stong pa nyid gang gis byang chub stong pa nyid des chos thams cad stong ngo // stong pa nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du/ chos de
3706(mdo sde): dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yin no// de ni 'di lta ste/
3707(mdo sde): spong ba nyid dang / byang chub ces bya ba tshul gcig par shes pa ste/ de la gnyis gang gi stong pa nyid dang dang / byang chub gnyis su dbye ba'i gnyis chung zad kyang med do// /
3708(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni gnyis su med pa gnyis su dbyer med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa midang med pa/ mtshan ma med pa skye rgyu ba med pa rab tu rgyu ba med
3709(mdo sde): pa kun tu 'byung ba med pa'o// gang stong pa zhes byas pa de ni mngon par med cing / 'dzin pa med pa'i tshigs bla dag so/ 'di la don dam par gang stong pa zhes bya/
3710(mdo sde): ba'i chos gang yang migasu med kyang stong pa zhes kyang brjod do// ji ltar na mkha' zhes kyang brjod/ na mkha' brjod par bya ba ma yin pa de bzhin du stong pa la stong pa zhes
3711(mdo sde): brjod kyang / stong pa ni brjod par bya ba ma yin no// 'di lta ste ming med pa la ming du tha snyed 'dogs pa de ni chos thams cad 'jug pa'o// ming de yang yul na
3712(mdo sde): gnas pa ma yin/ phyogs nas pa ma yin no// ji ltar ming yul na gnas pa yin/ phyogs na gnas pa ma yin pa de bzhin du ming gang gis chos gang brjod pa'i chos
3713(mdo sde): de yang yul na gnas pa ma yin/ phyogs na gnas pa ma yin no// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos de dag thams cad mkhyen te/ bzod ma nas ma skyes pa
