5095(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bden pa gsungs/ bden pa'i chos la rab tu gnas
5096(mdo sde): byin gyi rlabs gyis rab de dag la/ mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis rlabs/ snying rje chen po go cha gos byams pa chen la rab tu gnas/ kun la byams pa nyid kyi phyir/
5097(mdo sde): mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis rlabs/ bsod nams tshogs ni bun sum tshogs/ ye shes tshegs ni byang gyur pa/ tshogs rnams kun dang ldan pa yin/ mdo sde
5098(mdo sde): 'di ni byin gyi brlabs/ bdud rnams thams cad nges 'jom la/ smra ba thams cad rab 'dul zhing / lta ba thams cad rgyan spong pa/ mdo sde 'di ni byin
5099(mdo sde): brlabs kyis/ 'jig sten skyong dang rgya byin dang / de bzhin lha ma yin rnams dang / lha dang dri za klu dag dang / ngas ni byin gyis rlabs pa byas/ se dang de bzhin
5100(mdo sde): bar snang la/ lha rnams mang po gang mkhod pa/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin brlabs kyi tshul 'di nib tu 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'khor 'di bsrung bar bya ba'i
5101(mdo sde): byir/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa rnams ldan zhing / bden pa bzhi yis brgyar gyur pa/ mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis brlabs/ na mkha' gzugs can byed pa srid / gzugs ni/
5102(mdo sde): gzugs med bye srid kyis/ sangs rgyas rnams ni byin brlabs ni/ rnams par bkrugs par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
5103(mdo sde): rgyal po bzhi po dag gis mgrin gcig du tshigs su bcas pa 'di gnyis gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pas dag cag rnams/ mdo sde 'di kun srung slang du/ rtsa rlag dang
5104(mdo sde): ni bcas rnams kyis/ bsrung ba bzang po bgyi bar 'tshal/ mkhas pa byang chub blo gros bgyis/ gang dag 'dzin par bgying pa dang / de dag la ni phyogs bzhi nas/
5105(mdo sde): rtag par kun tu bsrungs par bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyis dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gnyis gsol to// bdag ni
5106(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'dzin pa gtso// 'dren pa chos kyi dbang dag lags/ mgon po mdo sde mchog 'di la/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab tu bstan/ sangs rgyas rnams ni thams
5107(mdo sde): cad kyi/ mdzad pa bzo ba bsrung bgyid cing / 'di 'dri'i mdo dang de bzhin du/ mdo sde 'dzin pa bsrung bar 'tshal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la mi 'jed kyis bdag
5108(mdo sde): bo tshangs pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to// bsam tan gang dang tshad med dang / theg pa kun gyis 'byung ba gang / de dag mdo ldan zab mo yis/ mdo sde
5109(mdo sde): 'di las nges par 'byung bdag tshangs pa'i bde bor te/ gang na tshul 'di 'chad par bgyi/ mnyan pa'i slad du dang de bzhin du/ srung ba'i slad du 'chis par bgyi/ de na/
5110(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu rab dga' ldan gyi su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to// gang zhig sangs rgyas gsungs pa yi/ mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin 'gyur ba/ skye ba
5111(mdo sde): gcig gis rab gnas pa/ dga' ldan rnamasu gnas par 'gyur/ mgon po dag ni lha yul pa'i phun sum tshogs pa bor nas su/ tshul 'di rab tu ston bgyis cing / 'dza
5112(mdo sde): bu gling du gnas par spro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bdud kyi bu ded dpon chen po'i tshigasu bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to// gang zhig don dang ldan pa yi/ mdo sde 'di
5113(mdo sde): ni 'ji 'gyur ba/ de dag bdud las 'di spangs pa/ bdud kyis dbang du mi mchi sa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag kyang ni/ mdo 'di kun du bsrung slad du ci nas kyang
5114(mdo sde): ni rgyas 'gyur bar/ brtson 'grus dang ni mos par bgyid de nas bcom ldan 'das la bdud sdig can gyis tshigs su bcas pa 'di gnyis gsol to// rnam par 'dren
5115(mdo sde): pa gang zhig ni nyon mongs thams cad tshar bcod pa/ 'di 'dzin bgyid pa de dag la/ bAg ni sgrub par mi bgyid do// mdo sde mchog ni rab 'byung bar/ bdud kyi go skabs ma mchis//
5116(mdo sde): mgon pos gsungs pa dran bgyid pa/ de la bsrungs pa bgyi bar 'tshal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu mtshams rab kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di gastsol to// sangs
5117(mdo sde): rgyas kun gyis byang chub ni mdo sde 'di las rab bshad pas/ gang zhig mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa/ des ni sangs rgyas kun la mchod mgon po bdag ni mdo sde 'di/ lha ni bye/
5118(mdo sde): ba rnam la bshad/ gang dag gus par nyan pa dag/ byang chub yang dag 'dzin du stsal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' bya
5119(mdo sde): pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to// mi gang byang chub rab zhugs te/ dam chos yongasu bsrung slad du/ bdag kyang stong bgyid de dag ni gsol ba me btab shes
5120(mdo sde): nyen lags/ bdag ni dga' ldan ma mchis nas su/ sangs rgyas kyis ni byin brlabs kyis/ shin tu rgyas par bgyi bar 'tshal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
5121(mdo sde): pa 'od srung chen pos tshig su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to// ston pa las ni bdag gisu mdo sde stong phrag mang pos kyang / bdag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu/ sngon cad nas
5122(mdo sde): yang ma thos so// mngon gsum du ni mdo sde 'di/ blangs shing kun tu gzungs lags te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ched du ni/ shin tu rgyas par bgyi bar bgyi bar 'tshal/
5123(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang / lha'i bu de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag
5124(mdo sde): la legs so// zhes bya ba gnang ste/ skyes bu dam pa dag khyod kyis dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung ba'i phyir 'di lta bu'i seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa legs so legs so//
5125(mdo sde): khyed mos par bya'o// khyed khong du chud par bya'o// sems can gang dag theg pa chen po la zhugs pa/ bzod pa ma thob pa de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnas
5126(mdo sde): kyis byin gyis rlobs kyis chos kyi rnams grangs 'di kun tu bzungs ste bzung nas kyang kun chub par byed nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stan
5127(mdo sde): pa ma thob kyi bar du/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dun pa las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro// gang dag nyan thos kyis theg pa bar 'gyur ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa byam pa'i
5128(mdo sde): nyan thos 'dus pa dang po'i grangs su chud par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyis theg pa gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag ning / yongs su mya ngan
5129(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i 'og tu gzhan las ma thos par rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos yongasu zhus pa btan pa'i chos rnam grangs 'di btso
5130(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bstan pa na sems can dpag tu med pa dag byang chub sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa ni phyir mi ldogs pa la rab tu gnas so//
5131(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag ni rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// snang ba chen pos kyang gsal bar 'gyur ro// me tog gsil mas gtor bar gyur to// phyogs
5132(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyis khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir thams cad
5133(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gis rnam par bkram par byas te/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// bcom ldan 'das
5134(mdo sde): bdag cag gis rnyed par bgyi ba legs par rnyed do// gang gi slad du bdag gis rnam par nges pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu thos pas
5135(mdo sde): bdag 'dir mchis pa ma lags so// kye ma bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i skra tshe yongs su bskang du gsol/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la chos kyi rnam grangs
5136(mdo sde): 'di yun ring du gnas par gyur cig/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge snyan ma gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu'i 'dzin pa de dag kyang yun ring por
5137(mdo sde): yun du tshe yongasu skyong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad la yang phan pa byed par gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyis debang
5138(mdo sde): phyug gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan 'das ci tsam du rnam par nges pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di don bzang po dang / tshigs 'bru bzang po
5139(mdo sde): dang / legs par brgyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchog tu dga' ba skyes pa dang / bdud dang pha rol rgol ba thams cad 'jom pa dang / chos thams
5140(mdo sde): la mkhas pa 'dzin pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis bsam pa tshim par bgyid pa dang / theg pa thams cad nges par 'byung ba'i phyir 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
5141(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyis yon tan la 'jug pa'i rjes su so ba dang / thams cad kyis rtsom par bgyi ba la gti mug ma mchis par bstan pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das
5142(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug
5143(mdo sde): kyi rgyal po la bka' bstsal to// de'i phyir gzungs kyi/ dbang phyug gi rgyal po khyod kyis chos kyis rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bstan pa zhes bya
5144(mdo sde): bar bzung shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i las don yod pa nyan pa lung bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems
5145(mdo sde): dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang nyan thos kyis tshogs de dag thams cad dang ldan pa'i lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i
5146(mdo sde): 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yid rang ste/ mngon par dga'o// 'phags pa de zhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bstan pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// /
5147(mdo sde): / sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i lo grangs dang / rgya gar gyis lugs la brtsod pa'i dus/ thog ma ci cim na byung ba dang / lo
5148(mdo sde): du lon pa'i gtan tshigs thos pa mang po mkhan po 'dzin mi tra'i gtam rgyud las 'byung ba/ yul btan 'byung gnas lo nyis stong lon/ gnyis rtsal nyis brgya sum bcu gcig/
5149(mdo sde): rje 'bangs nyis brgya nyi shu bzhi pa la gnas brgyad brgya bcwa bcu bzhi/ go ba'i nyis brgya nyis brgya bzhi bcu gnyis zhes 'byung ste/ yul dbus na sgra mi snyan pa'i rgyal po yum
5150(mdo sde): 'khor srung gi sras mched brgya'i gcen/ rgyal po 'thab par dga' ba zhes bya ba tsas pa'i nub mo rtsod pa'i mgo zug go// rgyal po thab par dga' ba'i
5151(mdo sde): sgra zla/ rgyal po skye seng ge sras mched lnga'i gcen/ rgyal po yul btan zhes pas lo tshigs bcos nas/ lo nyis stong gi bar du lo tshigs 'chos nus pa ma byung ngo // de nas
5152(mdo sde): lo nyis stong gi 'jug tu/ de'i skabs su sang+yas shAkya thub pa byung ngo // sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu so sum bcu lon pa na/ rgyal po dga' byed byung ngo // zhes
5153(mdo sde): mkhan po skal ba can gyi bstan chos rtogs pa 'bar ba'i gzhung las byung ste/ rgyal po des lo tshigs bcos nas/ lo brgyad brgya lon pa'i 'og tu rgyal po nyi ma'i rtsal zhes/
5154(mdo sde): bya ba byung ste// rgyal po des lo tshigs bcos nas/ lo nyis brgya sum bcu rtsa gcig lon pa'i 'og tu/ rgyal po rje 'bangs zhes bya ba byung ste/ rgyal po des lo tshigs bcos
5155(mdo sde): nas/ lo bdun brgya nyi shu bzhi lon/ de nas bal pos longs de'i 'phro nas bzung ste/ lo brgyad brgya brtsa bcu lon pa'i 'og tu/ bal rje 'od zer gyi go zhes bya ba byung ste/
5156(mdo sde): des lo tshigs bcos nas lo brgya bzhi bcu rtsa gsum lon pa na/ bag gi lo la bcan po khri gtsug sde btsan gyi pho brang dbyar sa zus phug mog nan bzhugs ste/ lo tshigs de
5157(mdo sde): phan chad sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa tshun chud lo grangs spyir bsdoms na/ lo nyis stong dgu brgya bzhi bcu dag lon de/ de slan chad kyang 'di bzhin bod kyi lo grangs du lho
5158(mdo sde): pa snga mi'i steng du bsnan la/ ci shing gtam du gzhag go de bcod pa'i dus kyis mgo zug ces bya ba ni/ sngon chad gnas smi yongs gzhung drang / khong dge 'dor chen mya ngan nyon
5159(mdo sde): tshe nga mi byed pa las/ rgyal po yul 'khor bsrung gyis ring la/ khang khyim nyo tshong byas te/ gcig gis ni khyim brtsongs/ gcig gis ni nyos las/ khyim 'tsheng ba na re/ da
5160(mdo sde): khyod nga'i khyim du 'pho ci nyes byas pa dang / nyos pa na re da dung khyod kyis rdzas rnams gung du mkhyer bas/ bdag ma 'phos so zhes zer ro// de nas 'tshong 'tshong ba na re/
5161(mdo sde): khyod kyis bdag gi khyim nyos na khyim brdzas kyang de'i rkyen du khyod dbang bas nas/ bdag mi 'tshal lo zhes zer/ de nas khyim nyo ba na re/ bdag gi khyim nyi tshe nyos par za
5162(mdo sde): kyin khyod kyis khyim rdzas rnams bdag mi dbang bas mi 'tshal lo zhes zer ro// de nas mi de gnyis so sor gyes nas/ de'i nub mo so so khyim du nyal te bsams na/
5163(mdo sde): dang pos sems bzang po las gyur te/ ngan g.yo dang 'dod chen gyi sems ngan pa byung te/ nyo ba pa'i mis bsam na ma la bdag gis khyim nyos pas/ na rdzas thams cad
5164(mdo sde): bdag dbang ngo zhes zer ba bden gyis bdag bkur ro snyam mo// mchong bas bsams na ma las bdag gis khyim btsongs par zad kyi/ khyim rjes rnams bdag
5165(mdo sde): dbang ba bden gyis bdag kur ro snyam mo// de nas phyi de nyin par so so nas khyim brdzas de dgas bkur ro zhes zer te/ gnyis ga brtsod par gyur to// de nas
5166(mdo sde): rgyal po yul 'khor srung gi spyan sngar shags bgyi ba las/ rgyal po yang 'dod kyi bsam pa ngan pa byung ste/ ma la 'di gnyis khyim brdzas
5167(mdo sde): brjod pas/ gnyis la sprin du mi rung gis khyim brdzas thams cad ngas bkur ro snyam par bsams te de ltar khyim bdag de gnyis bsams pa ngan pa byung ba'i nub mo// rgyal
5168(mdo sde): po yul 'khor srung gi sras thub par dga' bar dga' ba btsas na/ de'i nub mo bcod pa'i mgo zug ces bya'o// de la lo tshig bcos zhes bya ba ni/ rgya gar lugs bod
5169(mdo sde): dang rgya ltar lo sgor bcu gnyis kyis brtsi ba med do// sngon gyis sho btang ba'i lo tshigs zhig las/ lo gcig gnyis zhes lo du mi'i bar du rtsig cing bgrang ste/ phyis
5170(mdo sde): rgyal po bsod nams dang grags pa 'dod pa yangs shing gtong phod pa la dga' ba zhig gis bka' sho chen po btang te/ bdag gis rigs su rtogs so cog gi bu
5171(mdo sde): lan chags nyes thams cad rgyal po'i bkor gyis bsabs nas bu lon dang khrin ci yang med par byas pa'i 'og tu/ mi yongs kyi zod du spyod pa/ dong tshe dang ba ni
5172(mdo sde): la stsogs pa sngon gyi rgyal po shong gtong ba'i mtshan rtags yod pa rnam bor nas/ de phyin chad dong tshe dang / pa ne bdago ge mtshan rtags kyi btab ste/ mi yongs kyi zong
5173(mdo sde): du bcug nas sngon gyi lo tshigs grangs pa'i 'phro yang mi gnas par bor te/ shos btab pa'i lo tshigs de nas bzung nas/ sdong lo 'go btsugs nas/ rgyal po byis shos
5174(mdo sde): gtong nus pa ma byang gi bar du lo gcig lo gnyis zhes thug thug gi bar du brtsog cing bgrang bas na/ lo tshigs bcos zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa lo lnga brgya
5175(mdo sde): phrag bcur gnas zhes bya ba'i rim pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tika las 'byung ba lnga brgya tha ma zhes bya ba ni/ brgya phrag lnga bcu pa la lnga brgya zhes bya'o// de
5176(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i dus ni/ lo lnga stong zhes gsungaso// lo lnga stong la lo lnga brgya'i dbang du byas te/ byed byed du bcad na lnga brgya phrag bcur
5177(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// de la dus bcu ste/ 'bras bu'i dus dang / bsgrub pa'i dus dang / lung gi dus de gsum mo// de la 'bras bu'i dus la gsum ste/ dgra bcom pa'i dus dang /
5178(mdo sde): phyir mi 'ong ba'i dus dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i dus so// bsgrub pa'i dus la yang rnam pa gsum dbye ste/ lhag mthong gi dus dang / ti nge 'dzin gyi dus dang / tshul
5179(mdo sde): khrims kyi dus so// lung gi dus la yang rnam pa gsum sre/ chos mngon pa'i sde snod dang / me de'i snod dang / 'dul ba'i sngo bsdod de dag dang / rtags tsam gyi dras
5180(mdo sde): dang bcur 'gyur ro// de la dus re re la yang lnga brgya lnga brgya 'gor ste/ de ltar dus bcu po dag gi lo lnga brgya phrag bcu lnga stong du 'gyur ro// de la lnga brgya thams/
5181(mdo sde): cad kyi dang po dgra bcom pa'i dus la lo lnga brgya gnyis pa phyir mi 'ong ba'i dus la lo lnga brgya/ gsum pa rgyud du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i dus la lo lnga brgya/ bzhi pa
5182(mdo sde): / lhag mthong gi dus lnga brgya lnga pa ti nge 'dzin gyi dus la lo lnga brgya/ drug pa tshul khrims kyi dus la lo lnga brgya bdun po chos mngon pa'i dus
5183(mdo sde): la lo lnga brgya/ brgyad pa mdo sde'i dus la lo lnga brgya/ dgu pa 'dul ba'i dus la lo lnga brgya/ bcu rtags tsam gyi dus la lo lnga brgya ste/ rtags tsam gyi dus 'di nyid
5184(mdo sde): la lnga brgya tha ma zhes bya'o// mdo kha cig las lnga brgya tha ma zhes bya ba ni/ bstan pa lo lnga stong 'jig rten na gnas pa la/ lo stong lnga brgya phrag gnyis 'byung ba'i lnga brgya
5185(mdo sde): phyi ma la lnga brgya tha ma zhes bshang ba ni dgongs pa gzhan du sbyar ro// sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ri kha rdo rdeg gi sdeng na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe phyogs
5186(mdo sde): bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor dang bcas pa dang dgra bcom pa dang lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang
5187(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po dang / na mkha' lding dang bdad sdig can la sogs pa mthu bo che thams cad 'tshogs pa'i dus na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhal kyi sgo dang / smin mtshas
5188(mdo sde): nas 'od zer shar gyi lus 'phags dang / lho'i 'dzem bu gling dang chu nub kyi ba kla nga spyod dang byang gi sgra mi snyan dang gling bzhir 'od zer kun tu khyab par bkram ste/ 'od
5189(mdo sde): zer btang bde'i tshe ri me ro 'bar ba la sogs pa ri chad po dang / ri dang nags tshal dang / sman ljongs su la grag grogs kun la yang snang bar mnyam ste/ lag 'thi
5190(mdo sde): dang 'dra bar gling bzhir snang ba gsal bar 'gyur/ 'od zer de dag las sangs rgyas phal po che'i sku gzugs kha dog dang / dbyibs sna tshogs dang bcas pa phal
5191(mdo sde): po bye byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha klu la sogs pa/ sems can kun gyis mthong ste ngo mtshar du gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
5192(mdo sde): la be sha ra ma na la sogs pa rgyal po chen po bzhi sa gsol ba/ 'od zer 'di lta bu'i don mdzad pa lags/ zhes zhus pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'
5193(mdo sde): stsal pa/ nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ gling bzhi rang sa bsrung ba'i dam pa'i chos gsung rab dang ring srel dang gzugs brlan 'di lta bu dag 'byung ste/
5194(mdo sde): 'di khyod kyi lags tu gtad do// srungs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i snying pos zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i
5195(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul chen pos bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og du dam pa'i chos rgyal po la btang ba thugs rje che'o lnga ma 'das pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan las
5196(mdo sde): 'das nas/ dgu bdun lags nas dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan nub na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dam pa'i chos ci tsam
5197(mdo sde): gyis bar du gnas par 'gyur de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba 'di lta bu'i the rtsom zhus pa leg so leg so// nyon cig dang ngas bshad do//
5198(mdo sde): da mya ngan las 'das nas/ dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan gang zag gi shes pa'i rgyud la lo nyis stong du gnas par 'gyur ro//
5199(mdo sde): de nas gang zag gi shes pa'i rgyud la nub po// sum stong du chos gnas/ spyir lnga stong gnas pa la nyis steng bka' nub nas zad kyi don du spyod cing 'dzin
5200(mdo sde): pa ni nyung zhing nub pa de nas byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos 'di tha mar ji ltar nub par 'gyur/ rgyu cis mchis
5201(mdo sde): sus ma mchis par bgyis bka' stsal pa/ da mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ lo brgya'i bar du nga'i stan pa spyod pa'i sems can rnams la/ rnam par grol ba
5202(mdo sde): mang du 'gyur de ni sa lo lnga brgya'i bar tu ting nge 'dzin spyod pa mang du 'gyur rgyal po dang / sems can dam pa'i chos la dang cing spong ba yang nyung ngu 'gyuraro// de nas
5203(mdo sde): lo lnga brgya'i bar du dam pa'i chos ston cing / 'dren po dang thar par byed pa'i slob dpon mang du 'byung ngo // nyan thos dgra bcom pa ni nyung du 'gyur ro// rgyal/
5204(mdo sde): bo sems can phal gyis rnams kyang nyan pa tsam du zad kyi/ nyams len cing spyod pa 'am brtson 'grus ni mi phyed dang ba 'bri bas 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos
5205(mdo sde): kyi srung ma rnam kyang mi dga' 'ar 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos la ma dad pa rnams ni sngon pas mthu stobs skyes so// 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi'i rgyal po rnams
5206(mdo sde): kyang phan tshun gcig la gcig/ dmag 'dren cing 'khrug par 'gyur ro// de nas yang lo lnga brgya'i tshe/ lo gsum brgya'i dam pa'i chos spong ba'i lha klu laso//
5207(mdo sde): pa/ sems can srungs ma rnams ma'i mi gnas shing sems can chos la ma dang bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ sems can chos spyod rnams kyang chos kyis gzhung
5208(mdo sde): bzhin mi spong brtson 'gros chung bas 'grub nyung bar 'gyur/ kha dog bzhi dang bzhi las gyur pa yang dri rol sogs pa yang chung bar 'gyu ro// mi nad dang byu/
5209(mdo sde): nad dang mug yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lo nyes bgyi la dge slong yang chos bzhin mi spong 'jig rten gyi khyed dang grags po tshol snying rje tshul khrim la mi gnas
5210(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos ma nor bar spyod pa la ni 'gran zhing skur pa 'debs long spyod yo byad 'phro 'jig rten gyis rgyal po'i gsang la rten cing rgyal srid 'dzin/ rgyal po'i
5211(mdo sde): 'phrin la 'gro zhing dben byed nyo tshong dang khe spogs byeng tha'as tshel dam pa'i chos spong ba yang snying nas ni nyam su blangs te mi byin gyi phal cher kha gsags dang //
5212(mdo sde): 'bral gyi tshul 'chos ya ma bla byed/ de'i dus na chos la dga' ba'i lha thams cad kyi dge slong 'di ltar spyod pa'i sa bzhi bor te mi gnas shing bdud kyi sa la
5213(mdo sde): la sogs pa chos kyi dbyigs nges 'byung ste/ mthu dang stobs skye bar 'gyur/ rgyal po dang / blon ze ze la sogs pa dang ba 'dri/ dge sdig gi mtshams mi zin
5214(mdo sde): ha dam pa'i chos la rma byin dkon mchog gi dkor dang dge 'dun gyi rjes la dku 'phrog byed sdig la mi 'dzem/ gzugs brnyen dang
5215(mdo sde): mched rten rnams khang kyis shig/ mchod pa'i yo byad bri de'i tshe dam pa'i chos ma nor bar spyod pa/ dge slong dang khyim dga' dga' tsam gnas pa de'i bsod nams kyi
5216(mdo sde): yul phyogs su kha char dus dus su bab cing log logs mi nad dang byugs nad nyid zhing yul bde ba dag kyang yod do// 'di ltar bu mi gnas po phal cher
5217(mdo sde): ni sdug bsngal mi bde ba sna tshogs 'byung de'i dus na/ rgya gar dang rgya ma yin pa rgyal po chen po gsum 'byung ste/ gsum la ya rta na dang ba dang shi kun na 'di
5218(mdo sde): gsum dam pa'i chos mi spyod/ dmago 'dren cing 'thab rtsod nub dang bya dgi yul khams mang po zhig du med par byes/ yul khams de'i mchod rten dang gtsug
5219(mdo sde): lag khang gshig med dang / mchod pa'i yo byad dang makon rtog gi dkor la sogs pa phrogs bcom rgyal po 'di dag gi gcig la gcig gnod pa sna tshogs kyi 'tham
5220(mdo sde): mo byed do// gsum char gyi rgyal srid mi bde bar 'gyur de nas rgyal po 'di sum 'jal du me ste/ sring gcig du byas dmag mang po 'dus nas rgya gar gyi yul
5221(mdo sde): dga' dga' che rol dga' da ra dang / ma ha de sha la sogs pa'i yul phyogs nas bzung de'i dus na dga' phyi rol lho phyogs na/ ke'u sha phyi'i yul na rgyal
5222(mdo sde): po me te sa ne zhe bya ba de la bu zhig byung ba de'i na dus spangs zhes bya ba zhig 'byung ste smin mtsham na lcags kyi sme ba yod pa/ gru mo man chad khrag gi skas pa zhig
5223(mdo sde): 'byung / de dang dus gcig du blon po lnga brgya/ bu lnga brgya 'byung ba yang rig la lag pa khrig ma man chad khrag du byung de dang dus gcig tu rgyal po de la te'u
5224(mdo sde): smras shes gcig 'byung ste/ de'i nub mo rnams la khrag gi char bab nas/ rgyal po nam lta se nas/ drang srong gi mkhan po lnga mngon par shes pa zhig la gdag cag
5225(mdo sde): gi la bor gi bu dang rta yan mtshan can 'di lta bu 'byung khrag gi char bab pa ci'i lhas zhes rtags pa dang / drang srong na re khyod kyi bu'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi sa bzhi 'di
5226(mdo sde): mi khrag gi shes par byas nas de'i 'og du 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po chen po byed par 'gyur ro// zhes smras pa rgyal bu btsas nas lo bcu gnyis lon pa dang / de'i
5227(mdo sde): rgyal/ a b+ha na dang / ba na ba dang / shag kun gsum 'dus pa'i dmag gsum rgyal po dang chas ste/ rgyal po men de se na'i yul du drangs pa las yul du dmag
5228(mdo sde): phal po che byung bas rgyal po snying mi dga' mya ngan byed bcing 'dug pa las dris pa yab 'di lta bu thugs ming ges pa ci las gyur zhes zhus pa las/ pha na re rgyal
5229(mdo sde): ngas pa las/ yul dmag pa po byin gsum gyi dmag bdag cag gi yul tu drangs mi dga' zhes smras so// bus smras pa yab mi 'gyes ma mdzad cig/ da dam/
5230(mdo sde): 'di bdag gis thub par bgyi zhes zhus pa dang pha na re lags so zhes smras nas/ rgyal po blon po'i bu yab mtsho can lnga brgya la sogs ste/
5231(mdo sde): dmag nyi 'du ba dang chas nas 'thar mo byas pa'i tshe smin mtsham na lcags kyi sme ba yod pa bskyed nas lus ril gis lcags su byas nas rab tu khros te brgal
5232(mdo sde): du smra'i dmag rgyal de phyir log pa dang / pha na re bu khyod kyi rgyal po gsum gyi dmag 'di lta bu dang / thab mo byas pa las rgyal ba leg so// da byin chad khyod kyi
5233(mdo sde): rgyal srid zung shig nga ni 'byung ngo // zhes bsgo nas rgyal srid bzung ngo // de nas lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du rgyal po gsum gyi dmag dang 'thabs pa las dmag
5234(mdo sde): mang po yang ril gyis btags rgyal po gsum yang bzung nas med par byas so// de phan chad 'dzam bu'i gling gis rgyal po ched po byas par 'gyur ro// de nas
5235(mdo sde): rgyal pos blon po rnam la smras pa/ da 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po chen po byed pa ni dga' na gud na mi dga' ba zhig yod ces smras so// blon po rnams kyis ci mi
5236(mdo sde): brgyas zhes smras pa dang / sems can mang po 'di snyed gcig bsad pa'i sdig pa che bas mi gsal na/ sdig pa 'di ji lta bu zhig byas na 'bying bar 'gyur
5237(mdo sde): zhes smras pa dang / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ yul 'di la bo dra zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi mkhan po sde snod gsum shes pa bram ze ag na ti'i bu shing
5238(mdo sde): ga zhes bgyi bdag dgon pa'i sa na gnas te sbyin drangs na sdig pa 'byang bar bgyid par rngo thog ces gsol ba dang / rgyal po dga' nas/ dge slong shir dga'
5239(mdo sde): yang bkug nas btang ste/ rgyal po'i drung du 'ong so// mkhan po shi ra ka la rgyal pos phyag byas te/ sdig pa byas pa rnams ci zhig gis 'byung bar 'gyur
5240(mdo sde): zhes zhus pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du mchod cing skyangasu gsol sdig par 'gyu ro zhes phyug byas te de nas 'dzam bu'i glang
5241(mdo sde): na dge slong 'dug po cog 'dug pa btang ste/ ril gi dga' pha rol du yul ke'u sha phyin na rgyal po gnas par bstsal te yul mkhas gzhan du chos spyod du
5242(mdo sde): mi lta bar 'gyur ro// dge slong de'i sngas pa'i lam du chud zos pa yang / rgyal po'i 'khor du ni 'bum tsam phyin par 'gyur ro dge slong lam du chud zos pa ni gcig
5243(mdo sde): can zan sna tshogs dang / mi dgos la sogs pas khyer de chud zos so// dge 'dun mang po phyin pa dang dge 'dun la rgyal pos mchod ston gsol yon phul de
5244(mdo sde): mchod do de'i tshe dge 'dun rnams kyis gcig la gcig gtam du smras pa khyod kyis mkhan po ga re/ slob ma gar song grogs po khyims zla gar song gtam du dris
5245(mdo sde): ba dang / stag dang seng ge dang mi dgos kyi bsad pa dang / chus khyer ba dang nad kyi btab te/ shi ba la sogs pa'i gtam byas nas dge slong so so mya ngan la/
5246(mdo sde): 'das te dung mos 'debs brang rdung bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe rgyal pos mya ngan ma byed ces sgo ba dang / dge 'dun rnams kyi ma
5247(mdo sde): nyan pa dang / rgyal po yang mi dga' bar gyur nas/ kha phyogs de nyal lo nyal ba'i tshe smon lam gtab pa dge 'dun la ni skyes kyang ma byung na dgra bcom pa'i zhal yas
5248(mdo sde): mthong bar shog cig ces smon lam btab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi lhas su bstan pa ri kan ta ma ha na'i ri la su nga ra sha na'i buM su rad ces bya ba dgra bcom pa zhig bzhug
5249(mdo sde): te/ de spyan drang na sdig kyang 'byung / the tsom yang khrel bar 'gyur ro zhes brtan pa dang / rgyal po sad nas 'bral du po nya kyi ste spyan drangs nas byin pa dang / dgra
5250(mdo sde): bcom pa la rgyal pos mchod cing phyag byas so// de'i dus na ches bzhi'i nub mo dge 'dun 'dus pa'i nang nas dge slong gsar gzhugs rnams kyi sde snod gsu
5251(mdo sde): shes pa'i mkhan po shi ka la 'dul ba bshad par gsol pa las shir sha ka na re mig zhar/ sna la rna ba med na/ me long gyi dgos ltar ci yong 'dul ba ltar mi
5252(mdo sde): spyod chos khrim mi bsrung ba la 'dul ba bshad na ci phan zhes smras pa dang de'i tshe su rad ces bya ba dgra bcom pas seng ge'i sgra bzhin smras pa/ sangs rgyas
5253(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi chos khrims ngas ma nos nas da tsam gyis bar du rtsa mchog tsam yang ma nyams na de skad ma zer bar 'dul ba shod cig/ ces smras pa dang /
5254(mdo sde): mkhan po shir ka yang dgra bcom pa yin par shes nas rab tu gnod sde mi smra'o// shi sha ka'i slob ma/ dge slong a na de zhes bya ba de 'khor 'das pa'i nang nas
5255(mdo sde): lag ras nas su rang ces bya ba dgra bcom pa de la khyod cig te/ nga'i mkhan po la de skad smra/ khyod khrims kyang med 'dal ba yang mi shes nga'i mkhan po sde snod
5256(mdo sde): gsum la mkhas pa de la ci'i phyir/ brnyas zhes khros nas dgra bcom pa brdegs da de/ de'i tshe chos la dga' gnod sbyin dri ta mu ka zhes bya bas/ lag par
5257(mdo sde): rdo rje thogs nas/ mngon du byug nas/ dge slong ang gang la cig sde/ dgra bcom pa bsad ces smras nas/ rdo rje phyung ste bsad do// de'i dus dge slong gi
5258(mdo sde): rang ces bya bas mkhan be shor ka sha ba brde bsad do// de nas de'i rjes la dge slong ril cig gis gcig bsad de/ gcig kyang ma lu'o// de'i dus na nam
5259(mdo sde): ka'i lha klu la sogs pa chos kyi srungs pa phal po che mi dga' zhes/ dus pa'i mchi ma ni khrag dang / med char ba sa bzhi der bab bo// na mkha' la yang ser po dang nag po
5260(mdo sde): dag tu 'gyur shing / grogs rgya chen po 'byung skar me du me gta zhes bya ba'i lus las du ba nag po zhig byung ste des zla ba dang / nyi ma'i 'od kyang med cing gcig kyang bltar
5261(mdo sde): mi snang 'ong ngo // de'i dus na sum bcu rtsa gsum gyis gnam gyis lha dang / yul mahA ya la sogs pa'i 'khor phal po che der 'ongs nas/ dge 'dun gyis gos
5262(mdo sde): dog tshen can ril bsdus nas khyer bar 'ong ngo // de'i dus na rgyal pos/ 'di lta bus ku rtsa'i sgra chen po byung ba ci las gyur zhes
5263(mdo sde): smras pa dang / dge 'dun 'khrugs nas gcig gis gcig bsad par gyur to// zhes gsol pa dang / rgyal po mi dga' nas langs te/ tho ras khar mkhar gi
5264(mdo sde): phyi rol gi gang du phyin pa dang / dge 'dun la la ni 'go bcang / la la ni rkang lag bcas kha gcig ni mig phyung ste/ 'di ltar sna tshogs pa shi ba mthong nas/ dgra bani
5265(mdo sde): ba dang / shir ka sde snod gsum pa'i ro btsal nas gnyis ka'i ro rnyed de/ de mchen khung g.yas g.yon du bcug nas dgra bcom pa ni nga'i ma yin shir ka ni chos
5266(mdo sde): kyis mdzod/ yin te/ 'di gnyis 'das par gyur bsad phyin cad nga'i sog kyang gces pa med/ rgyal srid kyang su 'dod pa sbyin no// zhes smras nas/ mig kyang
5267(mdo sde): brtsams ste mi lta bar gyur to// de'i dus na blon po rnams rgyal po la snying brtse ste/ mya ngan bsad pa'i phyir/ mi lnga brgya bon de ltar 'atse te skra dang spu breg tu
5268(mdo sde): sU ti mchod de// med bsregs phyug nag po dang / dmar po'i ko ba gyon te ban de ltar bcos nas rgyal po'i drung du 'ongs so// blon pos rgyal po la ngan de lnga rgya
5269(mdo sde): 'od so zhes smras pa dang / rgyal po yang dga' nas mig bye ste/ ban de la bltas pa dang ban de kun dga' phyugs kyi ko ba gos su gon la/ skra dang khas spu mes bsreg
5270(mdo sde): par mthong nas rgyal po dga' ste/ dkon mchog gsum mchod pa'i yo byed 'on gcig ces bgo nas/ ban de rnams la mchod de/ rgyal pos chos dris pa dang chos
5271(mdo sde): gcig kyang mi shes na/ rgyal po mya ngan langs te du'o// ban de shi ba'i rol gyis bsdus nas bsregs te mchod pa des do// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'dzam bu gling gis
5272(mdo sde): lha chos ril gyis nub po// gser ni dngul ngan pa dang / rdor 'gyur ro// dngul ni ra gnas dang rdor 'gyur/ ra gan ni zangasu 'gyur/ rin po che dang mu gti ni ra ba ra
5273(mdo sde): 'gyur zas la ro drug yod pa las dang zhing zhim pa la sogs pa bzhin nub kha ba dang // rtsub gnyis ni lus so// sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la/ bod de sang ta la/
5274(mdo sde): zla ba'i snying pos zhus pa lus stan pa rdzogs s+ho// li yul byung nas li'i rgyal po rabs drug ni 'das/ rabs bdun pa'i rgyal po badz+ri yi ka ra ti zhes bya ba'i tshe na//
5275(mdo sde): sang ga ya pra na'i gtsug lag khang dang / nye ba'i lus pa sa ya kir zhes bya ba na kang ka ta zhes bya ba'i dgra bcom pa zhig bzhugs te/ de'i slob ma ban de zhig gdul
5276(mdo sde): ba slob pa las/ bar de tsan tra gar b+ha dang / 'dul ba'i d+ha ra ma sangs rgyas kyis lung mthong nas/ dgra bcom pa la zhus pa la li yul dang / shu lig dang an tsa
5277(mdo sde): 'di gsum na/ sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das po'i 'og tu dam pa'i chos kyis mchod rten dang gzugs brnyen bzhugs pa rnam dus ci tsam zhig na nub sus ni bzhig
5278(mdo sde): thar ji ltar mchis pa bshad cing lung bstan par gsol ba las dgra bcom pas bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta bu'i the tsom dris pa ni dge'i
5279(mdo sde): swas shAkya thub pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu chos kyis gzugs brnyan dang / ring srel nyid stong du gnas nub par 'gyur ro yul 'di gsum du rgya gar dang gdong
5280(mdo sde): dmar dang / so bya dang / drug gu dang / hor la sogs pa dgra bal cher g.yos nas/ bcod cing 'khrug par 'ong ste/ de bas na sangs rgyas kyis chos nyams shing
5281(mdo sde): mchod rten yang phal cher re'u rul du 'gyur ba shig ste dge 'dun gyis mtsho ba'i yo byad kyang chad par 'ong ngo // yul 'di gsum la yang / an tshe dang shu lig ni
5282(mdo sde): lha chos mi byed pa'i dgra mang pos bgrubs te phal cher ni bsregs bshig ste stongs par 'gyur ro// gtsugs lags khang de rnams kyi ban de yang phal chen la yul
5283(mdo sde): 'ong ngo // li yul gis gtsug lags khang dang / mchod rten la sogs pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya bzhugs te// nyis brgya lnga bcu ni rab tu byung ba'i
5284(mdo sde): tshul du bzhugs nyid brgya lnga bcu ni khyim pa'i nang du skyes pa blangs te bzhugs 'og tu tog shan gyis gtsug lag khang ni bskal bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong tsa lngas
5285(mdo sde): zhabs kyi bcags shi rgyun mi chad pa'i pho brang du 'gyur 'phags pa rnams kyi phye ba dang thugs rje dang byin gyis brlabs kyis li yul gyis mchod rten dang dma'i
5286(mdo sde): chos spyod pa yang yul gzhin pas rgyas shing yun ring du gnas so// rgyal po phal po che li yul 'dod pa'i phyir brtsod cing thab ste/ gang gis thob pa'i rgyal po de dang /
5287(mdo sde): li yul gyis yon bdag chen por 'gyur te/ mi shig mi 'bri bar byed cing mched par 'ong ngo // de'i dus na gdong dmar gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dbang thang dang mthu ba skyes
5288(mdo sde): nas/ yul mkhas gzhan mang du phrogs nas bzung ngo // de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' gcig gdeng dmar gyi rgyal po'i skye ba blangs nas bong khamasu pA'i
5289(mdo sde): chos 'byung ngo // yul khams gzhan nas yang chos kyis mkhan po dang / gsungs rabs mdo sde la sogs pa sman drangs te/ gdong dmar kyi yul du gtsug lag
5290(mdo sde): khang dang mchod rten mang du brtsigs dge 'dun ste gnyis brtsegs rgyal po blon po la sogs pa 'khor ril gyi dam pa'i chos la spong rgyal po gdong dmar de'i tshe li
5291(mdo sde): yul yang rgyal po de'i sa su dbang bar 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos dang mchos rten la sogs pa/ dkon mchog gsum dang mang 'bis mi phyi bar rgyas par bcugs
5292(mdo sde): mched do// rgyal po gdong dmar mi rgyud rigs 'dun dam pa'i chos spod par 'gyur ro// rgyal po 'di rabs 'dun du yul khams gzhan dkon mchog gsum gyis
5293(mdo sde): rten bzhugs la/ ngan sems can gnod sems mi byed de de'i dus na li yul gyi dge 'dun yang / tsan tra gar b+ha'i lung stan las byung ba bzhin du dang pa 'bri chos
5294(mdo sde): khrims dang mi ldan/ 'jig rten gyi khyed dang grags pa tsho la rgyal po dang blon po'i dku gsung gis nang du bcug cing dam pa'i chos dam
5295(mdo sde): ba'i byed pa dag kyang mang du 'byung ste 'di che zhang blon dang / zhang blon gyi bu tsha yang dang ba 'bri bar 'gyur ro// dkor mchog gis mnga'i rigs kyang ban des spyad
5296(mdo sde): bas li yul gyis mchod rten dang pa'i chos la sogs pa/ dkon mchog gi mnga' rig kyang sngon pas 'bri bar 'ong ngo // rgyal po dang blon po dang / ban de la mi 'gro'o// /
5297(mdo sde): de'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' gcig gdong dmar gyis rgyal po'i rgyud tham rgyal po'i 'chung ma rgya yul nas rgyal nas rgya rje'i bu mo kong cog byang chub sems dpa' yin
5298(mdo sde): pa zhig 'khor drug rgya dang / gdong dmar gyi yul du 'ongs so// kong tse 'phags par chos la dang / dbang zang che ngas gdong dmar gyis rgyal po yang dad pa che ste/ sngon
5299(mdo sde): bas kyang dam pa'i mchos rgyas par 'gyur ro de'i dus nu li yul gyis rgyal po na so bzhon zhing chos mo spong ba zhig gis li yul gi dge slong rnams la sgog yang na mi skye 'or
5300(mdo sde): bos shig yang na ni gar dma' bar dengs shig ces bskrad nas/ dge 'dun ril gyi tshar ma nam gyi lci khang du 'ongs nas bros byed pa'i tshe lha khang gi nang 'khor 'dus pa'i
5301(mdo sde): dkyil nas gser gi zan dang / gser gi khur ba cha bden phyag nas/ de slong lnga stong rgyal po'i 'tshe ba bcad de mi 'byor ba/ zla ba gsum gyis 'tsho ba'i zod du bskar de ni
5302(mdo sde): tshe de'i dus ni skye bor babs la la ni skye bor ma babs te/ gung du 'gro ba rnams kyang pha ma dang / gnyen 'dun dang yul sa dang 'bral bar mi dma' nas dang mo chen po byung ngo //
5303(mdo sde): dge 'dun phul mang po lam du zhugs te song ba las/ 'bom zhes bya ba'i lha khang du phyin pa dang / de mchod rten chen po zhig bzhugs pa/ rlangs gi rgyal po dad pa can gyis
5304(mdo sde): dral te/ nang nas gser gyis bor ba mu tigs gis gang ba byung nas dge 'dun spri la 'bul lo// gzhan yang yon bdag dad pa can gis tsho ba'i yo byad sna sna phul lo//
5305(mdo sde): de nas dge 'dun rnams mdo lo med skar yul du byin to// mu tig zla ba phyed kyi ngo 'tsho ba'i yo byad sbyar ro// me skar nas song ta rkong tang zhes bya ba'i lha gang na dge 'dun
5306(mdo sde): bzhugs pa'i tshe be she ra na dang / dpal gi lha mo kho shug du sprul nas/ 'dag ste dge 'dun thams cad la bdag cag bsod nams bgyid do// zhes gsol nas zla
5307(mdo sde): ba byed kyi bar dge 'dun mchod ston gsol nas dpal gyis lce mos bu rung gang gi gser dong che dge 'dun spyi la phul te dge 'dun gyis gdong dmar gyi yul du kha
5308(mdo sde): bsdus te song ba las yul pa can gyi rong du gcan phyi dang phrad de mab kye'o// lam gzhan na yong song cig ces zer te/ de'i be sho ra na ga yag dkar po snal cu can
5309(mdo sde): sprul pa yod pa zhig du sprul pa dge 'dun gyi mthong ste/ g.yag sprul pa can 'di ma'i phyugs yin pas 'di gar 'gro'i phyir bzhin du 'dong ngo zhes zer ro// de'i
5310(mdo sde): g.yag des nye lam du grangs te/ zhag bzhi lngas pa na de ril gdong dmar gyi yul mtshal byi zhes bya bar phyin to// de'i tshe yul de'i dbang
5311(mdo sde): pos dge 'dun mang po zhig bstod phyogs nas phyin to zhes gdong dmar gyi smra na no// de'i tshe rgyal po'i btsun mos stod phyogs na dge 'dun yul ston tam 'khyams nas
5312(mdo sde): byon pa/ sun ma dang yo byad ba dag sbyor na/ gdong dmar gyis yul du spyan drangs par cig nang zhes gsol nas gnang ste/ dge 'dun rnams bzhon pa dang / 'tsho bas
5313(mdo sde): bsu nas gdong dmar gyi yul du phyin te/ de nas gdod dmar gyis rgyal po dang / kong co 'khor dang bcas pas mchod de phyag byas nas/ dge slong de'i nang na sde snod gsuM
5314(mdo sde): la mkhas pa'i mkhan po rnams la khyod ma gtogs pa gzhan 'di ltar 'khyam zhugs sam zhes dris pa dang mkhan po na re an rtse shu lig dang / bru sha kha che zhes bya ba yul
5315(mdo sde): na/ 'di 'dra ba'i mkhas pa'i dge 'dun mang du yod do zhes smras pa dang de'i mod la 'gugs pa'i pho nya btang ste/ dge 'dun ril gyis gajong dmar gyis yul du sman drang
5316(mdo sde): so// de'i tshe gdod dmar gyis yul du gcugs lags khang bdun pa cigs so// mchod pa'i yo byad dang / dkon mchog gis mnga' ris kyang sngon pas bskyos na
5317(mdo sde): dge 'dur rnams kyang brtsug lag khang bdun gyis nang du so sor gnas so// de'i rjes la log gsum dang bzhin kod co'i snying kar 'brum chen byung nas na ba'i tshe kong rno/
5318(mdo sde): rgyal po la gsol pa bdag ni nang 'di las mi mtsho ste 'gum na/ bdag ni dran dang nor phyag rnams ma 'gum par dbus zhes gsol te/ phul lo// 'khor drug rgya dang /
5319(mdo sde): bde bsnyen gyi mtshan mas btab ste rab tu phyung ngo // de'i rjes la kong tse tshe 'das so// kong co 'das pa'i 'og tu rgyal po gdong dmar gyis yul khams su 'brum
5320(mdo sde): nag byung te/ blon po dang zhang lon dang / zhang lon gi bu ci la sogs ste mang du shi'o// de'i tshe blon po rnams 'das te// rgyal po la gsol pa/ sngon rgyal khams 'di na
5321(mdo sde): 'di 'dra ba'i 'bum nag ma byang ste/ da ltar lho bal gi dge slong 'khyams la mang ba 'ongs nas/ kong tse yang 'das blon po yang zhang blon na lhas kyang mang du gum
5322(mdo sde): bas ban de 'di rnams kyang rgyal khamasu mi zhig par bskrad pa'i rigs zhes gsol ba las rgyal pos 'di skad pa'i rigs sam mi rigs da rung dpyod cig ces
5323(mdo sde): sgo ba las blon po rnams pa na de skrad par kha 'dus nas rgyal po la gsol ste/ rgyal khams su ban de ril mi gzhag par 'chad nas kun bska pa las gdong dmar gyis
5324(mdo sde): dge slong rnams khros te dge slong 'di rnams bskrad na bdag cag kyang 'di na mi 'dug go// zhes byas pa dang blon po rnams khros nas khyed gar dga' bar deng shig ces
5325(mdo sde): sgo'o// kong cog dong dmar gyis yul du 'ongs pa'i 'og tu rgyal pos de'i chos de'i tshes gzung nas rgya'i dge slong yang ri lags gdong dmar gyi yul du 'ongs so de'i dus
5326(mdo sde): na rgyal khams 'di'i dge slong gis gdongs dmar khams kyi ring srel dang mchod par yo byad dkon mchog gsum gyis mnga' ris gcig
5327(mdo sde): kyang ma lus par bkal nas nub phyogs su kha bltas te gan da ra chen po'i yul du 'gro bar chad de song ngo // de'i tshe rgya dang / gdong dmar dang / rgya gar dang / li la
5328(mdo sde): sogs pa dga' dga' tshun chad/ dam pa'i chos sprod pa yang nub par 'gyur ro// 'ga' gi'i pha ro'u shes pa'i yul du ni zla ba gsum zhig yun ring du gnas te nub bo// /
5329(mdo sde): 'gan ri'i yul gyi 'dab ma klu'i rgyal po e le bi ti'i gnas mtsho 'gram du dge 'dun rnams phyin pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyis byin gyi brlabs kyi mtsho yang rnyog cing
5330(mdo sde): 'khrug par gyur nas klu'i rgyal po nga'i gnas ji ste rnyogs shing 'khrugs snyam ste/ 'phrul gyi mig gis bltas na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i gsung rabs dang dam pa'i chos
5331(mdo sde): nub du nye ste/ dge slong bal chen po mthong ba'i dus tha ma 'di yin par shes nas mi rgad po zhig du sprul te/ mtsho'i 'gram du byung nas dge 'dun la phyug byung ste/ dris
5332(mdo sde): pa dge 'dun 'di snyed cig ga las byon gar gshegs dge 'dun gyis smras pa/ bdag cag rgyal po gdong dmar gi yul du gnas pa la yin bdag dang pa bri/ dkon mtsho
5333(mdo sde): rten bshig pas bdag cag gan dar chen po'i yul du 'gro zhes smras pa dang rgad po na re dge 'dun 'di snyed gci la 'tsho ci mnga' 'gan d+ha ra chen pa'i yul du 'tsho chen po 'di
5334(mdo sde): skor nas 'gro ste zhag bzhi bcu'i lam yod do dge 'dun la zhag nyi shu'i 'tsho ba las med na byin nam zhes smras pa dang / dge 'dun phal chen smras zhing du ba klu'i rgyal pos
5335(mdo sde): mthong ste/ klu'i rgyal po yang mi dga' nas gdang ba skyes nas/ dge 'dun la smras pa thad ka 'di nye lam sbrul gyis zam pa cig yod pa de de'i steng du 'gro nus na myur
5336(mdo sde): du byin ces smras nas rgang po yang mi snang bar gyur to// de nas klu'i rgyal po de'i khar 'dzes pa'i lam zhig snang bar byas/ bdag rdos kyang sbrul chen po cig tu sprul
5337(mdo sde): te/ mtsho'i steng du zam par byas nas/ dge 'dun phal po che skal nas sngon gyi sdig pa byas pa'i las kyis da ltar byol song gi lus thob pa 'di yang thar ram par bsas te/
5338(mdo sde): che sbrul gyi/ smon lam btab nas sbrul thaM btsugs so// de'i tshe nyin zhag bcwo lnga mi phyug rgal ba las/ mi phyags kha cig ni sbrul gyi zam pa las ljang sde/ shi'i mi
5339(mdo sde): phyugs mang po rgyal ba'i tshe rgyab kyang la la ni rdol la la ni ral te/ rnag khrag gi thigs pa char bzhin zags pa las mtsho yang khrag can du byas so// dge 'dun mang
5340(mdo sde): bai sbrul zam rgal ba'i 'jug kyang gdong mar gyis gcad do// de'i rjes la sbrul mtsher ljang ste/ tshe 'das nas dga' ldan gyi gnas na skyeso// mtsho yang skams so//
5341(mdo sde): de'i dus dge 'dun rnams gan da ra'i rgyal po de'i yul du lo gnyis kyis bar mche ba'i yo byad sbyar so sor ci bde bar bzhag go// lo gnyis lon pa dang rgyal pod tshe
5342(mdo sde): 'das so// rgyal po de la bu gnyis yod pa gcig ni lha chos la dang / cig ni mug stegs kyis la spyod pa/ rgyal thabs rtsod par gyur nas/
5343(mdo sde): lha chos spyod pa'i non pan des brtsod pa byas te/ de rgyal nas rgyal thabs kyang des bzung ngo // rgyal po de'i tshe dge 'dun yang mnga' bas dbang thang skyed/ yo byad dang bde
5344(mdo sde): ldan pa las lo phyi lon pa dang / ban d+he cig gis rgyal po bsad nas/ srid ban d+hes bzung ba 'gran dU ri'i rgyal 'bangs ri la log ste/ ban d+he rgyal po byed pa bsad do// /
5345(mdo sde): ban d+he gzhan rnams kyang rgyal khams de na mi gnas par ril skrad nas/ gan d+ha ri'i rgyal khams kyang chos nub bo// de nas dge 'dun rnams kyang yul khams gzhan
5346(mdo sde): du khyams shing dong ngo // de'i tshe'i du na nub phyogs kyi rgyal po dang / byang phyogs kyi rgyal po yan la sogs pa sngon pas dbang thang skyes te/ rgyal po gsum mdzad du ma byas
5347(mdo sde): nas rgyal po 'di gsum gyis nub phyogs dang byang phyogs kyi yul yang bzung / rgyal po de gsum cig cing dmag 'bum dang chas te/ ke'u shi gyi yul du drangs pa/ ke'u sha
5348(mdo sde): byi'i rgyal pos dmag 'bum rgyal po dang chas de cig kyang ma lus par chas so// de nas ke'u sha byi'i rgyal pos dmag mang po bsad pa'i sdig spang ba'i phyir 'dzam bu gling dge
5349(mdo sde): slong ril gyis spyan drangs nas/ ke'u sha byi'i yul du phyin pa'i rjes la/ dge 'dun nang 'khrugs nas cig gis gcis bsad de/ 'dzam bu gling pa spri'i lha chos der nub bo/
5350(mdo sde): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa mya ngan las 'das nas lo bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang / sa ya phrag drag na sangs rgyas byams pa mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten du sems can gyis
5351(mdo sde): don la gshegaso// byams pa gnas snga sangs rgyas shes bya ba ni la la re dga' ldan gyis tshe tshad rtsis pa'i gnang so zhes zer na de ma yin te/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni da
5352(mdo sde): ltar ro// chos nub nas byams pa ma byung gis bar ni rang zhes bya/ byams pa byon pa'i dus la ni gnas shes bya'o// @rgya gar skad du/ niTi
5353(mdo sde): ka la ba sta ba/ bod skad du/ rnams par mi rtogs pa'i bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo// dpag med shes rab pa
5354(mdo sde): rol phyin/ rnam pa ri ma rtog phyag 'tshal lo// gang skra skyon rnams kun med pa/ skyon bral rnams kyi nges par mthong / na mkha' bzhin du gos pa med pa mi 'gyur ba'i/
5355(mdo sde): ngo bor gang gis mthong gyur pa/ de yis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong / 'phags pa yon tan rdzogs khyod dang / 'gro ba'i bla ma sangs rgyas la/ zla ba dang ni 'od zer
5356(mdo sde): bzhin/ dam pa rnams kyis dbye ma mthong / sangs rgyas chos kyi sngon 'gro ba/ brtse ba'i bdag nyid khyod rten nas/ snying rjes phan stong mnyam med pa/ bde bas che ba'i
5357(mdo sde): bdag nyid 'gyur/ bsam pas lhas lan cig kyang / gang gis tshe ske bzhin khyod mthong / des kyang nges par 'grubs pa ni/ thob 'gyur mthong ba don yod kyer gzhan no//
5358(mdo sde): ming gis bstod par mdzad
5359(mdo sde): sngon dga'i bdag nyid can dba' dag ni thams cad kyang / gso dang skyes par byed pa'i ma/ brtse ba'i bdag nyid can khyod lags/ 'jig rten bla ma
5360(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gang thugs rje can de khyod kyi sras de phyir dge ba khyod nyid ni sems can kun gyis phyi mo lags/ dri med pha rol phyin pa kun/ smad pa med pa khyod nyid la/ zla ba'i
5361(mdo sde): rjes su skar ma bzhin/ thams cad du ni rjes su 'brang 'dul ba'i 'gro ba la bstan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas de dang der/ khyod nyid cig pu dngos mang po// du mi'i 'od
5362(mdo sde): ni sang gyur nas/ khug rnams byas pa'i zil ba bzhin/ rtsod pa can gyis rtsod pa'i skyon/ khyod la rten nas zad par 'gyur/ bzab mo bstan pas byis pa rnams khyod nyid kyis
5363(mdo sde): ni 'jigs pa bskyed zhib bstan pas mkhas rnams la dbus 'byin par yang mdzad pa yin/ gang la khyod lang chags med pa/ khyod mgon gyur pa de dag la/ de'i yum ji
5364(mdo sde): ltar gzhan dag la 'dod chags zhe sdang 'byung bar 'gyur/ gang nas kyang ni ma 'ongs shing gang de yang ni 'gro med la thams cad kyis ni gnas dag tu/ mkhas kyis
5365(mdo sde): mthongs mi 'gyur/ gang gi khyod nyid yang dag tu/ mthong ba med kyang sgrub par byed/ bsgrubs pos rnams par grol 'gyur ba/ de lta bu 'di ngo mtshar che/ khyod mthong bas
5366(mdo sde): kyang bcing bar 'gyur/ khyod mthong na yang grol bar 'gyur/ ma mthong na yang grol bar 'gyur/ e ma'o ngo mtshar gyur pa'i rgyu/ grags ldan ma khyod zab mor gyur/ sgyu
5367(mdo sde): sa bzhin du rtogs kar gyur/ mthong ba de mthong ma yin pa/ sangs rlung sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyen thos rnams kyis nges bsten pa/ thar pa'i lam ni gcig nyid khyod gzhan
5368(mdo sde): dag med ces bya bar nges/ tha snyed sngon du byas nas ni/ lus can rnam la rtag pa'i don/ 'jig rten mgon pos thugs rje yis/ brjod pa med kyang khyod nyid brjod/ mtshan
5369(mdo sde): med cing khyad med pa/ ngag kun yul las shin du 'das gang la'ang rten pa/ med pa khyod 'dir ni khyod stong nus pa gang de ltar yin na'ang kun rdzob tu bdag gis 'di 'dra'i
5370(mdo sde): dag lam gyis khyod ni bstod par mi nus kyang / bstod par 'dod pas shin du tshim/ shes rab pha rol phyin bstod pas bdag gis dge ba gang bsags pa des ni 'gro ba ma lus
5371(mdo sde): pa/ shes rab pha rol phyin mchog 'gyur/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i stong pa 'phags pa klu grubs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs sgo// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shan ta b+ha tra dang / lo ts+tsha ba
5372(mdo sde): tshul khrims rgyal bas sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ par ma a ra tha sta ba/ bod skad du/ don dam par bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon
5373(mdo sde): nur gyur la phyag 'tshal lo// skye ba med cing gnas med la/ 'jig rten dpe las shin du 'das/ dag gis brjod pa'i spyod yul min/ 'gon khyod ji ltar bstod par bgyi
5374(mdo sde): de lta na yang gang 'dra bas/ de bzhin nyid don spyod yul gyis 'jig rten btag pa la gnas nas gus pa chen pos bdag gis bstod/ skye ba med pa'i ngo bo yis/ khyod la
5375(mdo sde): skye ba yod mi mnga'/ dngos mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ dngos med ma lags dngos ma lags chad brtags ma lags mi rtags ma lags
5376(mdo sde): tag ma lags/ gnyis mi mnga' la phyags 'tshal 'dud dmar dang ljang dang brtsod mdogs min ser dang gnags dang dkar ma lags khyod la kha dog yod ma migs/ mdog
5377(mdo sde): mi mda' la phyags 'tshal 'dad/ chen po ma lags chung ma lags/ ring dang zlum pa ma lags la/ tshad med pa yi dngos rnyes pa/ tshad mi mnga' la phyags 'tshal 'dad/
5378(mdo sde): ring min nye ba ma lags shing na mkha' ma lags/ 'khor min mya ngan 'das ma lags/ gnas mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal 'dad/ chos rnams kun la mi gnas pas chos kyis
5379(mdo sde): dbyings kyi dngos gyur cing mchog tu zab pa nyid brnyed pa/ zab mo khyod la phyag 'tshal ba dang / de lta'i bstod pas bstod bgyid pa 'am/ yang na 'dir ni ci zhig stong / chos rnaMs
5380(mdo sde): thams cad stod pa la gang la bstod cing gang gis bstod/ skye dang 'jig pa rnams spangs shing gang las mtha' dang dbus med la gzung dang 'dzin pa mi mnga' ba 'dir ni khyod bstod
5381(mdo sde): nus pa gang gshegs dang byon pa mi mnga' zhing / 'gro spongs bde bar gshegs bstod pas/ bsod nams des ni 'jig rten rnams bde gshegs rnams su 'gro bar shog/
5382(mdo sde): don dam par bstod pa slob dpon klu grub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// @#rgya gar skad du/ ni ru pa ma lta ba/ bod skad du/ dpe med par bstod pa 'a
5383(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nor gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhin lta bas phongs pa yi/ 'jig rten 'di la phan brtson khyod dngos po med pa'i don rig pas/ dpe med khyod la 'phyag
5384(mdo sde): 'tshel stong / gang zhig khyod kyis cung zhig kyang / sangs spyan gyis ma gzigs pa/ khyod kyis gzigs pa bla med de de nyid don ni rig pa lags don dam pa yi yod pa nyid rtogs
5385(mdo sde): dang rtogs bya mi mnga' zhing / oM ma'o mchog tu rtogs dka' ba'i chos nyid sangs rgyas nyid kyis rtogs khyod kyis cung zhig ma skyed cing / chos rnams bka' ba'ang me lags
5386(mdo sde): la/ mnyam pa nyid kyis lta ba yis/ bla na med pa'i go 'phang gnyis 'khor ba spang bar gyur pa yi/ mya ngan 'das khyod mi bzhed kyis 'khor ba mi dmigs pa nyid kyis/
5387(mdo sde): zhe de mgon po khyod kyis rtogs khyod kyis kun nas nyon mongs dang / rnam byang ro gcig gyur rig pas/ chos dbyings mngon par dbyer med pa kun du rnam par dag par
5388(mdo sde): gyur/ gtso bo khyod kyis 'ga' zhig tu/ yi ge cig kyang ma gsungs la/ gdul bya'i 'gro ba ma lus pa/ chos kyi char kyis tshim par mdzad/ mkha' dang mnyam pa'i
5389(mdo sde): thugs mnga' khyod phung po khams dang skyes mchad la chags par gyur pa mi mnga' bas chos rnam kun la rten ma lags 'gon khyod sems can 'du shes kyis/ 'jugs pa
5390(mdo sde): kun du mi mnga' yang / sngags bsngal gyur pa'i sems can la snying rje'i bdag nyid gyur pa khyod/ bde dang sdug bsngal de bzhin du rtogs mi rtags la co khyod/ de lha'i chos
5391(mdo sde): rtog sna tshogs kyis thugs ni chags par 'gyur ma lags/ chos rnams gang du'ang 'gro 'ong med de bzhin khyod kyis gshegs pa'ang lags
5392(mdo sde): 'ga' ru sbyangs pa ma mchis la de phyir don dam pa'i rigs bda' lags/ kun gyis rje su bzhugs gyur kyang / 'ga' ru 'byung bda' ma lags la/ skye dang chos dang skra
5393(mdo sde): rnams kyang / thub chen khyod kyis bsam mi khyab/ gcig dang gzhan pa rnam spangs pa'i brag cha lta ba'i 'gro ba rnams/ 'pho dang 'jig pa rnam spangs par/ smad pa med pa
5394(mdo sde): khyod kyis rtogs/ rtag dang chad pa dang bral zhing / mtshan nyid mtshon cha rnam spangs par gtso bos rmi lam skya tshogs bzhin 'khor ba nges par rtogs pa lags bag chags
5395(mdo sde): bzhir gyur mthar thugs pa'i/ khyod kyis nyon mongs sdig pa spangs/ nyon mongs nyid kyi rang bzhin yang khyod kyis bdud rtsi nyid du bsgrubs/ dpa'o khyod kyis gzugs
5396(mdo sde): rnams ni/ mtshan ma med pa thong gzugs med bzhin mtshan gyis 'bar ba'i ska nyid kyang / gzugs su spyod yul nyid du mthong / gzugs su mthong bas mthong min ya
5397(mdo sde): mthong ngo zhes ni zhes ni rjod par byed chos mthong bas ni shin du mthong / chos nyid mthong ba ma yin no// khong stong khyod kyi sku la med/ sha dang rus pa khrag med kyang //
5398(mdo sde): na mkha'i dbang po'i gzhu bzhin du khyod kyi sku ni ston par mdzad skal snyan med mi gtsang med/ bkres dang bsgom pa 'byung med kyang / khyod ni 'jig rten rjes 'jog
5399(mdo sde): phyir 'jig rten spyod pa'ang ston par mdzad/ las kyi sgribs pa'i skyon rnams ni sdigs med khyod kyis kun spangs kyang / khyod kyis sems can rjes bzung phyir/ las spangs
5400(mdo sde): pa yang rab tu bstan/ chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med phyir/ gtso bo thig dbye ma mchis kyang khyod kyis theg pa gsum bstan pa/ sems can bzhug pa'i ched du lags rtags cing
5401(mdo sde): brtan la zhi ba yi/ chos kyi rang bzhin khyod kyi sku/ rgyal bas mdul ba'i 'gro ba'i phyir khyod nyid mya ngan 'das par stan grangs med 'jig rten khams rnams su/ 'das dang
5402(mdo sde): bltam dang mngon byang chub 'khor ba'ang thar bar mos rnams kyi/ khyod la mos rnams kyis yang mthong / mgon po sems pa mi mnga' zhing / rnam rtog g.yo ba mi mnga'
5403(mdo sde): khyod nyid dang gis 'jig rten la sangs rgyas mdzad 'da' 'jug par 'gyur/ de ltar bder gshegs yon tan tshad bsam mi khyab me tog gis brgyan pa las bsod nams
5404(mdo sde): gang thob par/ gyur pa 'dis ni sems can ma lus pa 'di dag/ mchog tu rtogs dka' thub pa'i chos kyi snod gyur cig dpe' med par bstod pa slob dpon klu
5405(mdo sde): grub kyis mdzad pa rdzog s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ lo ka sa ti// sme ba/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten las 'das par stod pa 'jam da
5406(mdo sde): gzhon dur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dben pa'i ye shes rib gyur lo/ 'jig rten 'das khyod phyag 'tshal 'dud/ gang khyod 'grol ldan pa'i phyir/ kun ring/
5407(mdo sde): thugs rjes ngal bar gyur/ phung po tsam las grol yi/ sems can med par khyod bzhengs la sems can don la'ang mchog gzhol bar/
5408(mdo sde): thub pa chen po khyod nyid bzhugs/ blo ldan khyod kyis phung po 'ang / sgyu ma smig sgyu dri za yi/ grong khyer rmi lam ji bzhin du blo ldan rnams la rab tu bstan gang dag rgyu las
5409(mdo sde): byung ba rnams de med par ni yod min pas/ gzugs brnyan nyid dang mtshungs pa ro/ gsal bar ci'i phyir mi 'dod/ 'byung ba mig gi gzugs min pas/ de dngos
5410(mdo sde): mig gis ji ltar yin/ gzugs nyid gzung ba rab bkag pa/ gzugs nyid khyod kyis de ltar gsungs/ tshor ba med par tshor ba nyid ni bdag med pa/ tshor ba de'ang rang bzhin
5411(mdo sde): gyis yod pa min par khyod nyid bzheng / ming dang don dang tha dad min/ me yis kha nyid cig par 'gyur gzhan 'ang rtogs pa med 'gyur zhes/ bden pa gasrung ba khyod kyis
5412(mdo sde): bstan byed po rang dbyang las nyid kyang / tha snyad du ni khyod kyis bstan/ grub par khyod ni bzhed pa lags/ byed po yod min spyod pa'ang med/ bsod nams de min rten 'dres
5413(mdo sde): skyes/ brtan nas/ skyes gang ma skyes zhes/ tshig gis bdag po khyod kyis gsungs shes pa med par shes bya min/ de mi rnam par shes pa'ang med/ de phyir shes dang shes
5414(mdo sde): bya dag rang dngos med ces khyod kyis gsungs mtshan nyid mtshon cha gzhan nyid na mtshan nyid med par 'gyur tha dad min na'ang de med par/ khyod kyis gsal po nyid du bstan/
5415(mdo sde): mtshan nyid mtshon bya rnam bral zhing / tshig gis brjod pa rnam spangs par khyod kyi ye shes byan nyid kyis 'gro ba 'di dag zhi bar mthong dngos po yod pa nyid mi skyes med bangal
5416(mdo sde): ma yin yod med min bdag las ma yin gzhan las min/ gnyis lan skye ba ji lta bu yod pa gnas par rigs 'gyur gyis/ 'jig par 'gyur ba ma yin no// med
5417(mdo sde): pa mi gnas par rig pas 'jig par 'gyur ba ma yin no// ri zhig zhig pa'i rgyu las kyang / 'bras bu 'byung bar mi rigs la/ ma zhig las min rmi lam dang / 'dra 'i
5418(mdo sde): skyes pa khyod nyid pa zhes zhig dang ma zhig pa dag gi rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung ba dag/ sgyu ma 'byung ba bzhin du 'byung kun kyang de bzhin khyod kyis gsungs/ de phyir khyod kyis
5419(mdo sde): 'gro 'di dag yongasu rtags pa las 'byung bar/ kun du shes bya byung ba na 'di skye ba med cing 'gag med gsungs rtags la'ang 'khor ba ma yin no// mi rtag pa la 'khor ba me
5420(mdo sde): de nyid rig pa'i mchog khyod kyis/ khor ba rmi lam 'dra bar gsungs/ sdug bsngal rang gis byas pa dang gzhan gyi byas dang gnyis gas byas/ rgyu med par ni rtogs ge 'dongs
5421(mdo sde): khyod kyis rten cing 'byung bar gsungs/ rten cing 'brel bar gang byung ba/ de nyid khyod ni stong par bzhes dngos po rang dbang yod min zhes/ mnyam med khyod kyis seng ge'i sgra
5422(mdo sde): kun rtogs thams cad spang ba'i phyir stong nyid bdud rtsam ston mdzad pa/ gang zhig de la zhen gyur pa de nyid khyod kyis shin du spang / bems po gzhan dbang stong pa nyid/ sgyu ma
5423(mdo sde): bzhin du rkyen 'byung bar mgon po khyod kyis chos kun gyis/ dngos med goms par mdzad pa lags khyod kyis/ cung zhig maskyed cig/ 'ga'
5424(mdo sde): yang bkag pa mchis la/ sngon gyis ji ltar byis de bzhin de bzhin nyid kyis thugasu chung 'phags pa rnams kyis bsten pa yi/ bsgom pa bzhugs par mtshan med 'di rnam
5425(mdo sde): par shes pas 'gar 'gyur ram/ mtshan ma med la ma zhugs par/ thar pa med ces gsungs pa'i phyir/ de phyir khyod kyis theg chen rnams/ ma lus par ni de nyid bstan//
5426(mdo sde): bstong pa'i snod khyod bstod pa las bdag gis bsod nams gang thob pa/ des ni 'gro ba ma lus rnams/ mtshan ma'i 'chings las grol gyur cig/ 'jig rten las
5427(mdo sde): 'das par bstod pa las/ bslob dpon klu grub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs sgo/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po kri Sh+Na pa Na Di ta dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas sbyar
5428(mdo sde): cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ d+harma d+hA tu sta pa/ bod skad du/ chos kyis dbyings su bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal
5429(mdo sde): lo// gang zhig kun du ma shes na/ srid pa gsum du nam 'khor la sems can kun la nges gnas pa'i/ chos kyis dbyings la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ gang zhig 'khor ba'i
5430(mdo sde): rgyur gyur pa/ de nyid spang ba byas pa las/ dag pa de nyid mya ngan 'das chos kyi sku yang de nyid do// dri ltar 'o ma dang 'dres pas/ mar gyi snying po mi snang ba/ de bzhin nyon mongs
5431(mdo sde): dang 'dres pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyang mi mthong ngo // ji ltar 'o ma rnams spangs pas mar gyi snying po dri med 'gyur/ de bzhin nyon mongs rnam spangs pas/ dbyings shin/
5432(mdo sde): du dri med 'gyur/ ci ltar mar me bum nang gnas cang zhig par mi 'gyur ba/ de bzhin nyon mongs bu ma nang nas/ chos kyi dbyings mi mthong ngo // phyogs ni gang dang
5433(mdo sde): gang dag nas bum pa bu ga gtong gyur pa'i/ de dang de'i phyogs nyid nas 'od kyi rang bzhin 'byung bar 'gyur/ gang tshe ting 'dzin rdor rje yis bum pa de ni bcag gyur pa/ de tshe
5434(mdo sde): de ni nam mkha' yi mthar thugs bar du snang bar byed/ chos kyi dbyings na skye ba yin/ nam yang 'ga' bar 'gyur ba med dus rnams kun du nyon mongs med thog ma par
5435(mdo sde): mthar dri ma bral ji ltar rin chen po de r+ya/ dus rnams kun du 'od gsal yang / rdo yi nang na gnas gyur na/ de yi 'od ni gsal ma yin de bzhin nyon mongs kyis bsgrub
5436(mdo sde): pa'i chos dbyings shin du dri med pa/ 'khor bar 'od ni gsal mo yin/ mya ngan 'od ni 'od gsal 'gyur/ khams yod na ni las byas pas sa le sbram dag mthong bar
5437(mdo sde): 'gyur khams med par ni las byas na'ang nyon mongs 'ba' shig skyed par zad ji ltar sbun pas g.yogs gyur pas/ so ba 'bras bu mi 'dod ltar/ de bzhin nyon mongs
5438(mdo sde): kyis g.yogs pas/ de ni sangs rgyas zhes mi rtag/ ji ltar sbun pa zhes grol na 'bras nyid snang bar 'gyur ba ltar de bzhin nyon mongs las grol na/ chos kyi sku nyid
5439(mdo sde): rab tu gsal/ chu shing snying po med do// zhes 'jig rten na ni dper byed kyang / de'i 'bras bu snying po nyid dngar po za bar byed pa ltar snying po
5440(mdo sde): med pa'i 'khor ba las nyon mongs gseb dang bral gyur na/ de'i 'bras bu sangs rgyas nyid/ las can kun gyis bdu rtsir 'gyur/ de bzhin sa bon thams cad las rgyu dang 'dra ba
5441(mdo sde): 'bras bu 'byung / sa bon med par 'bras yod par/ shes ldan gang gis bsgrub par nus/ sa bor gyur pa khas de nyid chos rnams kun gyis rten du 'dod rigs kyis
5442(mdo sde): sbyangs par gyur pa las/ sangs rgyas go 'phangs 'thob par 'gyur/ dri med nyid ma zla ba yang sprin dang khug rnam du ba dang / sgra gcan gdong dang rdal la sogs sgrib pa
5443(mdo sde): khams lnga yis sgribs par gyur/ de bzhin 'od gsal la yi sems/ 'dod dang gnod sems le lo dang / rgod pa dang ni the tsom ste/ sgrib pa lnga yis sgribs
5444(mdo sde): par gyur/ ji ltar me yis dag pa'i gos/ sna tshogs dri mas dri na ji ltar me yi nang bcug na/ dri ma tshig 'gyur gos min ltar de bzhin 'dod gsal ba yi sems/
5445(mdo sde): 'dod chags las skyes dri ma can ye shes me yis ma sregs de nyid 'od gsal ma yin no// stong pa nyid ni ston pa'i mdo rgyal de nyid gsungs pa de dag kun gyi nyon mongs
5446(mdo sde): ldog/ khams de nyam par byed ma yin/ sa yid kyil na yod pa'i chu dri ma med pa gnas pa ltar/ nyon mongs nang na ye shes kyang / de bzhin dri ma med par gnas//
5447(mdo sde): chos dbyings gang phyir bdag ma yin bud med ma yin skyes pa'ang min/ gzungs pa kun las rnams grol ba/ ji ltar bdag ces brtags par bya/ chags pa med pa'i
5448(mdo sde): chos kun la/ bud med skyes pa dmigs ma min 'dod chags kyis 'dongs 'du la byi'i phyir/ bud med skyes pa zhes rab bstan mi rtag sdug sngal stong pa zhes/ bya ba gsuM
5449(mdo sde): pos sems spong byed/ mchog tu sems ni spyod mi byed pa'i chos ni rang bzhin med pa yin/ ji ltar sbrum ma'i ljon bu/ yod kyang mthong ba ma yin pa/ de bzhin nyon
5450(mdo sde): mongs kyis g.yogs pa'i/ chos kyi dbyings kyang mthong ma yin/ bdag dang bdag gis rnam rtog dang / ming gi 'dus shes rgyu mtshan gyis rnam rtog bzhi po 'byung ba yang
5451(mdo sde): 'byung dang 'byung las gyur la sogs/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi smon lam yang / snang ba med cing mtshan nyid med/ so so rang rig sbyor ldan nyid/ sangs rgyas rtag pa'i
5452(mdo sde): chos nyid can ci ltar ri bong mgo'i rab/ brtags pa nyid de med pa ltar/ de bzhin chos rnams thams cad kyang brtags pa nyid de yod ma yin phra rab rdal gyis ngo bo yis//
5453(mdo sde): glang gis rab yang dmigs ma yin ji ltar sngon bzhin phyis de bzhin de la ci zhig brtag par bya/ btA nas 'byung bar gyur pa dang / brten nas 'gag par gyur pas na/ cig
5454(mdo sde): kyang yod pa ma yin na/ byis pa ci ltar rtogs par byed/ ri bong ba glang raba'i dpes/ ji ltar bder gshegs ches rnam nyid dbus ma nyid du sgrub par byed ji ltar nyi zla
5455(mdo sde): skar ma'i gzugs dang pa'i snod kyil chu nang du/ gzugs brnyan mthong bar gyur pa ltar/ mtshan nyid rdzogs pa de dang 'dra/ thog ma bar dang mthar
5456(mdo sde): dge ba/ slu ba med cing bstan pa yi/ gang zhig de ltar bdag med la/ ji ltar bdag dang bdag gir bstag ji ltar so ga'i dus su chu/ dro bo zhes ni rjod par byed de nyid pa
5457(mdo sde): grang ba'i dus su ni grang ngo zhes ni brjod pa yin/ nyon mongs dra bas g.yogs pa na/ sems can zhes ni brjod par bye de nyid nyon mongs bral gyur na sangs rgyas zhes ni brjod
5458(mdo sde): par bya/ mig dang gzugs la rten nas ni dri med pa'i snang ba 'byung / skye med 'gag pa med nyid las/ kyi dbyings ni rab tu shes/ sgra dang rna ba la rten nas/ rnam par dag pa'i she
5459(mdo sde): ba gsum mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi dbyings/ rtog dang bcas pas thos par 'gyur/ sna dang dri la ste/ nas nom/ de ni gzugs su med pa'i dpes/ de bzhin sna'i rnam shes
5460(mdo sde): kyis/ chos kyi dbyings la rtogs par byed/ lce'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid ro'i khams kyang dben pa ste/ chos kyis dbyings kyi ngo bo yis/ rnam par shes pa gnas med pa/
5461(mdo sde): dag pa'i sus kyis ngo bo dang / reg bya'i rkyen gyis mtshan nyid dag/ rkyen dag las ni grol gyur pa chos kyis dbyings zhes brjod par bya/ yid gtsor gyur pa'i chos rnams la/ rtog
5462(mdo sde): dang rtags pa rnam spangs nas/ chos rnams rang bzhin med pa nyid chos kyi dbyings su bsgom par bya/ mthong dang thos dang bsnams pa dang / mya ngas dang reg par gyur pa dang /
5463(mdo sde): chos rnams de ltar rnal 'byor pas/ shes nas mtshan nyid rdzogs pa yin mig dang rna ba sna dag dang / lce dang lus dang de bzhin yid skye mched drug po rnams pa/ 'di nyid de nyid
5464(mdo sde): mtshan nyid do// sems nyid rnams pa gnyis su mthong / ji ltar 'jig rten 'jig 'das/ bdag tu 'dzin las 'khor ba ste/ so sor rig na de nyid do/ 'dod chags zad
5465(mdo sde): pas mya ngan 'das/ zhe sdang gti mug zad pa dang / de dag 'gags pas sangs rgyas nyid lus can kun gyi skye bas nyid do// shes dang mi shes pa dag las/ lus 'di nyid la
5466(mdo sde): thams cad de rang gi rnam par rtogs pas bcings bdag nyid shes na grol bar 'gyur/ byang chub ring min nye ba min/ 'gro min 'ong ba ma yin zhing / nyon mongs gzeb gyur
5467(mdo sde): 'di nyid la/ mthong ba dang ni ma mthong yin/ shis rab mar me la gnas nas/ mchog tu zhi bar 'gyur ba yin bdag la brtag pas gnas bya zhes/ mdo sde'i tshogs las
5468(mdo sde): gsungs pa lags/ stogs bcu'i stobs kyi byis pa rnams byin brlabs zla ba ches pa bzhin/ nyon mongs can gyi sems can gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong ngo // /
5469(mdo sde): ji ltar yi dag rnams kyis ni/ rgya mtsho skams par mthong ba ltar de bzhin mi shes pas bsregs pas sangs rgyas rnams ni med par brtags/ dman dang bsod nams
5470(mdo sde): dman pa la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ci gyis mchos/ ji ltar dmus long lag pa ru/ rin chen chog ni bzhag pa 'dra/ sems can bsod nams byas rnams la 'od kyis
5471(mdo sde): @gsal zhing dpal ldan pa'i sum bcu rtsa mtshan 'bar ba sangs rgyas de'i mdun na gnas/ mgon po de'i gzugs kyi skus bskal pa mang por bzhug
5472(mdo sde): nas kyang / gdul bya rnams ni gdul ba'i phyir dbyibs nyid tha dad gyur pa lags/ sems kyis yul ni ngos rtogs nas/ der ni shes pa 'jugs par 'gyur/ so so rang rig ni/
5473(mdo sde): dag na/ sa rnams de'i bdag nyid nas/ dbang phyug chen po'i gnas mchog dang 'og min nyid de rnam mdzes pa/ shes pa gsum po cig nyid du/ 'dres par 'gyur la bdag sla'o// /
5474(mdo sde): byis pa'i nang nas yongs khyen dang / 'phags pa'i nang na sna tshogs nyid dbang phyug chen po tshe dpag med/ bskal pa che'i rgyud gang yin phyi rol sems can khams kyi yang / bdag
5475(mdo sde): tu med pa'i bskal pa ni/ tshe yang gang gis bsrung gyur cing / srog chags rnams kyi srogs gnas pa'i rgyu'ang mi zad pa de nyid gang gi 'bras bu mi zad gang / snang ba med pa'i
5476(mdo sde): bye brag gis shes rab don du rab tu 'jug byang chub ring rab mi bsam zhing / nye bar yang ni bsam mi bya/ yul drug snang ba med par ni yang dag ji bzhin rig gyur pa'o// ji ltar
5477(mdo sde): 'o ma dang 'dres chu snod cig la ni gnas pa las ngang bas 'o ma thung byed cing / chu ni ma yin de bzhin gnas de bzhin nyon mongs kyis g.yogs nas/ ye shes lus 'dir cig
5478(mdo sde): gnas kyang / rnal 'byor pa yis ye shes len/ mi shes pa ni 'dor bar byed bdag dang bdag gis zhes 'dzin pas/ ci srid phyi rol rnam rtag pa/ bdag med rnam pa gnyis
5479(mdo sde): mthong na/ srid pa'i sa bon 'gag par 'gyur/ gang phyir sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das gtsang ba dge ba'i bzhin gang phyir gnyis ni byis pas brtams de'i gnyis med rnal 'byor gnas/
5480(mdo sde): dka' spyad sna tshogs sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims sems can don bsdud dang / sems can phan byed bzod pa ste/ gsum po 'di sa ni khams rgyas 'gyur chos rnams kun la
5481(mdo sde): brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan la sems 'jugs pa dang rtag tu shes rab bsten pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub rgyas byed yin/ thabs dang bcas pa'i shes rab dang / smon lam
5482(mdo sde): rnam par spangs pa dang / stobs la des gnas ye shes te/ sangs rgyas byed pa'i chos bzhin po/ byang chub sems phyag mi bya zhes/ smra ba ngan par smra ba ste/ byang chub sems
5483(mdo sde): dpa' ma byung bar/ chos kyi sku ni 'byung ma yin/ smon lam rnams par spangs pa dang / bur shing sa bon la snga gang / kha ra spyad par 'dod pa des bur shing sa bon med pa
5484(mdo sde): ni/ kha ra 'byung bar 'gyur ma yin/ bur shin sa bon gang bsrungs nas/ nyes par gnas shing bsgrub pa las bu ram khur hwags rnams ni/ de las 'byung bar 'gyur ba
5485(mdo sde): ltar byang chub sems 'di rab bsrungs nas/ nye ba gnas shing bsgrubs pa las/ dgra bcom gyen rtog sangs rgyas rnams/ de las skye shing 'byung bar 'gyur ji ltar
5486(mdo sde): sa lu'i sa bon lhogs zhing las srung ba byed pa ltar/ de bzhin thig mchog rmos rnams la'ang / 'dren pa rnams kyis bsrung bar mdzad ji ltar nga'i bcu bzhi la/
5487(mdo sde): zla ba cung zad mthong ba ltar/ de bzhin theg mchog mos rnams la'ang sangs rgyas sku ni cung zhig mthong ji ltar ches pa'i zla ba la skad cig ska
5488(mdo sde): cig rgyas par mthong de bzhin las zhus rnams kyang rim gyis 'phel bar mthong / ci ltar yang de'i brtso lnga la/ zla ba rdzogs par 'gyur ba ltar/ de bzhin sa yis
5489(mdo sde): mthar thug na chos kyi sku yang rdzogs shing gsal sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la rtag tu mos pa brtan po yis/ sems de yang dag bskyed byas nas phyir mi ldog pa ya
5490(mdo sde): yang 'byung / nag po'i gzhin ni yongs spangs nas/ dkar po'i gzhi ni rab bzung bas de tshe de ni des rtogs pa dga' ba zhes ni mngon par brjod 'dod chags la sogs sna tshogs
5491(mdo sde): ba'i dri ma rtag tu dri ma can/ dri ma med pas gang dag pa/ dri ma med ces brjod pa yin nyon mongs dra ba rab 'gags nas/ dri med shes rab gsal blas/ tshad med pa yi mun pa
5492(mdo sde): ngag sel bar byed pas 'ong / byed pas rtag tu dag pa'i 'od kyi gsal 'du 'dzinam par spangs pa yi/ ye shes 'od kyis rab bskor bas sa de 'od 'phro can du 'dod rigs dang
5493(mdo sde): rgyu tsal bzo gnas kun bsams tan rnams pa sna tshogs nyid nyon mongs shin du spyad dkar 'dod/ byang chub rnams pa gsum tshogs kun bsdu ba dang / skye dang 'jig pa zad
5494(mdo sde): pa dngas de mngon du gyur par 'dod 'khor lo'i bkod pas rnams kun du/ 'od kyis dra brtse ba dang / 'khor ba'i mtsho'i 'dam rgal bas de la ring du song zhes bya/ sangs
5495(mdo sde): rgyas kyis nges 'di gzungs zhing / ye shes rgya mtshor zhugs pa dang / 'bad med lhun gyis grub rgyar bas/ bdud kyis 'khor gyis mi g.yogs pa'o// so so yang dag rig kun la/
5496(mdo sde): chos ston pa yi 'phel ba'i gtam/ rnal 'byor pa de mthor songs pas/ sa de logs pa'i blo gros 'dod/ ye shes rang bzhin 'di'i sku/ dri med na mkha' dang mnyam pa/
5497(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'dzin pa las/ chos kyi sprin ni kun ni du 'byung sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi gnas spong ba'i 'bras bu yongs 'dzin pa/ gnas ni yongasu gyur
5498(mdo sde): ba de/ chos kyi sku zhes brjod ma yin/ bag chags las grol bas sa mi khyab/ 'khor ba'i bag chags bsam du yod khyod ni kun du bsams mi khyab gang gis
5499(mdo sde): khyod ni shes par nus/ ngag gi spong yul/ kun las 'das dbang po kun gyi spong yul min/ yid kyis shes pas rtogs bya ba gang yang rung la phyag 'tshal bstod/
5500(mdo sde): rim gyi 'jug pa'i lus nyid kyis sangs rgyas sras po grag chen rnams chos kyi sprin gyi ye shes kyis/ chos nyid stong pa mthong gyur nasatshe sems ni rab
5501(mdo sde): bskus pas/ 'khor ba'i gzeb las 'das gyur nas/ pad+ma chen po'i rang bzhin gyis/ bstan la de ni rab gnas 'gyur 'ang ba ma rin chen du mi'i 'od/ 'dod par bya ba'i
5502(mdo sde): zem 'bru can pad+ma bye ba du mi yin rnam pa kun du yongasu bskor stobs bcu po yis yong su gang / mi 'jigs yis yang dag ngoms bsam mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas chos
5503(mdo sde): spros med rnams las nyams mi mnga' legs par spyang ba'i las kun gyis/ bsod nams ye shes rab bsags pa'i zla ba nyi la skar ma yis/ 'khor
5504(mdo sde): du rnam pa kun gyis bskor/ sangs rgyas phyag gis nyi ma der/ dri med rin chen 'bar gyur te/ sras kyis thu po dbang bskurabs dbang skur ba ni kun tu gsol/ rnal 'byor chen
5505(mdo sde): po'i der gnas nas rmongs pas dman pa'i 'jig rten rnams sdug bsngal gyis g.yengs 'jig pa la/ lha'i spyan gyis gzigs gyur nas/ de yi skra las 'od zer rnam 'bad
5506(mdo sde): bar 'byung 'gyur te/ rmongs pa'i mun par zhugs de yis/ sgo rnams 'byed par mdzad pa yin lhag bcas mya ngan 'das pa rnams lhag med mya ngan 'das pa 'dod/ 'dir
5507(mdo sde): ni mya ngan 'das pa nyid dri me med par sems gyur pa'o// sems can kun gyi dngos med pa'i ngo bo de yang de'i spyod yul/ de mthong byang chub sems dbang po shin du dri med chos kyi
5508(mdo sde): sku/ dri med pa'i chos ska la ye shes rgya tsho gnas gyur nas/ sna tshogs nor bu ji bzhin du de las sems can don rnams mdzad/ chos kyi dbying su bstod pa slob dpon klu grub
5509(mdo sde): gyis mdzad pa rdzog s+ho// gye gar gyi mkhan po kri sna pa N+Di ta dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ @#/ rgya gar skad
5510(mdo sde): du a tsin ta sta pa bod skad du/ bsam gyis mi khyab par bstod pa 'jam dpal gzhon nor gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// gang gis dngos po rten byung rnams ngo bo med pa nyid du
5511(mdo sde): gsungs/ ye shes mnyam med bsam mi khyab dpe med de la phyag 'tshal lo ji ltar khyod kyis theg chen la/ nyid kyis chos la bdag med rtogs de bzhin blo dang ldan rnams la/
5512(mdo sde): thugs rje'i dbang gis bstan pa mdzad rkyen rnams las ni 'brel 'byung ba/ ma skyes lags par khyod kyis gsungs ngo bo nyid kyis de ma skyed de phyir stong par rab tu bstan ji ltar 'di na
5513(mdo sde): sgra ten nas/ brag cha kun du 'byung ba ltar sgyu ma smig sgyu bzhin du yang / de bzhin srid pa kun du 'byung sgyu ma dang ni smig rgyu dang dri zi'i grong khyer gzugs brnyen dang / rmi lam gal
5514(mdo sde): te ma skyes na mthong ba la sogs med 'gyur ji ltar rgyu rkyen las byung ba/ de dag byas pa can du bzhing / de bzhin rkyen las skyes bu kun/ mgon po khyod kyis de ltar gsungs byis pa
5515(mdo sde): gang dag ci brjod pa/ bgyid pa zhes bgyi de mchis te/ chad po stong pa 'dra ba legs/ don bzhin ma lags rab tu bstan gang tshe byas pa'i dngos ma skyes/ de tshe lhar byang ba yi//
5516(mdo sde): gang zhig bsan 'das par 'gyur/ ma 'ongs pa yang ji la ltos/ rang las dngos po skye ba med/ gzhan dang gnyis gzhan dang gnyi ga las kyang min yod min med min yod med
5517(mdo sde): min/ de tshe gang las gang las gang zhig 'byung / ma skyes pa la rang bzhin med de phyir gang las kun du byung / rang bzhin dngos po med grub pas gzhan las kyang ni 'byung ba med/
5518(mdo sde): rang nyid yod na gzhan yod 'gyur gzhan nyid yod na rang yod 'dod / de dag ltos pa can du grub pha rol tshul ro bzhin du gsungs gang tshe ci li'i ming ltos pa/ de tshe gang la
5519(mdo sde): gang zhig 'byung gang tshe ring la mi ltos pa/ de tshe thung sogs ga la mchis/ ji ltar cig sogs ma mchis pa/ 'das dang ma 'ongs la sogs pa
5520(mdo sde): nyon mongs rnam byang de bzhin te/ yang dag logs pa'ang rang las ci dngos gang rang gis ma mchis na/ de tshe tham cad ci zhig mchis gzhan rjes brjod pa gang lags des/ rang gi
5521(mdo sde): rang bzhin med na mi gang tshe gzhan gyis dngos med pa de tshe dngos rnam rang bzhin med/ de tshe gzhan dngos dngos 'dzin pa/ gdon gyis thebs pa ci zhig mchis/ gdongs ma nyid nas
5522(mdo sde): mnyan gyur pa/ rang bzhin gyis kyang mya ngan 'das yang dag par ni ma skyes lags te/ sla chos rnams khyod kyis gsungs/ blo ldan khyod kyis gsungs la sogs ngo bo nyid med
5523(mdo sde): rab stan/ dbu ba chu bur sgyu ma sogs/ smig rgyu chu shing 'dra ba lags/ dbang po rnams kyis gang dmigs te/ gal te yang dag mchis gyur na byis pa yang dag rig par 'gyur/
5524(mdo sde): de tshe yang dag shes pas ci/ dbang po rnams ni bems po dang / tshang ma nyid kyang ma yin dang / lung du ma bstan nyid dang ni logs par yongs shes khyod kyis gsungs/ gang
5525(mdo sde): gis ji bzhin mi rtogs pa/ yang dag ci bzhin thugs chud nas/ des na 'jigs rten mi shes pas/ dri ba pa shes kyang khyod kyis gsungs yod ces pa ni rtag par lta/ med
5526(mdo sde): ces pa ni chad par lta/ des na mtha' gnyis bral ba yin/ chos de khyod kyi snyan par mdzad/ des ni chos rnams su bzhi dang / bral bar khyod kyis bka' stsal lags na/
5527(mdo sde): tshig gi spyod yul gal lags/ rmi lam mig 'phrul las byung dang / zla ba gnyis la sogs mthong bzhin/ 'gro ba 'byung ba de'i dngos su/ ma byung de bzhin khyod kyis gzigs
5528(mdo sde): ji ltar rgyur bas rmi lam na 'byung ba mthong ba de bzhin du dngos po thams cad 'byung ba gzhan/ 'jig pa 'ang de bzhin bzhed pa lags de bzhin chags sogs sngags bsngal
5529(mdo sde): dang / 'khor ba sdug bsngal kun nyon mongs tshogs rdzogs pa dang thar pa dang / rmi lam 'dra bar khyod kyis gsungs de bzhin skyes dang ma skyes dang / 'ongs pa dang ni song ba ya
5530(mdo sde): de bzhin bcings grol yo shes dang gnyis 'dod yang dag rig ma lags gang la skyes pa yod ma lags de la mya ngan 'das gang yod/ sgyu ma'i glang po 'dra bas na/ don
5531(mdo sde): du gzod nas gzhi ba nyid/ skyes pa nyid na'ang ma skyes pa/ sgyu ma'i glang po ci bzhin bzhed/ de bzhin thams cad skyes pa yang / yang dag par ni ma skyes lags/ 'jig
5532(mdo sde): rten mgon po dpag med kyis sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa/ so sor mya ngan 'das mdzad kyang / de dag gis kyang ma bkrol/ thub chen gang phyir sems can rnams
5533(mdo sde): rang las ma skyes de'i phyir gang yang gang gis ma bkrol zhes de kang khyod kyis gsal bar gsungs ci ltar sbyar ma mkhan gyis byas dngos po stong pa de bzhin du byas pa thams
5534(mdo sde): cad dngos stong gzhan khyod gsungs de bzhin byed pa po// byed pa po yang gzhan gyis bgyis byas pa can du'ang 'gyur ba lags/ yang na de'i bya byed pa byed pa po ni thal ba
5535(mdo sde): 'gyur/ 'di dag thams cad mi tsam zhes khyod kyis gsang ni bstod de gsungs rjod pa las ni gzhan gyur pa/ brjod par gyi ba yod ma mchis/ de phyir
5536(mdo sde): ches rnams thams cad ni rtog pa tsam zhes khyod kyi gsungs/ gang gis stong par rnam rtog pa'i rtog pa yang ni med ces gsungs/ dngos dang dngos med gnyis 'das pa/
5537(mdo sde): la lar ma 'das pa yang lags shes pa med ces shes bya 'ang med/ med min yod min gang lags dang / gang yang gcig min dus ma min gnyis ga ma yin ci yang mi na
5538(mdo sde): bzhi med pa dang mi gsal dang / bsam mi khyab dang dpe med dang / gang yang mi skye mi 'jig dang / chad pa med cing rtag med pa de ni nam mkha' 'dra ba lags yi ge ye shes
5539(mdo sde): spod yul min de ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung de nyid stong par khyod bzhed lags dam pa'i chos kyang de ltar bu de bzhin gshegs pang de dang tshungs de ni de nyid don dam dang de bzhin
5540(mdo sde): nyid dang rdzas su bzhed de ni yang dag mi slu ba de stsogs pas na yang dag brjod sangs rgyas rnams dang chos kyi dbyings des na don du tha mi dang / bdag nyid dang ni gzhan rnams
5541(mdo sde): kyang des na mnyam par khyod bzhed lags/ dngos po rnams las stong bzhin min de med par yang dngos po med de phyir rten cing 'byung ba'i dngos stong pa lags par khyod kyi stan/
5542(mdo sde): rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba lags gzhan gyis dbang dang kun rdzogs te/ gzhan gyis dbang zhes rab tu gsungs dam pa'i don ni bcos ma min ngo bo nyid dang rab zhi dang yang dag
5543(mdo sde): rdzas dngos yod pang lags/ brtags pa'i dngos po med pa nyid gzhan gyis dbang ni yongs pa lags brtag pa'i dngos po yod ces pa sgro 'dog lag par khyod kyis gsungs
5544(mdo sde): byas pa chang bas med ces pa lags par khyod kyis gsungs yang dag shes la chad pa med rtag pa nyid kyang med par bzhed 'gro ba dngos pos stong pa lags de slad mi rmyi 'dra
5545(mdo sde): bar bzhed/ ji ltar ri dgas skyong chu ni chad med rtag pa yod ma yin de bzhin 'gro ba thams cad kyang / chad med rtag pa med par gsungs gang la rdzas shig skye 'gyur ba de
