5546(mdo sde): la chad sogs 'jig pa'i byang de la 'jig rten mtha' yod dang / mtha' med par yang 'gyur ba lags shes pa yod pas shes bya bzhin shes bya yod pas de bzhin she/
5547(mdo sde): gang tshe gnyis ga ma skyes por rtogs pa de tshe ci zhig yod/ de ltar sgyu ma la sog dpes/ sman pa'i mchog gyis gsal bstan nas lta ba thams cad gos byed pa/ dam
5548(mdo sde): ba'i chos ni bsten pa lags ngo bo med pa nyid bstan pa/ de ni yang dge dma'i lags dngos po'i don gyis zin rnams kyi gso ba de ni bla na med chos kyis mchod sbyin bla na
5549(mdo sde): med pa/ des na chos kyis mchod sbyin pa mchod sbyin rim pas rtag rgyun tu 'jig rten gsum po sprin bsreg mdzad dngos 'dzin 'jigs pa gcod bgyid pa bdag med pa
5550(mdo sde): ros gi'i sgra/ rmang byung de ni khyod kyis gsungs/ stong pa nyid dang chos zab po'i chos kyi rnga chen brdungs pa lags ngo'i nyid med spra bo che'i/ chos kyi dung ni bus pa
5551(mdo sde): lags sangs rgyas ston pa bdud rtsi yi chos kyi rdzas ni gsungs pa lags/ chos rnams kyis ni stong pa nyid nges pa'i don to zhes kyang bstan/ gang yA
5552(mdo sde): skye dang 'gog la glos/ sems can srog la sos bstan pa/ de ni bkro don de kun rdzob/ mgon po khyod kyis bstan pa lags shes rab pha rol phyin mtsho yi/ pha rol gang
5553(mdo sde): gis rab byin te/ bsod nams yon tan rin chen phyag/ khyod kyi yon tan pha rol byin de ltar dpe med bsam mi khyab/ mgro ba'i mgor po bston pa yi/ bdag gis bsod
5554(mdo sde): nam gang thob des/ 'gro la khyod dang mtshungs par shog bsam gis mi khyab par bstod pa/ slong pon ku grub kyis mdzad pa rdzog s+ho// @#rgya gar skad du/
5555(mdo sde): ga na a wa r+yan sto tra/ bod skad du/ yon tan mtha' yas par bstod pa thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i yon tan mtha' ma 'tshal bas gal te/
5556(mdo sde): khyod bsngag mi brjod na/ 'ga' yang khyod stod mi bgyid khyod 'byor pa 'gro bas rtogs ma mchis gang slad 'gro 'dris khyod la bstod pa bgyis kyang nongs pa ma mchis pa/
5557(mdo sde): de slang don 'dir bdag ni blo gros rab tu chung yang brtson pa lags srid gsum dag la phan brtson blo mda' ngan song gnas na'ang bsngag par 'os/ rang don smon pa'i blo
5558(mdo sde): gros can ni mya ngan 'das kyang ma lags shes/ de bla khyod ni 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas mi ldog brtan zhing mi g.yo bas/ 'jig rten skye zhing mchis pas nyams thag
5559(mdo sde): yongs su bskyes par brtson pa lags srid pa'i 'gro ba dag tu sdug bsngal rnams kyi smras pa'i sems can la/ bdag gi blo gros rtsub pos sdug bsngal rnams mang de dang de
5560(mdo sde): bsgrubs pas de phyir bdag gis de dag rnams la bde ba bskyed phyir bzod bya zhes de slang khyod ni 'gro la zhi ba'i bde ba bskyed slad brtson lags/ sems can gang dag mi rig
5561(mdo sde): mdongs bsams pas bsam pa rgud pa'i blo gros can pha dang bur gyur rnams kyis bdag la gnyen mnyam byams pas phan bstan pa/ de dag btung nas gcig pu thar bar
5562(mdo sde): byed pa bdag gis tshul min zhes de slad khyod kyis 'gro ba mgon med des thar bgyid slad smon lam btab/ sngon cad 'khor bar sdug bsngal kun tu myong gyur tshe na bdag la
5563(mdo sde): ni/ gang dag yun ring ngo bshes bya mas sems ldan pas lan brgyar grogs byas pa/ bde ba thob tshe de dag bkol nas ji ltar yongasu spad bya zhes/ de slad khyod ni bdad
5564(mdo sde): rtsi'ang sems can dang thun mong gsol par btson/ mchog sprin 'gro ba sems can rnams dang lhan cig long spang 'das dgongs na de dag ngos par yongasu mi gtong bas na khyod
5565(mdo sde): kyis bstan pa ni ji ltar khyod nyid ni cor 'khrungs tshe ljon shing gzhon nu legs spyad pa'i ljon shing rgas par gyur kyang yongasu mi gtong de ltar brtson pa lags/ gang slad 'gro ba
5566(mdo sde): mya ngan ma bslang mya ngan khyod 'da' blo ma byung / bde shegs go 'phang ba rnyed par nus pa ma lags de mi mdzad/ de slad khyod ni kun mkhyen yon tan gter dag brnyes mdzes slang
5567(mdo sde): @du brtson/ bstobs bcu'i yon tan dag gis mdzad pa las gzhan khyod la phra mi mnga' gang su la la dag gis bde gshegs go 'phang ba rnyed pa de
5568(mdo sde): dag kyang / 'di bas shin du smras pa'i gnas skabs dag tu lhung ba byung ngo zhes/ de slad khyod kyi nyams rang lhung ba'i tshe yang dag nyid slad ma mdzad bdag la smod pa mi rung
5569(mdo sde): skyes bu dar pa zhum par bgyid pa lags/ gang slad gal te rong la rag 'bad pas byang chub thob gyur na/ sangs rgyas byang chub rnyed dka' lags snyam du khyod kyis blo gros
5570(mdo sde): byung / de slad khyod kyis nyam nga'i dus su 'ang kun mkhyen smon lam btab zlog pa/ dmad la rga ba rnams kyis tshigs dag khyod kyis khyad gsad par mdzad nyon mongs chu bo
5571(mdo sde): 'khrugs dang ngan 'gro'i kha dag rtag tu gdangs pa dang / so so'i skye bo g.yo dang sdig pa'i grog po rtag par rgyun tu gnas pa dang / thub rnams rnyed par dka' zhes de zhes de ltar
5572(mdo sde): sems zhum 'gro ba stong pa'i rgyu/ gang lags de nyid khyod kyi thugs rje rtag tu skye ba'i rgyur yang gyur/ ji ltar 'gro ba rnam la khyod blo shin tu byam skye ba ltar 'jig rten 'di
5573(mdo sde): dag rang lang 'ang byams pa'i blo gro skye bar mi 'gyur la/ 'jig rten 'phongs pa'i gnas skabs gyur na bdag nyid gtong ba bgyid/ khyod ni shin tu nyam pa'i dus su 'gro
5574(mdo sde): ba gtong bar bzhed ma mchis gang zhig skye bo dman dang phongs pa re ba'i bsam ldan mthong na yang / brtse med 'bras bu 'dod pas snod gzhan yon tan ldan tshol ba/ bsam rlag
5575(mdo sde): de ni sbyin pa byed kyang slong ba rnams dang mtshungs so// zhes de slad de ni thugs rjes slongs rnams la sbyin par bzhed la zhugs/ 'ga' zhig rang nyid du ma dul bzhin du rig par ldan
5576(mdo sde): pa'i tshig smra yang rang gi tshig dang 'gal bar spyod pas gzhan dag 'dul bar mi nus shes khyod kyis nas de slad 'gro ba mtha' dag thugs la gzhag mdzod nas/ re shig bdag
5577(mdo sde): nyid mdul ba nyid dul bar mdzad phyir brtson pa lags gang slad mkhas pa rnams kyi mi dge'i las kyang zhi ba'i bde bar 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'phags pas mi dge ba dag kun
5578(mdo sde): tu rten 'os ma yin zhes/ de slad khyod ni rtag tu rang bzhin yongs su dag pas sdig las log ngan song 'jigs pas ma lag lha'i bde sprad bzhed pa'i phyir ma lags gang
5579(mdo sde): dag 'gro la mi lta bdag nyid zhi bar 'gro bar bgyid slad spyod bgyid pa/ des kyang ji ste brtson pa ma bsten slad cad bsam rdzogs mi 'gyur na/ gang gis 'gro ba ma lus sgra
5580(mdo sde): la phyir brtson pa brtsams pas ci smos shes de slad khyod kyis rang gi bde la ma gzigs byang chub slad du brtson khyod kyis 'byor par chung ba'i tshe yang smin par bzhed pa ma spangs
5581(mdo sde): la bdog pa chung yang slong ba rnams la zhum mi mnga' ba'i thug stsal dbang phyug chen po mnga' yang tshul dang 'gal ba'i tha snyad mi mnga' la na chod lang tshor gyur kyang 'dod pa/
5582(mdo sde): rnams la thugs ni chags mi mnga' khyod kyi thos dang blo gros che ba'i tshe na'ang bdag stong ma mdzad la/ 'gro ba yon tan chung ba gzhan rnams kyang ni mthon por bkur bar/
5583(mdo sde): 'gyur yon tan tshogs la gnas tshe/ nyid kyi spyod pa nyes pa chung ngu'ang bzung 'gro ba chu gong rnam la rtsol ba mi mnga' bde bar gnas pas bzhugs
5584(mdo sde): khyod kyi thugs ni srid dang nyon mongs skyo bas zhi la dgyes gyur kyang / thugs rje nyid kyis mdzad pa'i yon tan skyes po rnams dang rje su mthun byed par ma gtogs gzhan
5585(mdo sde): gis 'bras bu mi myong bar ni khyod mkhyen kyang / 'on kyang sems can rnams kyis 'byor pa skyed slad bsod rnams bdar khyod la shes la sogs yon tan gang dag rtag tu
5586(mdo sde): mnga' gyur pa/ de dag khyod kyis 'gro ba dag gis don rnams nyid du nye bar spyad/ de las khyod kyi bsod rnams 'bras bu gzhan du mchis pa ma lags la de dag 'gro ba'i 'byor
5587(mdo sde): slang yongasu bsngos kyang don ma mchis ma lags/ khyod la gzhan la sman pa'i thabs dang bral ba'i dus 'gar 'ang byung ma gyur/ thabs chud ma gyur 'bras bu ma mchis ma
5588(mdo sde): lags 'bras bu chung ma lags bsod nam chung ngu rtsom pa dag la khyod ni mngon pagyes ma lags la/ bsod nams chu bo dag gis ngom par ma gyur chab kyi rgya mtsho bzhin/
5589(mdo sde): mtshan mo ston ka'i zla ba nya ba'i mdabs kyis nyams dgar gyur pa dang / rdzing bu ud dpal rgyas pa gnyis dral mig la 'dom brjid byed rnams dang / ro bo ljon shing me to/
5590(mdo sde): rgyas pa brgyas yis rtse mo dkrigs rnams kyi/ gzhan la gcig tu smang bgyes khyod kyis blo gros 'bogs par rdo mi thog/ 'jig rten sdug bsngal dag gis smad tshe khyod ni/
5591(mdo sde): nyid la byams pa yis yul gis dgas bsten nyamasu slang byi min zhes thugs rje'i blo mkhyen nas gling bzhi dbang phyug mnga' yang yul rnams kyis ni thugs kyang mi 'phrogs la
5592(mdo sde): khyod bzhin smad lhur gzhes mdzad pas dus dag shin tu 'das par bgyi/ phyug cig 'byor pa slong ba rnams kyis legs par ma byas dang du khrod ljon shing med tog rgyas pa'i lding
5593(mdo sde): kyis g.yur za mtshungs so zhes/ de slad bsod nams dman pa'i 'byor pa dag la slong rnams mi spong bas/ khyod kyis rnor slong ba ma mchis pa na thugs la bcags par gyur/
5594(mdo sde): gang zhig brtse med sred pas tshong ba bzhin du 'bras bu'i phyir stsal nas/ des ni 'bras bu yang ni slong ba rnams la sbyin par sgro ma mchis/ gang gi slad du khyod kyis gtong ba rtag
5595(mdo sde): tu gzhan dman gyur pa de slad de'i 'bras bu 'ang slong rnams kyis rang gi legs par gzung ri ngos ljon shing 'bras bu smin pa dag du rnams lta bu dang / dgon pa'i rdzing bu skyed
5596(mdo sde): shing bzang pos bkor bar dag tu ngal rnams ltar 'dzem med slong bas bgyes pa khyod la bag phebs 'byor pa mtshal ba yi/ slongs mo pa dag kun nas myur bar
5597(mdo sde): mngon du lcags sdong cig mchis/ dpal 'byor 'bangs dang btsun mo rang gi sha dang srog kyang gtong ba na khyod kyi sras bzhon rab sdug ston zla ches pa dri med gzugs ldan
5598(mdo sde): pa 'ang / slong ba rnams la gtong bar mdzad la brtson par gyur pa ji lta ba de ltar gtong la goms pa khyod kyi thugs la stan pa nyid le byung / gang zhig thog par gyur na'ang
5599(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'di la gnod pa bsgyel gyur dang / gang yod khyod nyid kyis kyang yun ring sku rnams bzhes par mi spyod pa'i spyad pa de dag khyod las rgos
5600(mdo sde): pas dus su rang gi dang nyid gyur/ de skad yon tan dag ni yongs goms ma bgyis spel bar dka' ba lags/ 'jig ltar sman pa doms kyis zin la gdon rnams bsal bar
5601(mdo sde): bgyid slad du/ rdeg cing tshig rtsub smra ba spyod kyang zin pa nyid la rdeg mi bgyid de ltar khyod kyang nyon mongs nyid la brtse dang bral bas sbyor mdzad kyis/ 'gro ba nyon mongs gyur pa
5602(mdo sde): la ni khyod nyid thugs rje mdzad pa gas khyod kyis rtag tu yon tan nor lhag rnams lus gus pas bsngags pa mdzad mnyam pa rnams la yon tan goms par bgyi slang byas
5603(mdo sde): pa'i thugs kyi spang / dman pa thugs rjes brtson pa mchog gi yon tan rnams bkrun te/ 'gro ba rnams la khyod kyis ji ltar rigs par mdzad par zhugs ji ltar ma ma rang lus sna
5604(mdo sde): tshogs thabs tshul mang pos 'dzin gyis kyang / gzhon nu'i nang bsal mched lags dga' skyed ma lags lus phyir ma lags pa de slad khyod kyang brtson pa chen pos yon tan bdag
5605(mdo sde): nyid bskrun mdzad pa 'gro bas longs spyod chen lags grags dang gzhan dag zil gzhan ched mo lags/ khyod kyis blo gros gzhan la sman pa'i thabs mkhyen mdzad slad zhugs kyur
5606(mdo sde): pa da 'di ltar khyod kyis thugs rjes rnam pa de dag nyid la zhugs lags gdang / khyod ni brtson 'grus 'phags pas brtsal ba che yang mnyel bar ma gyur pa/ de gsum dag
5607(mdo sde): gis khyod kyis gzhan sma nam bsgrubs chung zad byung ma gyur/ khyod ni 'bang brtsol chen po can gyis 'phrin las mnga' bar mi bzhed la smod ba shin tu rmad byung ba gcig tu/
5608(mdo sde): bsam yas 'di yang byung gang slad khyod kyi sems can ma mchis pa thugasu chud gyur kyang / 'di ltar sems can don gyi slad du grags med dus su 'di srid par zhugs
5609(mdo sde): gang slad shes rab don dam rten cing snying rje kun rdzob rten mdzad pa de slang don bzhin dgongs mdzad khyod la sems can mchis pa ma lags kyang gang tshe khyod ni stobs
5610(mdo sde): bcu skyed pa'i thugs rdzob dag dang ldan gyur pa/ de tshe 'gro ba nyams thag rnams la khyod byams bu la pha byams bzhin 'gro ba btugs dang nyon mongs pas byang chub
5611(mdo sde): mchog thob mchis la/ nyon mongs phyogs pas rang la sman par bgyid pa'ang thob 'gyur ma lus pa/ de slad khyod kyis byang chub brnyed slad brtson 'grus bstan pa mdzad pan/
5612(mdo sde): nyon mongs nges par ma bsreg rang gi dum bu bzhin du yang bar mdzad khyod kyi nyon mongs dran dang mkhyen pas zung bas yon tan sna tshogs 'grubs/ nyon mongs pa dag yang
5613(mdo sde): bar gyur pa byang chub rgyur yang nye bar 'gyur legs te/ 'di ltar de yis khyod slo shul gol yul can du yang ma bgyis la/ 'gro ba rnamasu skye ba brgyur ba 'ang yon tan rnam
5614(mdo sde): kyis zhing du mdzad 'gro ba nyon mongs gyur dang sdug bsngal brgya dag byung las bcom pa yis/ rtsol dang bral zhing mgon ma mchis pas gang dang gang du pyod bgyid pa/ 'gro/
5615(mdo sde): @ba der ni nyon mongs dgra thul khyod nyid thugs rje spyod pa ni srid pa len dang gtong dang gnas pa dag la mnga' dbang mchis pa lags ci yang med pa'i skye
5616(mdo sde): mchid kyis ni yul can phra rgyas rnam brtsom nas de dag spangs pa'i thabs tshul gang lags dam pa'i tshegs la yun ring bshad pa mdzad sa sum sman pa'i thabs khas khyod kyis
5617(mdo sde): phyir yang drangs nas ni/ dud 'gro dag tu 'ang smon pa mdzad nas skyes brgya phrag rnams kyang mdzad/ sngon gi smi dge'i 'phrin las rnam par ma nges gang lags pa/ de dag dud
5618(mdo sde): 'gro'i bar gshegs la gzhol ba khyod la mnga' mchis pas khyod kyis rna srin chen du drangs te thugs la dgongs pa'i don bsgrub pa/ drang srong gis bshad gsal bsngags zhibs
5619(mdo sde): dug gi shugs dag zlog pa bzhin/ khyod kyis rtag tu mi dge'i chos dang ga yul dag sprad par gyur pa na/ 'gro ba dar mdzad mkhas pa khyod kyis 'gro ba de dang der spyod pa'i/ tshul khris
5620(mdo sde): ma 'bad tu zhugs ldan pa bzhin du gyur pa ji lta ba/ de ltar dam pa'i spyod lugs byang chub bsgrubs pa dag la goms par mdzod/ ma bzhin res 'ga'ang thugs rje dag dang ma bral
5621(mdo sde): mgon ma mchis rnams kyi/ sdug bsngal de dag bsal slad 'gro ba sdug bsngal can dag tu/ bsnyengs dang bral bar spyod pa mdzad pa khyod kyi thabs la mkhas pa ni/ bsgrub
5622(mdo sde): bar dga' dang rnyes par dka' ba dga' yang byung bar ma gyur lags/ gang slad sna tshogs thabs kyis 'gro ba sdig pa bying 'dal khyod la ni/ dung 'gro'i 'gro ba dag lang bad
5623(mdo sde): 'gro bzhin du don chen kho nar gyur/ ngan song dag tu 'khrungs na'ang legs par spyod pa nyams pa mi mnga' ba/ de slad khyod kyis sdig pa'ang yon tan 'gyur bas dge ba/
5624(mdo sde): nyid dang mtshungs/ khyod la legs brten kha cig byang chub gsum la blo gros cig rigs zhugs/ de bzhin bzhin dag bsam gtan gzugs med dag la go'i phang gzhag pa
5625(mdo sde): mdzad/ kha cig gtong la zhugs shing des tshul mchid kyis 'tshal gyur pas/ khyod kyis 'jig rten dag na sman yon btags pa ni dgar ma mchis/ khyod kyis 'jig
5626(mdo sde): rten dag na 'gro ba gang rnams nges par thar 'tshal ba/ bde 'gror nye bar drangs shing dge ba yongs su smin pa nyid du mdzad/ khyod kyis 'gro ba zhi mdzad slad du 'gro ba rnams
5627(mdo sde): su spong ba na/ drang srong chen bzhin dag dus bzhin byung bas zhi bar mdzad pa bzhin/ gang slad khyod ni 'gro ba'i skyes pa bcad dang rdzogs sangs rgyas mdzang ma gtogs
5628(mdo sde): par/ gzhan gi skye bzhi par mi 'gyur snyam du blo gros des gyur pa/ de slad byang chub gzhol ba'i thugs mnga' khyod kyi srid rtse man can gyi/ lam rnams tshul bzhin ston
5629(mdo sde): par mdzad pas dus dag bzla bar gyur pa lags/ gang zhig rtogs par ma gyur pa yis 'jig rten ma rigs 'dongs gyur la/ 'gro ba sdug bsngal mang po rgyu zhing 'chi ba
5630(mdo sde): bdag mtshams las mi 'da' ba yis/ 'phags lam 'jig med sdod kyi drang srong che rnams rjes gshegs gang legs pa/ de ni khyod kyi 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal mthar khrun
5631(mdo sde): @# slad du nyid kyi mkhyen/ ji ltar dus mtha'i tshe na nyi ma du mas chab bskems 'jig rten 'di/ zhugs chen 'tshed blo gros khros ltar bus thal ba dag dang sreg
5632(mdo sde): bgyid pa/ de ltar dregs bral khyod kyi nyon mongs bsrabs par gyur pa'i bag chags kyang / ye shes zhugs chen 'bar ba dag gis nges par bsregs par gyur pa lags/ gang
5633(mdo sde): dag sa gsum bla ma rnams la nges par gnas par 'tshal ba dag/ mun pa chu du dang yang lhan cig gnas par 'tshal ba gang lags pa'i/ yon tan mtha' yas dag mngon
5634(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas chen dus cig tu/ shing la bya rnams gnas bzhin du gyur pa khyod kyis ga las brnyes/ nyi ma 'od zer bsal ba ston ldan zla ba sprin dang bra bar gyur pas/
5635(mdo sde): lhag par dga' bar bgyid pa nam mkha'i dkyil na des par gnas gyur kyang / gang gis khebs pa'i 'gro ba'i srid pa'i mgon pa thibs por 'khyim bgyid pa'i/ mi rig mun nag
5636(mdo sde): rab tu zhi ba'i thabs tshul khyod kyis bstan/ sdug bsngal khyab pa 'di yin de bar 'gyur ba'i kun 'byung 'di/ de mthar thugs pa 'di yin de rtogs la gzhol ba'i thabs
5637(mdo sde): 'di zhes/ de ltar tshangs pa zla 'od gcad ma dge kyang bstan/ deg rtogs bgyid skye ba dman dang tshangs pa'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ ji srid nyi mi'i snang ba gang lags de ni
5638(mdo sde): nub kyi ri dbang gis/ nyi ma nub par ma bgyis de srid rab rib rab tu zhi bar bgyi // khyod kyis skye shing mthar gtug bgyi slad thabs tshul bstan pa gang lags pa/ de ni
5639(mdo sde): khyod nyid zhi bar gshegs kyang snying gi mun nag zhi mdzad lags/ de ltar tshangs pa'i gtso lha'i po bla mar gyur pa tshangs gter gis/ btod bgyis bstong par 'os pa bde
5640(mdo sde): gshegs mngon gsum bzhugs bzhin bstong bgyis pas/ bdag gis bsod nams gter dag bsngalas pa gang lags de yis 'gro ba rnams/ drang srong chen po rnam
5641(mdo sde): kyis dgongs pa'i legs pa gang lags der gyur cig/ yon tan mtha' yas par bstod pa/ slo dpon dkon mchog 'bangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gi mkhan po
5642(mdo sde): sarbad nya de dang lo ts+tsha ba ban+de rin chen mchog gis bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de dpal brtsegs kyi zhus te gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya man dzu shi ba
5643(mdo sde): ha ra ka ka ru na stod tra ma/ bod skad du/ rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gi snying rje la bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// nyes pa ma
5644(mdo sde): lus pa ni rnams bsal cing / thub pa'i grags pas 'gro ba ma lus khyab/ dpal ldan rab tu bstan pa'i sku mda' ba/ 'jam dpal khyod la rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo//
5645(mdo sde): bos shing pos 'gro ba ma lus pa/ 'di dag phongs pa kun las khyod skyob mdzad/ bdag ni sdug bsngal gyur kyang dman khyed ces/ ci'i phyir na nges par sel mi mdzad/
5646(mdo sde): bcom ldan khyod ni rtag par thams cad la/ rnam pa kun tu thams cad stsal grag na/ bdag la mthong ba tsam yang ma stsal bas/ de phyir bdag ni shin tu bskal dman lhags
5647(mdo sde): yon tan ldan zhing nyes pa sel mdzad pa/ blo bzang 'gro kun skyob par brtson gyur na/ bdag blo khyod la mngon du zhes na yang / phongs pas gdungs pa nyid
5648(mdo sde): du ci phyir gyur/ thugs rje'i bdag nyid snga na khyod kyi ni/ pad+ma lta bu'i lha'i spyan gnyis kyis/ 'gro la phan par mdzad kyang bdag sdug par/ ma gzigs pa ni skye ma sdug bsngal
5649(mdo sde): lo// khyod kyi 'jig pa dbugs 'byin mdzad pa yin/ phyag gi pad+ma rang du rtag rkyong yang / bdag bskal nyes pa'i tsha bas de yang ni/ zag ring du ni mi snang nyid du gyur/ khyod
5650(mdo sde): kyi stan ni ma nyams gtsang ba dag/ gnyis kyis kyang mi lus la sdug bsngal gyis/ gzir te spyan sngar 'o dong 'bod gyur kyang / dman pa bdag ni ci phyir gnas ma gyur/ rnam
5651(mdo sde): ba kun tu thugs rjes drangs khyod kyis/ dmyal bar song ba'i 'gro ba yang bde mdzad na/ sdig can bdag la bcom ldan 'das kyi ni/ thugs rje de yang ba rtse ba mi mngar gyur/
5652(mdo sde): 'jig rten dman la phan par mdzad pa yin/ khyod la gzhon nu'i rol pa 'di mnga' na/ gang 'di bdag ni sdug bsngal gyis gzir kyang / skyob par mi mdzad sdig can bas
5653(mdo sde): pa'i nyes/ 'di na sdug bsngal bskal can gang yin zhing / glen pa gang gis phun tshogs zad gyur ces/ de ltar rnams par rgyu zhing skyob mdzad kyang / bdag phongs ma gzigs
5654(mdo sde): kye ma'o ngo tshar che/ gang zhig la ni tshig sbyin gang zhig la/ 'phral du phun tshogs rgya chen sbyin bya zhes/ de ltar brtson pa'i khyod kyi mkhyen rab kyis/ ci'i phyir na bdag la skyo
5655(mdo sde): mi mdzad/ khyod la dang bar gyur pa su mi bde/ khyod dang bsod nams dman pa gang zhig mchis/ bdag ni khyod la dad kyang sdug bsngal bar/ ci phyir gyur ces ngo mtshar
5656(mdo sde): rnam par 'khrungs/ ge sdug bsngal gcod mdzad dman pa chen po ni/ gal te khyod kyang bdag la spong mdzad na/ bsod nams bcom pa bdag ni gzhan su la/ skyabs su
5657(mdo sde): mchi bar bgyi ba khyod kyis gsungs/ 'gro la rtag tu bu cig 'dra ba yi/ rtse ba'i thugs rje mnga' zhing sgol spyod pa/ khyod kyang gal te bdag gnod mi gsel ba/ de tshe bdag
5658(mdo sde): ni mgon med bcom pa lags/ bcom ldan khyod ni dran pa tsam gyis kyang / 'gro la 'bras bu mnyam med kun stsol na/ bdag ni bsnyen bkur bgyid kyang rgyab phyogs shing /
5659(mdo sde): rnam pa kun tu phyi shol ci phyir mdzad/ de ltar smre gsol ba yis khyod yod tan/ cha tsam brjod las bdag gi dge gsags pa/ gang yin des ni bsod nams ye shes
5660(mdo sde): dag/ rgya cher rang bzhin grub pa'i bum pa bzang / brla ni yid bzhin grub pa ltar bu dang / zhabs gnyis rgyu ba'i dpag bsams shing 'dra ba'i/ khyod kyi gzhon nu'i gzug
5661(mdo sde): su bdag gyur cig/ skye ba kun du bdag po nyid gyur cig/ rje brdzun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi snying rje la bstod pa/ slo dpon 'phags pa sgo sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho//
5662(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po pan ding d+ha dzad rang dan dngang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phag/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya lo ki te na
5663(mdo sde): ri s+ya b+hu ba tra ya sta pa/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsum gi bstod pa'i mgon po spyan ras gzigs
5664(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten bla mas gsum gyi phyag byas/ lha dbang chengs pa mchog gis bstod pa ste/ thug mchog rgyal po myur du dngos grub stsal/ spyan ras gzigs
5665(mdo sde): 'gon mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// bder gshegs rang bzhin bdud rtsi'i ngo bo 'tshang ba sna tshogs mtshan gyis spras pa'i sku lus mchog/ bde gshegs 'od dpag med kyi/
5666(mdo sde): dbu rgyan can/ gser gyi bad mas g.yon pa'i phyag brgyan pa/ dri med ral ba 'khyil nag cung zad ser/ zla ba'i dbyings 'dra' gsal zhing rdzogs pa'i zhal/ pad+ma ltar
5667(mdo sde): yangs mchogs tu mdzes pa'i spun/ 'khur ba gangs kyi dum bu lta bur dkar/ ri dgas rgyal po dga' bzhin zhal sgros dmar/ nyi ma 'char kha ltar gcod kyi 'dog/
5668(mdo sde): pad+ma gzhon nu lci bur mchu dmar la/ ston ka'i sprin tshegs lta ba'i sgra sgrogs pa/ dpung gnyis sna tshogs mtshan gyi mdzes pa ste/ phyag mthil dang mgon nu lta bur 'jam/
5669(mdo sde): ri dgas dpags pa sku'i stong na mnams/ snyan gnyis sna rgya nag yon zhing mdzes pa mnga'/ chal ni yangs shing lte ba zab pa ste/ pad+ma dri ma med pa ltar bu lags/ gser
5670(mdo sde): mchog ska regs nor bu'i rgyan ldan pa/ maza' ma rjes pas skra'i smad brgyan pa/ rgyal ba'i ye shes rgya mtsho'i pha rol ro byon/ bsod nams du ma la ni 'khrungs pa'i mchog
5671(mdo sde): rims dang nang mjoms bde ba mchog skyed pa/ srid pa mthar mdzad mkha' la khyu dang / kun tu rgyu bas sku mchog la bstod pa/ bdud ris sna tshogs stobs ni nges par/
5672(mdo sde): 'joms/ zhabs mchog rkang dub mchog gyis sgra sgrogs pa/ glang po dregs dang ngang ba'i stabs su gshegs bdud rtsi chen pa thugs chud yongs rdzogs brnyes/ gser bzhin
5673(mdo sde): rtag tu bgyes pa'i rgyan mnga' ba/ ri bo 'bru 'dzin na ni 'gyes pas bzhugs/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug las gsum gyis bstod pa/ dge slong mas
5674(mdo sde): mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ ba ra Na ra ha ba ra Na b+ha ga ba to bud d+ha s+yAd te/ mur d+ha a ba she ko nas ma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la stod pa/
5675(mdo sde): bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa la phyag 'tshal ba zhes byas pa/ bcom ldan khyod ni zhal bzhugs tshe/ bdag ni dad dbang gzhol gyur pa/ gang slad thugs rjes brlan pa/
5676(mdo sde): yid sangs rgyas spyan ras gzigs mdzad pa/ khyod kyi thugs rje de nyid ni/ yid la mchis pa mngon gyis gnas/ phyag bgyis 'os pa lnga bdag/ mngon shin du phyag
5677(mdo sde): 'tshal lo// kun khyen ma lags gang gis kyang / kun mkhyen khyod ko ji ltar rtogs/ bdag nyid che rgyas bdag nyid kyis/ mkhyen pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo 'di lags
5678(mdo sde): 'di dro'o zhes bgyir khyod bdag 'dra ba yis yul ma lags gang 'dra 'di mi bsngon ste/ khyod 'dra ba la phyag 'tshal lo// mgon po khyod ni nyid dang 'dra rgyal rnam
5679(mdo sde): pa geng
5680(mdo sde): ci 'dra khyod dang 'dra/ gang 'dra gzhan dga'ang ma mchis pa/ de 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar khyod ni nyid kyis kyang / ji ltar/
5681(mdo sde): khyod ni 'dras mkhan/ ji ltar khyod gzhan ma 'tshal pa/ de 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar khyod ni bdag nyid kyis/ thugs rje stobs bcu la sogs pa/ yon
5682(mdo sde): tan rnams kyis bsgrags mdzad pa/ de 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di nas bzung ste khyod kyis ni yon tan 'byung nas snying po dag de nyid las ni mngon datus nas ci nus
5683(mdo sde): khyod la phyag bgyi'o// dgra bcom khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dang / mchod 'os khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud rigs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dang khyod la bdud cing phyag 'tshal lo//
5684(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen te/ rin chen chos kyi rang bzhin lags dge 'dun rin chen 'byung gnas te/ rin chen gsum tshogs khyod la 'dud kyi gzugs la rin chen te/
5685(mdo sde): thugs kyis dgongs pa 'ang rin chen lags dam chos rin chen 'byung gnas te/ kun nas rin chen khyod la 'dud rin chen kun la mchog gyur pas/ rin chen thams cad zil
5686(mdo sde): gyi gnon/ rin chen kun 'byung nas pa/ yang dag rin chen khyod la 'dud / phyag 'tshal rin chen skran khyod la/ phyag 'tshal rin chen thugs khyod la phyag 'tshal rin chen chos
5687(mdo sde): khyod la/ phyag 'tshal thams cad rin chen la srid med bsgom pa goms pas/ thug pa kun gi mchog gyur pa/ phyag bgyid 'os pa dgra bcom pa khyod la gus par phyag
5688(mdo sde): 'tshal lo// 'gal bar bgyis/ ba ma lags pa/ yang dag mtha' las gnas pa'o// dge slong gis ni mthar phyin pa bla med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rnams pa
5689(mdo sde): thams cad phun tshogs pas mdzes ma gzhan kun zil gnon cing / dus rnams kun tu dga' mdzad pas sangs rgyas pa dam khyod la bdang kha dog bzang la dri zhim zhing /
5690(mdo sde): blta na sdug la mi rnyeb/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dkar/ kha bye khyod la phyag 'tshal lo bde ba'i snying kur rab spangs pa bzhed dgur reg pa po// skyid par bskrun pa
5691(mdo sde): dge sbyongs ni rab gzhon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo 'o brgya la 'bras bu mchis gyur pa mthar phyin mthar dag bsnyes nas ni/ dam pa gzung bar dam bcas pa'i dge sbyong khyod
5692(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs spyod rten cing rig byed pa rig pa rig byed kun gyis yan lag mkhyen rig dang zhabs kyis bsad pa yi/ tshangs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gag
5693(mdo sde): pa'i chos ni mi 'phrogs shing 'phogs pa'i 'phrin sa phul du byung / 'jig rten slo dpon bya ba mdzad/ 'phags pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bdad thugs ni dka' thub brtul
5694(mdo sde): zhugs dang / yang dag blangs pas gtsang mar mdzad sdig pa thams cad bkrus gyur pa/ khyus mdzad khyod la phyags 'tshal lo// mnga' bdag mchog ni brnyes gyur ci//
5695(mdo sde): sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon/ seng ge'i nga ro sgrogs mdzad pa/ seng ge khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rtogs pa brjod pa'i rjen shu la che/ dam chos po la ston pa
5696(mdo sde): mdzad chos gzhan thams cad 'jigs pa'o// glang chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chos nyid shin tu dkar ba'i lam khyod min gnan sgri mi
5697(mdo sde): bzod pa gsal mdzad gshegs pa 'jig rten gyis lam gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// des la shin tu dul gyur pa shugs dang mdog bzang stobs dang ldan yan lag
5698(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sku mnga' bcad mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo phyogs dang 'bab stegs sprod yul mkhyen brten la gya gyur bzhud mi mnga' khyu mchog gnas ni bsnyed pa yi//
5699(mdo sde): khyu mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gdul ba'i thabs ni mtha' dag la/ mkhas shing le lo mi mnga' ba skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur mchog rab khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
5700(mdo sde): gang slad khyod bstan mchis ni/ skal pa can yang don ma mchis de slad kun gyis tshangs spong du/ gyur pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo yon tan phun sum ldan pa/ kun yang dag
5701(mdo sde): shin du yongs rdzogs pas dge bas chos la 'dun pa kun rgyun bcad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// nyid kyis don ni rab rdzogs shing / gzhan gi don la mngon brtson pa/ dam
5702(mdo sde): chos bdud rtsi gsol pa po// tshim par mdzad pa khyod la 'dud 'jigs pa dums 'jigs gyur pa/ pha rol min pa'i mu spangs nas/ chu'o chen po leg rgal cing / pha ril
5703(mdo sde): gshegs pa khyod la bdud nyon mongs nang ni kun sel cing zug rngu thams cad 'byin mdzad pa/ rig sngags chung ba grub pa po// sman pa'i gtso bo khyod la ba dang tshogs
5704(mdo sde): dang mchog min lam mkhyen cing / zhi ba'i phyogs ni ston par mdzad grub dang bde ba skye ba yi/ de dpon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rtag tu mun pa sel mdzad cing rtag tu spun ni//
5705(mdo sde): 'byed par mdzad/ rtag tu mi snyel chos mngal ba/ shin tu bzhed pa khyod la 'dud dri ma'i mdam ni nges bkras nas/ dam chos dri ma med pa'i chu/ mchog tu rnams par bya
5706(mdo sde): ba bo// shin tu rnam dag khyod la 'dud sdig dang bsod nams spangs gyur cig stong pa nyid kyis bsgom pa'i bdag phan dang gnod pa bgyid snyom pa/ shin tu chags bral khyod
5707(mdo sde): la 'dad / kun nas nyon mongs bag chags kun nges par brtsal bas/ dri med thugs rnams par sgrib pa mi mnga' ba/ shin du rnam grol khyod la 'dang / blta bas mi ngos
5708(mdo sde): gzugs mnga' zhing / skra ni 'dod kyis lhag ger mdzad pa blta bya kun gyi nang na ni blta na sdug mchog khyod la 'dud/ skyes bu chen po'i chen rnams ni dpe byad bzang po'i
5709(mdo sde): tshogs bcas pa/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pas blta bsta 'os po khyod 'dud / sangs rgyas chos ni bla na med pa mi 'jigs pa dang stobs sogs kyis/ 'gro ba'i nang
5710(mdo sde): du sgra sgrags pa/ dga' bar 'os pa khyod la 'dud 'bags chos dkar po bla med pas goms par bya rnams kyis ni sku gnyis po dag bsgos gyur pa/ bsgom par bya ba khyod la
5711(mdo sde): bdud sku gsung thugs kyis 'phrin las rnams shin tu rnam par byang gyur pa/ tshul khrim srung ba las 'das pa gtsang sbra dag pa khyod la 'dud nyon mongs pa yi rjod pa spang ga zhing
5712(mdo sde): ba'i las kyi mtha' la dgongs mi gsung dang du bzhes mdzad pa/ thub pa zhi ba khyod la 'dud bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal gyis thugs mi 'phros pa
5713(mdo sde): bstan pa'i thugs thams cad zil gnon sems can gis snying po mchog gyur khyod la 'dud/ rten gyis blo dang dgos pa dag/ legs par gnas phyir mi bsnyel ba'i chos
5714(mdo sde): spyan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten 'das kyis yon tan phyug 'jig rten zang zing rnam par 'jig/ 'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa bo// 'jig rten mgon po khyod la 'dud
5715(mdo sde): bshes dang / dgra dang pha mar snyoms sems can kun la phan dgongs pa/ rjes su brtse bar mdzad pa po// thugs rje chen po khyod la 'dud/ chos kyis 'du shes kun rdzogs pa
5716(mdo sde): skyob pa mngon shes chen po mnga' byas mkhyen ma byas mkhyen pa po// thams cad mkhyen pa khyon la 'dud glags kyi skab ni kun spangs shing kun nas 'ching ba bcad gyur pa/
5717(mdo sde): shes rab bsal bar mdzad pa po// sred pa bsal bar khyod la 'dad mnyes par bgyi 'os phyag bgyid 'os/ brgal bar 'os min nongs mi mnga' 'bad de mchod par bgyi 'os
5718(mdo sde): pa rig pa gsum ldan khyod la 'dud phan pa ma lags sel mkhas shing phan pa skyed par mngon brtson pa gcig tu rtse bar gzho bla yi/ gshes mnyen dam pa khyod la 'dud ske
5719(mdo sde): dgu lam lo gzhugs pa rnams rtag tu dam pa'i lam la ni mngon phyogs mdzad par mngon brtson pa rtsa lag dam pa khyod la 'dud go 'phang mkhyen pa rnam kyis phul
5720(mdo sde): khyod kyi go 'phang gang brnyed nas rkang gnyis rnam kyis mchog gyur pa/ de las go 'phags ma mchis go 'bangs bla na med brnyes nas/ sdug bsngal thams cad sel mdzad ci
5721(mdo sde): mchags nye bar len mi mnga' rkang gnyis mchog gyur khyod la 'dud khyod kyis rten la ma brtan par 'gas kyang de nyid mi mthong bas 'jig rten long ba lta bu yi mig tu gyur pa khyod
5722(mdo sde): 'dud sa steng gdug sa ni ma mchis na zhugs mchis mar me 'ang mchis gyur la rgyu skar nor bu zla ba dag/ mchis kyang zla ba rdzogs mi 'gyur/ snang ba de dang gzhan dang ni de bas
5723(mdo sde): khyad par ches 'phags pa mchis kyang khyod ni mi bzhugs na 'gro ba snang ba ma mchis lags/ de ltas 'jig rten ma rigs pa mun nag thibs po'i ling thog gis/ bsgribs
5724(mdo sde): ba'i sems ldan snag gyur pa'i sgron mar gyur ba khyod la 'dung chos la blo gros byang ba phan pa ramatshal/ gnod pa nyid gnod par ma mtshal la/ byang ba'ang khyed la bsten nas
5725(mdo sde): gyur byis pa phal cher gnod pa dag/ dor bar 'tshal la phan pa spongs/ phan pa gnyer yang ma 'tshal pas gnod pa so so sten pa bgyid de dag thabs ni ston mdzad phyir khyod
5726(mdo sde): la bstan nas gnyis ga yang / yang dag ji bzhin rtogs 'gyur bas sman par gyur pa khyod la 'dud gtso khyod gang gi slar gyur pa/ de yang 'jig rten bla ma lags/ de
5727(mdo sde): rmang tha ma rnams kyi yang bar thur bram khyod la 'dud 'jig rter mkhas pas mchod yang / yid ches ngobo khyod la mchong thos rnams kyi mchong bya ba/ mchong thos dam pa khyod la/
5728(mdo sde): 'dud bsngags 'ong bsngags pa gang lags pa'i skyes po des kyang khyod bsngags par 'os rnams kyi kyang bsngags par bskye ba khyod la 'dud / lha rnam/
5729(mdo sde): rnams kyis ni khyod la drang srong rnams kyis kyang 'dud phyag bgyid 'os pa rnams kyis kyang bdud par gyi ba khyod la 'dad sems dang bcas pa su zhig ni bsod nams zhing ni
5730(mdo sde): dpag med pa/ gdud 'os khyod la phyag 'gyis pas nam zhig na ni ngoms par 'gyur de ltas khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud par 'ongs pa khyod la 'dang / phyag gi rgyu ni mi chad par
5731(mdo sde): rtag tu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rtag tu dam pa'i spyod pa mdzad pa lam dang ldan byas dang ma byas thobs pa yang dag rig pa mkhyen/ mchod che mnga' phyags bgyir 'os phyag
5732(mdo sde): bgyid 'os pa mtshungs med pa gdung bar 'os pa'i dgra bcom khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dpe med yid 'ong sku mnga' khyod la phyags 'tshal lo// mchog tu gsung stan mngon sgrog
5733(mdo sde): khyod la phyogs mtshal lo// dri med rnams ngag thugs mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan tshogs bdag nyid khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// zhing shes bsam pas sangs rgyas
5734(mdo sde): la bkra shis thams cad kyis char yang mi phong mchod sbyin kun gyis min dka' thub brtul zhugs med khrus kun min thubs pa'i dbang po la 'dud pa snyen bgrags shing dpal/
5735(mdo sde): du phyid sdig pa thams cad drangs nas 'byin/ gzi brjid dag kyang rnams par 'phel grags rnams thams cad sel bar byed/ 'jig rten dag na mi rnams kyis rgyud ni bde 'gror
5736(mdo sde): nges byed cing / des mthar zhi ba'i bras bur smin/ de ltar yon tan mang bsams shing / lus kyang 'jig pa'i ngang bsams na mkhas gang sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal las lus
5737(mdo sde): kyi lam gzhan byed pa byed 'chi bdag sel bar byed ljiyi/ bstan pa 'di ni nub gyur cig kun nas mun pas khebs gyur na khang zhig la ni kur bsti bya/ de lta bas na tshangs med
5738(mdo sde): pa'i mchod par bya ba myur te gyi ma 'ongs pa yi 'jigs pa dag da lta nyid nas byung zin to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags pa/ bsngags par 'os pa
5739(mdo sde): bsngags pa las phyag 'tshal ba zhes bya ba/ rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ ba ra Na ra ha bar Ne b+ha ga bto b+hang d+ha stang te/ sar bad nya ta sid d+hir na ma/ bod skad
5740(mdo sde): du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la stod pasngags par 'os pa la sngags pa la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid grub bo zhes bya ba nyi ma'i gnyen gyur nyi ma yi/ 'od bas shin
5741(mdo sde): tu 'dobs pa/ phyag bya kun gyis rab dang mchod phyag 'os phyag bgyis khyod la 'dud/ stobs chen dpa' bo pa mngon shes che la mthu yang che g.yul cher mnga' chen mdzad pa
5742(mdo sde): dgas ston chen po khyod la 'dud 'jig rten na mchod 'os mchog/ 'jig rten mchod pas mchod pa po// mchod pa'i gnod ni bla med pa mchod par 'os pa khyod la mchod/ mchog
5743(mdo sde): dang mkhyen pas rtogs pa brnyes dgongs pa nga rgyal bag mi mnga' brjed 'os khyod la nga rgyal gyi/ sems bor nas ni rjed par bgyis gus su bgyi na ma gus bgyis la snyom/
5744(mdo sde): 'jig rten bkur bas mching bgyid pa khyod la bkur bsti gzhol ba yi dbang pos gus par bkur sti dgying khyod dang 'dra ba 'ga' ma mchis/ lhag
5745(mdo sde): pa ma byung mi 'gyur de slad sems can kun li khyod dgra zun snyoms pa'i mnyam med lags ma dres 'phags pa'i gdung las byung sangs rgyas kun dang skal pa mnyam mdog
5746(mdo sde): dang shes rab snang ba yis phyogs rnams sna bar mdzad de 'khrungs/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan/ mdom gang 'od kyis 'od zer spa/ mtshan dang mthun pa'i dpe byed
5747(mdo sde): bzang brgyad bcus 'bar ba'i gzi brdzi can/ rgya chen dpal dang ldan pa'i skad kun gyis mdzes pa bzil gnon pa/ 'jig rten snang bar mdzad nas ni nyi ma gzhan zhig lnga
5748(mdo sde): bur bzhugs bcom ldan dus kun tugs pa'i chos/ rnams kun 'byung gnas thams cad ni phyag 'thil skyar ra lta bur/ khyod kyi thug spod yul 'gyur chos rnams g.yo
5749(mdo sde): dang mi g.yor bas/ gcig dang sna tshogs so so la mkha' la rlung dag rgyu ba bzhin khyod kyis thugs ni tho gos mi mnga' bya ba mdzad pa khyod kyis ni ji ltar bskyed tsam gyi su/
5750(mdo sde): khyod la gzhed dgur kun 'grub pa de ltar chos dbyings legs thugs chud dge mthar phyin pa khyod la ni sbyor byung dge ba 'ga' mi mnga' khyod ni gang zhigs gzhed na yang
5751(mdo sde): gzhed pa tsam la rag las so chos yod dang chos nyid dang ni chos kyis mthu so sor rgyu dang bcas gnas shing rkyen dang bral bu dang bcas pa dag khams dang dbye ba tha dadang bcas
5752(mdo sde): skye dang 'jig bcas brgyas pa de thams cad so sor rnam kun tu kun mkhyen khyod kyis mkhyen gzhan min khyod la shin tu bsgribs pa'ang mngon shin tu ring ba 'ang nye ba ste//
5753(mdo sde): shin tu 'dzings pa'ang bsal kyis dag/ shin tu mthon po 'ang dma' ba lags shin tu gnag pa 'ang snang bar bcas shin tu the tshom gnas kyang des shi na bya shin tu zab mo ya
5754(mdo sde): khyod las leg par gang ba lags dbang po chen po chen po'i glang chen gyis rked chings gser las bgyis pa ltar chos nyid shin tu zab mos kyang khyod ni ngo rgyal 'gyur ma lags
5755(mdo sde): chos nang na chags bral ltar/ nges 'byin nang drang po ltar phun cho ga nang nas sangs rgyas lha khyod ni sems can kun gyis mchog rnams grol nang nas mi g.yo ltar rig pa'i nang na
5756(mdo sde): chos nyid ltar/ shes rab nang na kun mkhyen ltar khyod ni lus can kun gyi mchog dag pa'i nang na rnams grol ltar de nyid nang na stong pa ltar dka' thub nang na bzod pa ltar/ khyod ni/
5757(mdo sde): srogs chags kun gyis mchog gzugs kyis nang na khyod skra ltar sems kyis nang na khyod thugs ltar/ chos kyi nang na chos ltar khyod ni srog chags kun gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas
5758(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid grub pa zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ ba ra Na ra ha bar Ne b+ha
5759(mdo sde): gab to bung du stung tre ba we sha rang du sgra bo nam/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stong pa bsngags par 'ongs pa bsngags pa las/ stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la/
5760(mdo sde): bstod pa zhes pa/ bde bar gshegs pa khyod gcig pu chos gcig chos kun snang mjed pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yis na de dang ldan gyis gzhan
5761(mdo sde): ma lags khyod 'ba' shig gis ye shes kyis shes bya mtha' dag khyab lags kyi khyed las gzhan pa thams cad kyi shes bya kho na lhag pa lags rgyu rkyen 'di las 'bras bu 'di//
5762(mdo sde): 'di las 'di ni ma yin zhes/ gnas dang gnas min nges pa kun khyod kyis mkhyen gyis min las chos yang dag blangs yi/ rnam smin dus ni thams cad pas kun gtogs pa
5763(mdo sde): thams cad ni rnam kun khyod mkhyen gzhan gyis min rnal 'byor sa ni ma lus pa/ kun nas nyon mongs rnam gzhag dang rnam pa byang bcas zab mor bcas khyod gcig kho nas thug
5764(mdo sde): su chung dbang po mchog dang mchod min pa chung dang 'bring dang chen po dang / cha shas dbye bas mtha' yas pa khyod las gzhan gyis rtogs ma mchis/ mthun par 'gyur ba gang lag
5765(mdo sde): dang mi mthun gyur pa gang lags pa/ mi yi mos pa sna tshogs kun/ khyod cig kho nas thugs su chud/ 'jig rten 'di khams sna tshogs te/ sna tshogs khams nyid mtha' dag
5766(mdo sde): ni sna tshogs khams dbye khyed gcig pus/ mkhyen gzhan gyis ma lags so// rgyu dang kye na ni sna tshogs mngon par 'grub pa ni/ kun tu 'gro ba'i lam stobs kyis/ thams cad
5767(mdo sde): khyod kyis thugs su chung / bzod med sring par byung ba dang / tha ma med 'byung gyur gang / de la khyod kyi ye shes ni mngon sum bzhin gzigs la 'jug/ mngon gyis mtha
5768(mdo sde): dang phyi ma'i mthar 'jig rten yang dag 'grub pa dang / de bzhin nyid mtshams sbyor ba nir mtha'i bar bzhin khyod kyis gzigs nye 'am yang na ring yang rung ji lta khyod la mngon
5769(mdo sde): sum pa/ de ltar gribs pa bag chags pa/ bcas te khyod kyis spangs pa lags/ dngos 'di yongs su ma mkhyen cig/ nyon mongs 'di'i bag chags ni lhags ma lus
5770(mdo sde): shes ma bsnyad pa'i go 'bang de ni khyod kyis bsnyes khyod kyis bar du gcod gsungs gang des par de dag bar du gcod kyis lam bstan gang lags pa de gcig kho na nges par 'byin
5771(mdo sde): de yis par gcod mi nus shes 'am/ de yis nges 'byin mi 'gyur zhes gzhan gyis bla na cha shas kyang de la srid pa ma mchis so// khyod kyis rgyal min shes bya mi snang bgyi ma
5772(mdo sde): mchis/ dbang phyug khyod nyid kun mkhyen cing kun rgyal lags kyis gzhan ma lags/ stobs ldan 'jig mi 'gyur bas khyod mi brnyed gang lag rigs la na/ mthu mnga' bzhin
5773(mdo sde): du 'ga' la yang khyad du mi gsod gang de yang / log pa'i nga rgyal can 'ga' zhing dregs dang bral bar mdzad pa gang gdul yi ni thabs tsam ste/ de ni stobs bsnyems yongs ma
5774(mdo sde): lags 'jig rten dag na stobs ldan pas/ kun las rgyal zhes gang brjod pa/ de ni bzhin la bstod par bas/ go 'phangs de ni khyod la rdzogs/ 'dron pa khyod la chos
5775(mdo sde): 'thun par/ 'gags kyang 'chal bar nus ma lags blan ka brtsal 'os ma lags te/ nongs mi mnga' ba'i bde ba bsnyes nongs mi mnga' bas gang las kyang bzhi ni bsrung ba
5776(mdo sde): bgyi mi 'tshal bzhi po yongs su rdzogs slang du/ khyod sus kyang klags mi thong kun la mi thogs blo gros can dgongs pa kun du nye bar gnas kun la thugs
5777(mdo sde): rje snyoms pa po// thugs ni kun la chags mi mnga' shes byi'i rgya mtsho kun rgal ba bag chags thams cad gtan nas spangs par chad kun gyi khyad par mkhyen/ nges par 'byin pa kun lam
5778(mdo sde): kun gyis bsam pa mkhyen pa bo// gdul thabs kun gyi pha rol gshegs nyon mongs sna tshogs thams cad kyis gnyen po la yang bsnyed mi mnga'/ khyod la bstan nas smra ba'o//
5779(mdo sde): byis pa shed bya ma gyur gang de ni mi rig mun pa yi/ tshang tshing mi bzang mthu lags so// khyod kyi dka' la brten nas kyang bral bar ma gyur gang lags pa de dang de sgrib ces bgyi ste/
5780(mdo sde): de dang de sgra mi mthad lags sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las stogs dang / mi 'jig pa la bstod pa zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho//
5781(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ ba ra Na ra ha bar Ne b+ha ga to bud d+ha stod tre ba ga bi shud sta bo na ma/ bod skad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa las gsung rnam
5782(mdo sde): par dag pa la bsngo ba zhes bya ba/ ji ltar thub pa khyod kyi bka' nye dmig brjod ldan thos pa ltar 'khor ba'i sdug sngal mi bzod pa'i mi yis kun tu spar nas kyang ni/ 'gro ba mi
5783(mdo sde): shes go gos pa/ de ltar skyo bar 'gyur ma lags/ de ltar mgon po khyod kyis bka'/ mngos sum pas kyang don gsal rab/ chos nyid zab mo gting yas pa/ bshad pa
5784(mdo sde): sa ler gyur lags pas/ khyod kyi bka' ni snrel zhi yi/ chos 'phrul dag kyang mdzad pa lags/ tshigs gi mtha' ni mi mthong zhing / don gyis gtang yang mi dpogs pa la/
5785(mdo sde): phan tshun rjes su zhugs pa ni/ de las ya mtshan che ci mchis/ smras pa'i dam pa khyod kyis bka' rnam grangs du ma nyid mchis shing / khyod bka' zlos bu yang ni ma mchis la/ sbar bI
5786(mdo sde): lugs kyang rigs pa lags/ smra ba'i dam pa khyod kyis bka'/ gnas pa bzhi yi yon tan ldan lungs stan bzhi'i rten gyur kyang den du gnyis su 'gyur ma mchis gnang dang
5787(mdo sde): ni bdag pa la khyod bka' la lar gcig tu bes/ la lar nges pa ma lags la/ phan tshun 'gal ba'ang ma mchis so// chos kyis de nyid ma mchis so// rtson pa med pa'i
5788(mdo sde): phang bzhi/ rigs 'thad yon tan bzang po yis/ ngan sgra thams cad sun 'byin pa/ gcig tu don dam la bzhol la/ kun rtog la yang ston ma mchis/ bden pa gnyis dang
5789(mdo sde): mi 'gal bas/ khyod kyis bka' ni rigs par 'byung / nyon mongs med la gcig tu 'dzam nyon mongs can la nges brlang yang khyod kyis bka' ni bsnyen pa dang / srid pa'i
5790(mdo sde): skyon dang ldan ma lags/ rnam par byang ba'i rjes 'thun la de'i phyogasu lhung mi mnga'/ kun nas nyon mongs dgrar gyur la/ mi bzod mi mnga' khyod kyi bka'/ smon pa'i tshig
5791(mdo sde): ni rgyal gang yang / phyar ka gtor ba'i skyon ldan min rab tu bsngags pa'i tshigs byung yang / 'ga' la'ang rten pa mnga' ma lags/ bsnan dang dor pa mi mnga' lags
5792(mdo sde): bsdug dang rgyas ma dang yang ldan brtan cing zad par 'gyur lags la/ dang po nas kyang mi bzang min/ shin tu snyan gsung chags mi 'gyur mang la
5793(mdo sde): snying po mchis min/ sna tshogs pa la don ma 'khrugs bka' 'di ngo mtshar mang po lags gsung gis bdag po khyod kyi bka' yid 'phrog mdzad la zhen mi mnga' gzi byin
5794(mdo sde): can la gnod mi 'gyur khyod la ngan pas rtogs ma lags pa spu dag kyang ldang bgyid cing rdal yang kun tu mthon por bgyid/ lus rnams dag ni rton bgyid cing 'dar ba dag
5795(mdo sde): kyang skyed par bgyid/ lha'i 'jig rten skyo bgyid cing / sgra yang kun tu sgrogs par byed sa ni rnal mar gnas pa yang rnam pa drug du g.yo bar bgyid bzod med dus gom/
5796(mdo sde): ba yi/ lus can rang bzhin zlog mdzad cing / rang bzhin 'dris pa ma lags pa/ gzhan ni snying la 'jog par mdzad rang gi nyes pas mi 'gal la yid ni gdung par
5797(mdo sde): bgyid dang 'dra/ rigs par zhugs pa mkhas rnams la/ bdud rtsi'i byar pa bab pa bzhin khyod kyis bka' ni tho ma dang / bar dang mar dge ba dang thos dang sems dang sgo
5798(mdo sde): ba ni de sgrub pa la bdud rtsir 'gyur mos pa dus dang ldan pa/ mang po 'khod par gyur pa la/ gsungs gcig bka' stsal pa las/ du ma lta bur gyur te/ kun gyis 'di
5799(mdo sde): bdag gis ched/ kho na'o snyam du gro ba gang de las ya mtshan che ci mchis/ chos nyid 'dor ba mi mdzad la/ 'jig rten kun brjod dang yang 'thun rjes su sgrog par mdzad
5800(mdo sde): bzhin du gcig shos rnam par sgom pa'i de mdzad/ kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang mchis/ las dang las kyis 'bras bu'ang mchis de ldan byed du 'jug pa dang / byed po
5801(mdo sde): ma mchis khyod kyis bka' de ni lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten dag gis sngon thos nas chu yis zla ba g.yo ba bzhin/ so sor rab tu g.yos par gyur/ bzang dang ngan
5802(mdo sde): pa nyid du ni/ 'byung bar 'gyur ba tha dad pa/ thams cad rkyen la rags las pa/ byed po cig mchis gyur ram 'gal rang ba bang nyid mchis na/ byed por 'gyur na de mi rigs
5803(mdo sde): de lta lags pas chos kun la byed pa med par khyod kyis gsungs lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la/ chos 'di stong pa nyid kyi ni seng ge sgra yi tra brdungs nas/ mtshan
5804(mdo sde): bcad bgyid te gnas pa lasgra de yis nyi ma 'ong bzhin du/ 'jig rten snang bar bgyis pas na/ de las gzhan pa'i tshigs kun ni/ shin tu ci yang ma rung gyur sangs
5805(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa las gsung rnam par dag pa la bstod pa zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ ba ra Na ha bar te
5806(mdo sde): b+ha ga ba to bud d+ha stong tre a ba'i sta bo na ma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la stong pa bsngags par 'os pa/ bsngags pa las rtsod pa mi mnga'
5807(mdo sde): bar stong pa zhes bya ba/ chos rnams thams cad bdag med pa/ 'dus byas thams cad skad cig ma/ mya ngan 'das zhi zhes bgyi ba/ mtshan nyid 'di gsum chos
5808(mdo sde): gyis rgya smra ba kun gyis yul min pa/ mi byed khyod kyis gzhag pa mdzad/ ji skad brjod kyang 'jig rten na/ rang bzhin las ni gang zhig 'da'
5809(mdo sde): gal 'dzin pa yi shags la ni/ goms par bgyis kyang su zhig gi me nyid grang ba lta bur ni/ de nyid gzhan du bgyi bar nus/ na mkha' thogs pa med pa la/ 'ga' yis
5810(mdo sde): rma byin 'gyur srid kyis chos kyis phyags rgya 'di la ni chos dang 'thun par 'gags ma lags/ chos kyis de nyid mkhyen khyod kyi bka' la nag po chen po dag/ bstan pas 'di na mchis
5811(mdo sde): grangs kyi smra ba bzhan la mchis ma lags/ tha dad lta la rten pa yis 'jig rten rnams ni brtson pa lhung khyod ni gcig pu rtsod med pa'i gnas kyi go 'phang thugasu chud/ long ba
5812(mdo sde): rnams ni rtsod gyur kyang / mig can gzugs rnams mthong ba ni ji ltar rtsod par mi 'gyur ba de nyid khyod dang byis pa'i dpe chos bzhin gsungs khyod la ni 'ga' dang ldan
5813(mdo sde): cig cod mi mnga' legs par smra phyir mkhas dang min/ khyad du gsad phyir mi mkhas min 'ong pa rnams ni mi snang gyur/ lta ba'i dra ba rab tu bcom gzhi ma mchis ni ci slad
5814(mdo sde): mchid/ gzhi ma mchis pa'i rtsod par 'gyur/ rgyal thabs snyes pa khyod lta bu'i bstan ci zhig rtsod pa mdzad 'od zer stong ldan ro lta bu'i mun nag lhan cig ci zhig 'gyed
5815(mdo sde): mkha' la lcag kyi 'jub bzhin/ brtsang bas khyod la rdzing mi 'gyur rlung gi zlog phyogs gtor ba'i rdul/ 'thor ba nyid la 'bab cing 'gro/ 'jig rten rnams ni btags pa
5816(mdo sde): lhung / yang dag ji bzhin spyod yul khyod de slang phyin ci logs gyur pa mang po rnams dang khyod mi mtshungs/ dper na la cags dang gser bzhin du logs par mngon
5817(mdo sde): bar zhen spar bas/ rnams dang / mngon zhe na mi mnga' khyod du ni lhan cig skran du ga la chis/ byis pa rnams ni ma 'tshal te mgon po phan dang bde bzhed pa/ don min khyod
5818(mdo sde): la sngo bgyid pa bdag gis bdag nyid skrag par bas bdag gis bdag nyid med 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrigs par por mi sngo'i rgyal ba thub pa med pa yi/ bzi byin can la
5819(mdo sde): sngo mi rung khyod la 'dir rgol dras pa btag nas khyod kyis slar gzhan dus btab pa/ tod pa dam pos btags pa bzhin/ stan las ltung bar nus ma mchis/ khyod kyis chog
5820(mdo sde): par bden smra'i bu'i/ rgol ba'i 'chi ba bcag pas na pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis rab ya bcag pa nyid du gyur pa rol rgol ba kha cig ni/ khyod dang phrad par 'dud par
5821(mdo sde): bgyid kha cig thag ring slar ldog ste/ gzhan dag sman sngar zhugs nas mchis kha cig khyod kyi ba'i chos/ bdud rtsi'i rgyan gyis char phab pas yang dag bsgrub pa sum gyis/
5822(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos la bsten par bgyid/ kye ma mgon po thugs rje si bdag/ kye hung hi mug nyon mongs dan/ kye hud srid pa rnam par 'gros kye hud nga rgyal bud byed pa dam chos
5823(mdo sde): ma yin 'di gsum gyis/ skye bo 'di ni kun dkrugs te/ mi zad rgyun gyis 'das pa bzhin khyod kyi bzhung dang bral bar bgyi/ 'di yi bzhin yis lta ba dang / the tsom la logs
5824(mdo sde): nye nyon mongs/ so sor lam gyi bar bcod pa/ kun nas nyon mongs thams cad 'phel ka la bing ka'i skad thos nas khra'i sgra la chags med ltar
5825(mdo sde): khyod kyis ro myong na gzhan gyi tshigs la chags mi 'gyur gang dag chos la sgyu bshams nas/ khyod kyi bka' la zhugs gyur pa ngan don thos pa des la'ang de rnga mos sprang
5826(mdo sde): rtsi bzhin du 'gyur/ bden bzhin 'gro la don dang ldan bsam pa dang mthun cho 'phrul bcas zad mi shes la mdos 'dus pa gcig tu mthu ni chen por ldan/ snying po dang ldan
5827(mdo sde): ro mchog ldan rnam grangs ldan zhing thabs dang ldan yongs rdzogs pas ma 'dris pa gzi brjid dang ldan grags ldan de 'dris yon tan dang ldan pa/ khyod gsung thos nas su
5828(mdo sde): zhig ni de las bzlog pa gzhan gyi tshig rul pa lta bu snom par bgyid sdug bsngal yang rung ba de yang rung / don dang mi ldan gang yin pa de ni yongs su spang bya zhing bzlog pa
5829(mdo sde): bsten pa bya bar gsungs 'dod dang mi 'dod bsten pa la/ de ltar chad par gsung khyod kyis/ lam la thang chad smra ba rnams ji ltar bur na rje 'brang gyur/ spang ba rnams
5830(mdo sde): la khyod kyis ni 'di'i ched du bstan pa gang / de nyid khyod kyis bka' dang ni/ gzhan gi tshigs gi mtshams rdzogs pa khyod kyis bka' dang gzhan gyis tshigs ji ltar khyod
5831(mdo sde): bar che zhugs pa dug dang bdud rtsi de lta min mun dang snang ba'ang ma lags so// khyod kyis bka' dang gzhan gyi tshigs ji ltar khyad par 'bad chad pa/ mtho ris ngan song de/
5832(mdo sde): lha min/ zil mngar bkus te 'ong ba'ang mi de ni tshigs tsham snying po ste/ 'di ni tshig dang tshigs don ldan/ de yis khyod kyis bka' dang ni gzhan gi tshig gi khyad par bshad
5833(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa khyod dang ni sma de rnams kyi khyad par gang / de nyid khyod kyi bka' dang ni gzhan gi tshigs gis mthon dman lags/ ji ltar srid dang thar pa'i khyad de
5834(mdo sde): ni dpyad du med pa ltar/ dpa' bo khyod kyi bka' dang ni/ gzhan tshigs khyad kyang de dang 'dra/ 'jug dang ldog pa gang lags dang / kun nas nyon mongs rnams byang gang / de
5835(mdo sde): nyid dpa' dang / gzhan gi tshig gi khyad par lags/ 'di ni gcig tu de bzhin nyid de ni slu chos 'ba' shig na/ khyod kyi bka' dang gzhan gyis tshigs de las khyad zhugs
5836(mdo sde): gzhan ci 'tshal/ 'di ni gcig tu dge la de gcig tu bar chad bgyid lags na/ khyod kyi bka' dang gzhan gi tshigs de las mi 'ang ci zhig mchis de yis bsgom shing
5837(mdo sde): nyes bsgos dang / 'di yis dag par bgyid 'gyur ba/ de nyid mgon po khyod ka dang / gzhan gi tshigs gi khyad par las/ de kun dam pa ma yin brdo la/ 'di gcig legs
5838(mdo sde): gsungs de yi slad/ khyod kyi bka' dang gzhan gi tshigs brtsan dang mi brtsan nges pa lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags pa las rtsod pa mi mnga'
5839(mdo sde): bar bstong ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so// rgya ga gang du/ bar g-i ba par te blag ba te zung stong nga tha ma nu 'ang slob nas/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas bam
5840(mdo sde): ldan 'das la bstod pa/ bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las tshangs pa dang mthun par gsungs par stod pa zhes bya ba 'jug pa dang ni ldog pa la/
5841(mdo sde): 'gro 'di'i rang bzhin gang las dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten kun so sor gang las mi 'da' ba lugs mthun lugs dang mi mthun pa/ tshig bcu gnyis kyi yi ge gnyis/
5842(mdo sde): de ni dam ches nyi ma yin nyi ma chod pa'i chos su bstan/ de nyid rdzas te skye ba yi srid gcig yan lags ma chung bas/ ji bzhin yan lag so so la/ bzhi ru bsgregs pas
5843(mdo sde): gsum chod lags/ de nyid yan lag tshang ba las yi ge bcu gnyis tshogs dag gis/ bden pa'i lus su mnga' ma bzhin/ bsgres na rab tu 'gro ba las/ tshangs pa'i 'di
5844(mdo sde): ni khyod bstan la gang dag ji bzhin bgyid pa bram ze de dag tshangs 'gyur ba'i gsang gsum 'thun pa'i tshangs pa lags/ tshangs pa'i tshul dang tshangs pa dang / tshangs tshul
5845(mdo sde): 'bras bu tshangs pa'i don tshangs mchog khyod kyis bstan pa la gzhan la mchis pa ma lagaso// tshangs pa'i tshul ni mchis par 'ga' yang bram zer 'gyur ma lags drang
5846(mdo sde): ba yi ni lam 'di yang gzhan ni 'ga' la 'ang ma mchis so// rig dang zhabs su ldan pa yi/ tshangs pa lags par bram zes bshad rig pa de dang zhabs de yang / khyod kyi
5847(mdo sde): bstan las gzhan las gzhan la min bslob dang mi ba rig pa de zhabs ni de thobs bgyid pa lags gzhan la chos kyi las de ni ming yang mchis pa ma lags so// gang
5848(mdo sde): zhig goms par bgyis pa lags/ rigs kun bram zer 'gyur bgyid pa 'dud rtsi'i sgo ni ring zhig nas/ bcad pa khyod kyis dbye ba mdzad lta ba ngan dang yid gnyis kyis
5849(mdo sde): zin pa bram zer ci zhig 'gyur/ khyod kyi gzhung lags ma gtogs par/ gzhan gis mdud pa 'di mi chod bram ze tshangs pa'i bu yin te/ snying dang kha las skye shes pa/
5850(mdo sde): 'jig gi ni grags pa de/ khyod las 'bras bu bcas par gyur tshangs khyod tshangs lam khyod la mnga' khyod ni bram ze'i khyu mchog ste/ nye bar 'dren dang ston pa'ang khyod/
5851(mdo sde): khyod ni dus mchod mdun 'don khyod kyis legs par bstan pa yi/ bram ze ming gtsang 'gyur ma lags/ nye bar drangs pa'i bram ze yang tshungs pa'i tshul las lhang mi
5852(mdo sde): 'gyur/ khyod bstan las gzhan 'ga' yang bram zer 'gyur ba'i chos ma mchis/ tshangs pa yini mchod pa dang / tshangs pa'i lam yang mchis ma lags/ tshangs pa'i
5853(mdo sde): bden pa gsum dang ni/ tshangs pa'i mtshan nyid rnams gsum dang / tshangs pa'i mchod rab gsum dang ni tshangs pa'i rigs kyang mchis ma lags/ 'jig rten legs bshad
5854(mdo sde): ji snyed pa thams cad khyod kyi bstan las 'byung / skyon med mngon par rjod pa 'di de gshegs kho na'i ma 'dres pa/ khyod las gzhan pa gang dag cig/ dag las skyon med
5855(mdo sde): ganga' ba de thams cad chos kun mkhyen khyod kyis legs par gsungs pa'i bram ze lags srin bu'i bzas pa'i yi ge ltang 'di las gzhan pa'i lags bshang gang de ni ljags
5856(mdo sde): la gser bzhin du de la mtshal ba ma lags so// er na da'i shing khyod du can dan sa mchog gzhan pa ltar/ lha 'og 'gal de la de mchis par su
5857(mdo sde): shig yid ches 'gyur gang zhig min pa'i shing la ni a mra'i 'bras bu smin btags pa/ de las skyes she yid ches de/ gnan la legs bshad yod sems drang / mal yas
5858(mdo sde): tsan dan bzhin du khyod las gzhan la ltar bcas pa'i 'jig tan 'di na legs bshad pa'i rin chen 'byung ba ma mchis so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngag
5859(mdo sde): bar 'os pa bsngags pa las tshangs pa dang mthun par gsung bar bstod pa zhes bya ba/ rdzogs skyon/ rgya gar skad du/ ba ra Na ra ha ba re Ne b+ha ga ba to bud d+ha
5860(mdo sde): stod tre u ba klar sta bo na ma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa sngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las phan par mdzad par stong pa zhes bya ba/
5861(mdo sde): brgya la re 'gal gang zhegs gis/ mi gsung thugs las chung bgyis pa/ rang byung gse ru lta bu rnams/ rnam par bgyid zhing bzhud 'gyur ba/ nyams par 'gyur ba'i laM
5862(mdo sde): mangs pas rtogs par yang ni rab dka' ba mya ngan 'das pa'i lam de ni khyod kyis lam chen srol du btod de ni glang po chen rnams ltar/ dga' dgar gzhon nu dag dang ni
5863(mdo sde): stobs dang blo ni so sor gnyis pa'i bud med kyis kyang goms par bgyis/ de ni gzi byin ldan pa'i mchog/ khyod kyis bstan pa'i cho 'phrul te/ sangs rgyas kyis ni ma 'dres pa/
5864(mdo sde): mthu dpag med pa'i gzi byin lags/ kun nas nyon mongs sprul dag gis rnams pa du mar zin rnams la khyod ni spyod gnyen po yi/ skyon med 'byung gnas ma 'dres pa/ 'dod
5865(mdo sde): chags la sogs 'gags rnams la/ skyon ni skyon med mdzad khyod kyis mi sngags bsgom pa la sogs pa'i chos kyang rab tu bstan pa mdzad/ khyod kyis lam gyis tshogs kyi
5866(mdo sde): chos/ dag pa zag bcas pastan mdzad pas dngos po rnams kyis nang gi ni/ phan tshun khyed par dag kyang bstan de yang nyi ma'i nyon mongs dag 'bags phyir ci yin rnams
5867(mdo sde): pas bcom/ du khrod mgal pa'i yog pa ltar/ de dag ye shes me la bsregs byang chub pa yi sngon rol du 'jug pa'i bde ba'i rgyu chos stan de nas byang chub rnyes nas ni/ ldog
5868(mdo sde): ba'i bde ba'i chos kyang bstan sangs rgyas nas kyang dge ba'i chos/ zag bcas de dag ma bshad min phal cher mya ngan 'das pa yis rgyu 'thun nyid du yongasu sngos khyod kyis
5869(mdo sde): gang las 'gro bdag ma drangs rgud pa de gang mchis/ gang dag dang 'jig rten ma sbed pa'i phun tshogs de yang gang zhig mchis/ khyod yid gnyis mdung pa bcad / lta ba
5870(mdo sde): ngan pa'i tsher ma bkrugs sred pa'i dug gi lhag ma/ bsregs khro ba'i dug kyang thams cad bcom/ ma rig pa yi ling thog bsal/ nga rgyal byi ni rgyal mtshan bsgyel sems
5871(mdo sde): kyi tha ba rnams kyang bcom/ rnam par 'ching ba rnam par btubs/ mdud pa thams cad rnam par bkro ba chu bo la ni gzings kyang bcas/ khyod kyi chu bo rnams kyi bzhi
5872(mdo sde): mtsho chen gang lags de yang bskams skyon dang snying pa yon po dag/ sems la mi mngon 'khras bgyid pa/ kun nas nyon mongs dug shing gi rtsa ba khyod
5873(mdo sde): kyis drung nas byung / phyin ci logs gis 'tshal ba yi ngan pa'i lam ni thams cad bcad 'chi med bgrod pa gcig pa yi dpal ldan lam ni drang po phye/ gzhan dag gdul bar
5874(mdo sde): bgyi ba yi/ skon brgyad las des drang nas 'dod pa'i yan lag brgyad ldan pa/ cang shes bzang po'i gnas su bkod kun nas nyon mongs srin 'khrag pa'i mi gtsang rgyun nas
5875(mdo sde): drangs nas kyang / nyon mongs min pa'i yan lag can dri med tshul 'byor ru stsal/ 'tshal ba'i tshul khrims skyon bsal nas/ tshul khrims kyi ni byug pas byugs ngo tsha shes dang
5876(mdo sde): khrel yod pa'i/ dri med gos kyi dgab pa mdzad/ dam pa'i chos rgyan dkar po ni/ sba ba dag gis rgyan mdzad nas dag bsam gtan seng ge'i khri chen po rkyen du 'bab la gzhag byang
5877(mdo sde): chub yan lags ma rtog ni/ zag med dri zhim rnams kyi gtor chos kyi dga' ba 'phags pa'i rol/ zang zing med pa'i tshim par mdzad srid pa'i phrin ni 'chi mang ba/ thog ma med pa
5878(mdo sde): las bston nas/ nyid kyi sras po gtan du ni/ nyams pa med pa kho nar mdzad/ gzhan dag ma 'ongs dus na ni/ rang rgyal ba yi snod du mdzad gzhan dag theg pa chen po yi/ rgyal tshal
5879(mdo sde): ba mtshogs du dbang yang bskur chos kun gyi ni tshig mkhyen cing don rnam kun gyi bzhi la mkhas skad kyi dbye ba kun mkhyen cing / phyogs rnams kun tu spobs dang ldan da ni/ mgon me/
5880(mdo sde): khyed rnams kyi grogs kyu zhes sgrogs shing thugs rje chen po 'gro ba ni/ mtha' dag 'khrung ba bzhin du bzhugs stan pa thugs rje mnga' ba/ brtse bar ldan zhing thugs brtser mdzad/ der/
5881(mdo sde): brtson le lo mi mnga' ba/ khyod dang 'dra ba gzhan mchis/ khyod ni sems can kun gyis mgon spyi yi yan lags bzang po lags mgon du khyod zhugs ma mtshal bas/ de slad skye bo
5882(mdo sde): bying bar gyur gang zhig yang dag blangs nas ni ri tha shal bas kyang grogs nus pa/ grogs byed pa yi chos dag ni/ khyod las gzhan pa 'gags mi rtogs phyi yi lag stobs kun ni
5883(mdo sde): khyod kyis yang dag bsgrubs lags te/ nang gi stobs dag tshad ma tshang bas byis pa rnams ni/ sngags bsngal bsten 'jig rten dpyod pa med dang sbor/ chos nyid zab pa dang yang
5884(mdo sde): sbar dman la mos pa nyid dang sbar lam ni ngan pa mang dang sbar/ thog med dus nas goms pa yi/ brel ba dang gis 'byung dang sbyar/ bsgom pa 'bad pa chen pos kyang / thob par
5885(mdo sde): bka' ba dang sbran na/ 'jig rten du ni khyod lta bu chos kar yang dag blang ba yi/ dngos po bas par ston pa'i rtsa/ bzang po gal te ma byung 'gro kun mun par gyur lags te/ mi
5886(mdo sde): 'dad tshor ba 'byung ba yis/ nyam thag 'dod cher 'bod pa'i ngan song rang bzhin kha nar gyur/ khyod la gang gis 'gro rnams gsum de ni bzhin gi sgrub par bas khyod ni dgra bshes
5887(mdo sde): bar ma la/ bshes mchog bzhin du brtse bar mdzad/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan la stong pabasngags par 'ongs pa bsngags pa las phan par mdzad par bstod zhes bya ba/ rdzogs s+ho//
5888(mdo sde): @rgya gar skad du/ bar Na ra ha bar rje blag pa to bung d+ha stod tre a pra ti kAr+ya sta bon ma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod/
5889(mdo sde): bsngags pa las lan mi lon par stong pa zhes bya ba/ bgo/ ba shi'i mdzad pa'i chos nyid ni/ khyod gcig pu la rdzogs mnga' yi/ gzhan la phan 'dags bgyis pa la skye ba bo// /
5890(mdo sde): gzhan ni 'tshegs shing mchis// khyod kyis slob ma bsdug pa yi// dngos la mkhas par ganga' ba gang de yang rdzogs par mi mkhas pas/ khyod kyis cha shas rjes su
5891(mdo sde): 'brang bcom ldan khyod kyis zang zing gris// bgo bsha' srog gi bar lags te/ dam pa'i chos kyi bgo bsha' ni slob dpon dpe mkhyud bral ba lags/ khyod ni 'gro bshab gyis
5892(mdo sde): ba'i las bla na med pa'i mdzad pa po phun sum thams cad rdzogs mnga' bas khyod ni snang par bgyi ma lags/ 'gro ba phal che'i mi bzang pa/ gzhan la gnod par bgyi bar dga'
5893(mdo sde): khyod ni 'jig rten rang bzhin te/ rgyun las bzlogs pa'i phyogs su 'jug/ byas pa bzo gang de dag nyung / phun 'dogs bgyis pa 'ga' tsam ste de yang phal cher re ba can khyod
5894(mdo sde): gcig dag pa'i chos can lags phan btags pa yis khyod mi 'jug gnod pa bgyis pas ldog ma lags/ skal ba mchis shes thams cad la/ khyod ni mnyam pa nyid du 'jug
5895(mdo sde): mtshan mo me togs ku mud/ kha 'bye 'gyur zhing pad+ma zums nyin par bang kha 'byed zhing gcig shos zum par 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang nyi ma zla ba yin/ 'do la phyogs su
5896(mdo sde): lhung ma mchis de nyid kyis byis pa dang / mkhas pa dag la snyan pa'i dpe/ gang che mgon khyod mdzad pa ni thams cad gzhan don kho na pas dpag med pham pa mdzad pa bo// khyod
5897(mdo sde): la lan gcig lon par 'gyur/ sems can dar bar mi 'gyur ba'i sgrub pa khyod la 'ga' mi mnga' khyod kyis dbugs byung tsam yang ni/ 'gro la phan dang / bde skyes sangs
5898(mdo sde): rgyas dbug ni phyung dang / dri kun zil gyis gnod mdzad pa/ tsher nas zhes 'gras gyur pa yang khyod la dang bskyed par bgyid de sangs rgyas dbugs kyis dang bab na/ bag
5899(mdo sde): med pa yi lha rnams kyang / lha yi yang spangs nas ni 'dul ba dag la mngon phyogs 'gyur/ khyod las dam pa'i chos mnyan pas thams cad tshim par 'gyur ma 'tshal de
5900(mdo sde): slad dam pa'i don du na/ khyod nyid doms 'gyur tshi ma mdzad lags skyes rgu rnams la char bzhin du khyod ni mkhas pa kun gyis gsos/ 'di ltar khyod kyis g.yos
5901(mdo sde): 'gyur gang / de dang de ni mchis ma lags/ dgongs par 'tshal pa rnams la yang / khyod kyi phan dgongs cig 'dra ba de blo ma spangs byis pa yis yid chos gyis bar
5902(mdo sde): nus ma lags khyod ni sdang ba rnams la yang / legs pa ci 'dra sgrubs mdzad pas de yid la smos pa'i yang yal las 'das par gyur pa'i lags/ la las phan 'dogs
5903(mdo sde): mdzad pa lag la ro mchog rtogs pa de dag kyang khyod kyi chos kyi go skal la spyod par 'gyur ba'i gnyen lags so// gal te sems can 'di dag ni khyod mnga' thugs rje'i dgos
5904(mdo sde): pa 'tshal khyod kyi bstan pas mtsho bzhin du kun du 'bar ba'i mer yang sa chen 'jug gang slad bdud kyi dgras thebs pas rtogs par mi 'gyur de
5905(mdo sde): slad du/ khyod kyi bstan las 'gal bgyid pa'i byis rnams ni bdag nyid 'goms khyod kyis bas na las bzhan phyogs g.yang sa chen po'i mun pa dang yongasu gdung ba myong ba
5906(mdo sde): rnams kyi ma yun ring 'khyams par 'gyur khyod kyi chos la mi phyogs pa'i skye bo ti mug gi ldongs pa/ srid rtse bar du song nas kyang sdug bsngal bar 'byung srid pa sgrub khyod kyi
5907(mdo sde): bstan pa'i rjes 'gro ba bsam gtan dngos bzhi ma thob pa/ bdud kyi mig ras bca' bzhin/ srid pa dag ni zlog par bgyid khyod kyiso dang por lha'i bu'i bdud kyi me tog rgyal
5908(mdo sde): mtshan bskal/ de nas nyon mongs bdad kyi ni/ nga rgyal mtshan mthon po brtib khyod kyi byang chub ma bsnyes par 'dod khams dbang phyug las rgyal te/ chub byang bar chad med lam la/
5909(mdo sde): khams gsum dbang phyug las rgyal lo// dbang phyug khyod nyid 'jig rten 'dir dpa' bo rnams kyi dpal rab ste/ nyon mongs dbang gyur skye bo la dpa' ba'i rab tu gang zhig/
5910(mdo sde): brtsi/ khyod kyis rang bzhin gnyi ga yi rgyud las nyon mongs sde bcom pas khyod las dpa' mchog gzhan dang ni mi zad g.yul rgyal gzhan mchis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
5911(mdo sde): la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags las/ len mi lon par bstod pa zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// !/ rgya gar skad du/ bar Na ra Ne b+ha ga ba to bud d+ha stod
5912(mdo sde): rU pe ka de sha sta bo na ma po skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par bos pa bsngags pa las sku'i phyogs gcig bstod pa zhes bya ba/ spyan gyi yon tan
5913(mdo sde): mthon ting dang dkar nag gsum po gang lags pa/ de la la gtsor bcas 'jig rten gyi yon tan rnams kyi khyad mi 'khor sgros gang dpal bla na med 'og ma dpal mnga' gnyis
5914(mdo sde): yang 'byung dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'i/ phun sum tshogs pa bla na med de dag 'ga' zhig ma mchis na/ zla 'thun 'ga' yang ma mchis pas gong med gang gas lhag nas gyur
5915(mdo sde): 'og ma'ang gang gi gi bzhi por 'gyur khyod kyis sgrog ni dpal gyi gnas phan tshun ma tsam par gyur pa 'di e ma'o legs zung du 'brel e ma'o 'phrog pa bla na med ston pa'i
5916(mdo sde): dus na g.yo 'gyur zhing gsal ba nyid la g.yo mi ma'ang tshems kyi zla ba shar ba'i dpal nang nas bag tsam gda' 'gyur ba nyid gnas nas 'gyur ba'i sgra me tog bzhin du
5917(mdo sde): 'grems mdzad cing gzhan gyi nye bar skyed rnams 'gro ba'i lam phan 'dogs pa zangs bzhun 'od 'dra 'di gi dpal 'bar 'di yi thad na mi bim pa'i 'bras bu mtsham
5918(mdo sde): sprin dang ud dpal dmar madres ro dang 'dra/ khyod kyi sgron ni mdzes bskyed pa gang gis thos pa de dag gis legs par mi rnyed de dag gi mthong ba'ang 'bras bu mchis
5919(mdo sde): pa lags mgon po mu tig phreng bas min kun du ku mu da 'phreng min gang can rtse mo sbrengs pa'i lus zla ba'i 'od kyi bab pas min ston ka'i chu bo sum byin pa mkhab 'gro
5920(mdo sde): dkar po'i 'phreng bas min sprin med mkha' la lhag ge bston ka'i zla ba ches pas min/ dus pa khyod kyi tshems rnams kyi 'phrengs 'os gsal dkar
5921(mdo sde): 'di la mar me'i 'od kyis gnyi 'od bzhin cha shasu yang phong ma lags/ rdo rje myu gu'o 'phreng ba la 'phags par chos kyis bdung rtsi'i ros brlan pas bsgos pa 'di dang ni
5922(mdo sde): 'dra bar 'gyur ba'i dngos ci mchis ku mud zla kun da sogs dkar po'i dper brjod bzhi po dag khyod kyi tshems 'phyed byung gyur nas thabs ni/ shor ba lta bur gda' 'jig
5923(mdo sde): rten du ni 'di byung bas/ dkar po dang ni 'dzes pa yi/ rjes rnams thams cad mgus par dri ma can dang 'dra bar gyur khyod kyi ljags dang sgrogs par na/ 'di dag thag bzang
5924(mdo sde): gnas ma ni/ rtogs dang zhi ba'i bar dag na rnam par grol ba bzhin du 'dzes/ khyod kyi dpal gyis 'gro ba 'di/ tshems kyi 'phreng bas zil man par gzigs nas rgyal
5925(mdo sde): bar gyur to zhes ru mthon lta bur ma che ba bsgreng / khyod mche ba mnyam la zlum/ mdzes shing rtse mo no dkar ba dpe kun thibs kyi mnan nas ni/ 'ab rab zhi du gnas pa lag/
5926(mdo sde): zla ba ches pa 'jig rten na yon por gsal gyur gang lags de khyod kyi mche ba mi g.yo zhing mdzes pa'i lus can rnams kyi bgyid mche ba'i gnas skabs mche yis nya bzhi la
5927(mdo sde): ral bzang ba yis khams pa 'phrengs pas 'khyims pa ni/ mdog gang 'od kyis zil mnan te/ thub pa zla ba khyod kyi ni/ gzug kyi ni yon tan phun tshogs pas//
5928(mdo sde): zla ba'i yon tan phun tshogs kun gnas skabs kun tu nyams par bgyis/ bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyi sku/ gser gyi dab mi'i snying po lta ba spu g.yas 'khyil nyag re ba 'ja
5929(mdo sde): la dri med gyen du khrung snam la ma 'jigs ma 'grus pa in 'drin la'i rngams lta bur sngon por rin chen bskyil ba ni phra mo lta bur spras par gda' skye bu gling chen khyod kyi ni/
5930(mdo sde): glang po che mtshan ma 'dras gang nang dang phyir dri ma yis/ shin tu nyis par mgos gang khyod kyi yan lag rgyan 'dra gang yan lag mdzes pa legs te/ lhad med gser las
5931(mdo sde): blugs pa yi/ 'khor yug lta bur gnas pa lags rang gi dbyibs ni mdzes pa yis/ cang shes gtso bo thams cad kyi skyes kyi mtshan ma'i mdzes pa dag/ zil gyis mnan
5932(mdo sde): te gnas pa gang mgon po tshangs spyod gnas slad dang dbyings kyang shin tu mdzes slad du/ khyod kyi sba ba nyid lags shing sba bar bgyi ba'ang lags thugs rjes the tsom can rnas
5933(mdo sde): la khyod kyi mtshan ma gzhan tshul gyi sprin mthongs zla ba'i gzugs lta bar shin tu lan mang bstan pa gang ngo tsha shes dang khrel yod ri mig yo bskyong ba ltar mdzad nas/ thugs
5934(mdo sde): rje chen pos mig gi ni blo yi yul du mdzad pa gang dal gyis 'bab pi 'ang ma ni chung zad kha bye ze ba tshogs mgon po yan lags mdzes khyod kyi mdzes pa de la de ba mi bskyad
5935(mdo sde): dpal ldan zla ba nya ba la 'khyil par gnas pa mchis na yang 'on kyang yan lag mchog khyod kyi dpa'i bzhi por rdzogs mi 'gyur bsod nams rgya phra rgya chen ge/ las kyi sprul/
5936(mdo sde): pa mdzes lam la de las gzhan pa'i sems pa yis 'phangs pas yong yang rjes slengs sam nyid kyis sbubs dang ni bza' dang / sdoms shin tu
5937(mdo sde): bkab kyang ni mtshan gzhan phun sum tshogs pa yi/ gsal bar gyur pa lta lags yan lags dam pa ldan khyod kyi yan lags mchog gyur de lin mgos btad yid rab
5938(mdo sde): dang ba dang ngag gis kyang ni mchod par bgyi/ dad par bgyi ba rnams kyi mchog blta bas mngon khyod la ni/ gal te khong kho bgyid mchis na mun nug tha shal ngan pa lags
5939(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las sku'i phyogs gcig la bstod pa zhi bya ba rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/
5940(mdo sde): ba ra Na ra ha ba ra Ne b+ha ga ba to bud d+ha stod tra pra b+ha ta sta bo nA ma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las ljags
5941(mdo sde): la bstod pa zhes bya ba sems can rnams kyi mos pa ni khams rnam ji bzhin gnas lags pas re shig bdag gi bsam pa ni yang pa'i ljags la rgya cher dang su zhig mgo dang
5942(mdo sde): yid dang ni/ ngag gi ljags yang mchod mi bgyi de ni gsung rab 'di kun gyi yum ste rin chen skrun pa lags bdag la gtso bo khyod kyi mi mdzad pa bla med thams cad kyi nang na
5943(mdo sde): yangs pa'i lhums 'di ni bla na med pa'i phul dgada'/ 'gro la bstan pa rab sgrogs pa chos kyi phrin las mdzad slad du rgyal po bzhin du mtshan kun gyi nang na gtso bo lags par gnas
5944(mdo sde): gzhan gyi the tsom bcad slad du gang zhig nas mngon phyung ni ston mtshams sprin tshogs lta bur zhal ras zla ba khyebs pa lags de ltar yang shing mdzes bde/ tshems kyi bsnams
5945(mdo sde): pa'i zhal nang du ngog pa med par gnas pa yang // de las ya mtshan ci mchis de ni nges par dpag med pa'i// mthu can bzang po de yi ni// shing du 'jam pa nyid dang ni//
5946(mdo sde): mnyen pa nyid kyi mthu lagaso// khyod zhal 'brug sgra sgrogs pa nas// 'dzam bu'i chu gser bzhun ma ltar// zangs bzhu ba'i 'od lta bu glog 'greng 'gyur ba lta bur mdzad
5947(mdo sde): bsre ba bzang po phun sum gyi rgyal thabs lta bu brnyes nas ni/ khyod kyi zhal nas/ ba g.yang su gnas gzhin dag tu rol cing spod gang gi zhim tshor nas 'di me tog
5948(mdo sde): bsung ba zhes sgrogs gsung gi me tog skyon med pa dag 'di ni 'grem par mdzad de nyid slad du rgyal po khyod las mchog tu snyan pa'i gsung snyan 'byung de yi dri rab zhim pa
5949(mdo sde): khyod snyan pa gsung zhes rnam par grags gang gi mthu yis khyod 'dra ba bdud rtsi snyil bar rab grags pa gdabs ngag rjes su ston pa de/ 'di nyid la ni rag la so gang gi
5950(mdo sde): lhar bcas 'jig rten du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de nyid kyi ngo rgyal mi gzigs pa dag pa 'di yis bgyis pa lag gang gis rin chen bkram pa ltar legs par bshad pa
5951(mdo sde): brgyas gang nas 'jig rten 'di ni snang bgyis ga 'di ni 'di yi mthu lags so// rigs dang phyang par mngon rjod pa chos kun gsung ba'i 'phags pa ste/ dpag bsam
5952(mdo sde): ljon pa'i lcug ma ltar rin cher sna tshogs 'bras bu stsol/ lugs yangs med par 'jig rten na/ kun mkhyen nyid ldan spobs pa ni/ so so yang
5953(mdo sde): dag rigs pa yis spobs pa'i khur ni su yis bkur khyod kyis dgongs te de lin chos ni gang dang gtang ba/ 'di ni snyoms las mi mnga' bar me tog bzhing du 'phreng bar rgyad
5954(mdo sde): gal te 'di yis ma bstan na khyod la kun mkhyen mdar sus 'tshal thugs rje chen po mda' bar sus yon tan gzhan yang mnga' sus 'tshal/ bstan bdag ni mchis na//
5955(mdo sde): khyod 'dra' mkhas pa mngon ma 'gyur bstan pa yang ni ljags yang la/ gzhung la mngos grub bzhin du rten rnam pa sna tshogs chos gsung zhing rnam pa sna tshogs ro bstar 'a/
5956(mdo sde): yang 'dam rdzab kyis ni nam mkha' bzhin ro la chags pas gos mi mnga' mi gsung bzhugs pa'i rjes su 'thun/ gsung ba la yang skyo mi mnga'/ mi 'thun chos ni gnyis
5957(mdo sde): la gcig tu yang ni mthun pa lags mi gsung bzhugs na spro mi mdzad/ ston par mdzad la skyo mi mnga' cad mkhyen nyid kyi dge ba ste/ thams cad la ni snyoms par
5958(mdo sde): 'jug 'di ltar thams cad gsung sprod la chos nam 'ba' zhig bka' stsal pa/ sprod pa la ni 'jug pa 'char rigs pa la yang gzhol bar mtshar 'byung ba las gyur bsod nam
5959(mdo sde): dang chos gsung ba yi rang bzhin gyis/ sangs rgyas pa yi dri zhim pa gnyis kyi rtog tu bsgos pa lags mig gi spyod yul dag pa dang / bsod nams snyan pa'i rang bzhin
5960(mdo sde): gyis/ shin tu rnam par grags pa yi/ snyan pa gnyis kyis phyogasu grags/ gang gis skyon kun med pa 'di zhal nas byung ba mthong gyur pa/ skye bo de dag mig dang ldan mig
5961(mdo sde): de dag kyang dpal dang ldan/ gang gi de'i gsung snyan pa mngon sum rna ba'i snying po yis/ bdud rtsi'i rgyun dang 'drar 'thungs pa/ mkhas pa de dag ches dpal ldan//
5962(mdo sde): sgra rnams brgyan par mdzad pa bzhin/ sgra yis sa rnams brgyan pa bzhin bshang ba mdzad na khyod kyi zhal/ shin tu sba bar mdzad pa bzhin 'di ni nyid mdzes yon tan gyi
5963(mdo sde): thub pa khyod kyi bla zhal ni/ 'jig rten rgyan du gyur pa yang / lhag pa'i rgyan du gyur par gda' mdog dang dbyibs dang snyan gsung dang / shin tu 'jam pa nyid dang mthus lhag
5964(mdo sde): lta bu'i gzugs can gyi/ rdzas ni 'ga' yang ma mthong ngo / gal te lha mo dbyangs ldan ma de ni gzugs can 'ga' mchis na skyon kun med pa'i yan lag can/ ljags
5965(mdo sde): yangs 'di ni las grangs yang ba'i ljags kyis chos kyi rnga kun tu brdungs par zhugs pa'i tshe/ lha dang mi yi sgra rnam ni thams cad ro gro med par gyur ston par khyod dang
5966(mdo sde): ljags 'di dang / bla na med pa'i bka' 'di ni nyon mongs dug kun 'jom pa yi/ yan la gsum ldan sman gyis mchog sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod
5967(mdo sde): pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las ljags la bstod pa zhes bya rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ bar Nar ha bar te b+ha ga pa to dung du stong/
5968(mdo sde): / tra b+hA ba ud be dza no na ma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bstong pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las srid pa la skyo bar
5969(mdo sde): bstod pa zhes bya ba/ khyod dang 'dra ba'i zhing dag ni/ 'jig rten gsum na ma mchis te/ khyod ni sbyin gnas rnams kyi mchog/ gral gtsar mdzad pa'i gtsang ma las/
5970(mdo sde): nam mkha'i mtha' thug ma mchis pa'i/ chu dang zheng dag ji lta bar/ khyod la sman gnod bgyid pa yi/ rnams par smin pa thugs ma mchis gang dag khyod la bar mar
5971(mdo sde): gnas/ de yang ri shig tshad med pa'i/ mun pas bsgos pas ma rung na/ skyo byo log bgyid smos ci 'tshal/ ji ltar bla med yon gyis gnas/ las gang
5972(mdo sde): lags pa de yi ni/ ngar ba'i mtha' thug mi mthong na/ yang dag sgrub pa'i mthar byin ma/ khyod la log par zhugs pa gang las de'i rgung pa'i mtha' yang ni/ de bzhin
5973(mdo sde): thug pa ma mchis so// gang gi rnam pa thams cad du/ stobs ldan khyod la'ang ma btsams pa/ rab tu mtshams ni mi zin pa'i/ ma ra bas mi rtag nyid re dan/ kye
5974(mdo sde): ma'o 'khor ba'i bdag nyid ngan e ma'o mya ngan 'das pa zhi/ khyod 'dra thugs rje'i bdag nyid can mngo' mchis pa yang de ru mchis/ ma 'ongs 'jigs pa rnams
5975(mdo sde): kyang gsung chos kyi tshul yang bshad pa mdzad/ 'khor ni rnam pa bzhi po yang / mi 'jigs pa dag thob par mdzad/ lam bzang 'di ni/ skud slad du/ blo gros
5976(mdo sde): sbyang ba bgyis gyur pa/ 'od srung che dang kun dga' dang / de la sogs pa'ang bsgom mod kyi/ 'jig rten gyi ni mig cig pa/ dri ma med pa khyod zums na/ snang ba mchis
5977(mdo sde): kyang 'jig rten 'di mun pas khabs dang 'dra ba lags/ bde bar gshegs pa de ba gshegs kyi/ bka' 'di'ang mchis la khyod kyi sras/ sras kyi dam pa slob pa dang /
5978(mdo sde): mi slob 'di yang mchis mod kyi/ 'gro ba'i mgon khyod mi bzhugs pas/ gza' skar gsal bas mtshan ma yi/ nam mkha' zla bas stong pa bzhin/ shin tu brlag gi
5979(mdo sde): mchis so// khyod mi bzhugs na gsung rab 'di/ klu 'phogs pa yi mtsho yi dpal/ ring po mi thogs 'jig pa wAr/ 'tsham pa'i snying po dang bla bas/ yon tan
5980(mdo sde): gzi yang mi spel/ cho ga gzhan dang lugs gzhan gyis/ 'phan dang rma dag phyung lags pas/ lugs kyi brjid kyang yal du cha/ sangs rgyas mnga' bo dbang sgyur ba
5981(mdo sde): rnams/ yongs su mya ngan 'da' bsams nas/ srid pa ral gyi 'bar 'dra la/ su ba zhig 'jigs par mi bgyid lags sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la stod pa bsngag
5982(mdo sde): par 'os pa bsngags pa las/ srid pa la skyo bar bstod pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ma'i tri tse Tas mdzad pa rdzogs te// rgya gar gyi mkhan pos rbang nya de pa dang //
5983(mdo sde): nu chen gyi lo cheb ban de dpal rtsegs rag shing ngas bsgyur cing zhus te de nas gtan la phab la// rgyag skad du/ za swa pra ti b+hod b+ha be/ b+hag/
5984(mdo sde): ba ta bud d+ha s+ya sto tre ne ma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa las spobs skyes pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs
5985(mdo sde): pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig la ni nyes pa kun gtan nas yongs ye mi mnga' zhing / gang la rnam pa thams cad du/ yon tan thams cad du gnas gyur
5986(mdo sde): ba/ gal te sems zhig/ yod na ni de nyid la ni skyabs 'gro zhing / de stong de ni bkur ba dang / de yi bstan la gnas pa'i rigs/ thams cad mkhyen la yon tan kun
5987(mdo sde): mda' la de yang nyams mi mnga'/ nyes pa bags chags bcas/ de yang / skyob pa cig pu la mi mda'/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang ni/ gsung dang thugs kyi 'phrin
5988(mdo sde): las la/ zhe 'gras gyur pa gang gis kyang / chos dang ldan par glags mi rnyed/ rgya mtshor mnya' shing bu ga du/ rus sbal mgrem pa chud pa ltar/ dam chos dga' sngon
5989(mdo sde): cher bcas pa'i mi nyid bdag gi thob nas ni/ mi rtag nyid pa dang / 'phres cing / las kyi glags la dogs bcas pa/ bdag gi lce 'di nyid kyis ko// snying po ci phyir
