5990(mdo sde): blang mi bya/ de ltar thub pa yon tan gyi/ yul lha grags med shes mod kyi rang gi don la gus pas pa yis/ de'i phyogs cig bsgrims te/ brjod gang gi yon tan
5991(mdo sde): grags dag dang mthu la thub pa ma mchis la/ rmad 'byung phrin las dpag med can/ rang byang khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di snyed bgyi ba'i mtha' med na/ 'di ltar lag
5992(mdo sde): shes ci zhig smos/ khyod kyi yon tan slad du bdag bsod nams snyam nas spri rdol skyes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes
5993(mdo sde): bya ba las bstod pa glang bslang ba ste/ le'u dang po'o// spyod dam mi spyod snyam pa yi rnam par rtogs pa rnam spangs nas/ 'gro ba 'di ni nyam thag ces/ khyod
5994(mdo sde): bdag nyid kyis zhal gis bzhes/ khyod ni ma bcos legs mdzad pa khyod ni rgyu med bzhin du byams khyod ni 'dis mdza' bshes te/ 'bral ba med pa'i gnyen gdan
5995(mdo sde): lags/ nyid kyi sha yang stsol mdzad na/ dngos po gzhan lta smos ci 'tshal/ legs mdzad khyod kyi srog kyang ni slong ba'i skye bo rnams la btang nyid kyi skra dang srog dag gis lus/
5996(mdo sde): can gshed mas rnams kyi lus can srog kyang khyod kyi ni/ lan rgya phrag tu bla da mdzad/ ngan 'gro bsnye sa slang ma legs la/ bzhed pa'i 'gro ba'ang skya ba ma lags/
5997(mdo sde): dgongs pa dag pa 'ba' shig gis/ khyod kyi tshul khrims goms par mdzad/ rtag tu gya gyur rnams spangs shing / drang brtan rnams ni rtag bstan pas/ yongs su dag
5998(mdo sde): ba'i las rnams kyi/ khyod ni bzhi rten gcig pur gyur/ sdug bsngal mang pos gzir pa na khyod kyi dge ba'i thugs kyi ni/ nyon mongs rnams la sran btsugs nas/ skye
5999(mdo sde): bo nyon mongs can la brtse/ khyod kyi gzhan gi don slad du/ sku srog btang nas dgyes gyur gang de 'dra srog chags 'gum pa las/ sos pa rnams la'ang byung ma gyuraro//
6000(mdo sde): khyod ni lan 'ga' ma lags par gtugs kyang sdug bsngal mi dgongs par/ dka' spyod las ni ma bshed ma gyid pa'i sems can la/
6001(mdo sde): gtso bo thugs rjer gyur pa gang khyod kyi thugs ni rin po che rdzogs pa'i byang chub sa bon de/ dpal khyod kho nas snying po mkhyen de bzhin skye bos dol mi byi/ dka' sprad las
6002(mdo sde): ni ma gyis par/ go 'bang rnyed dka' mi 'thos ces/ de slad nyid la'ang ma gzigs par khyod kyi/ brtson 'grus legs par spel/ khyad par 'phags par bgyi ba la/
6003(mdo sde): khyod la thang lhod / 'ga' ma byung / de slad khyod kyi khyad par rnam pa/ thogs drab rim pa dbyer ma mchis/ thugs ni thugs rje chen po dang / rtag tu rjes su 'brel slad du/
6004(mdo sde): ting 'dzin 'bras bur bcas pa yid/ shin tu la'ang khyod ma chags/ gzhan dang thun mongs ma lags pa'i/ bde ba gang te gya nom yang / dam pa'i spyod ldan
6005(mdo sde): khyod/ 'dra la/ gnod par rab pa'i sman ma mchis/ 'dres pa las ni lags bshang ba'i/ snying po skyon med nyid rtsa zhig/ khyod kyi kun gzhes thugs la gzhag/ nyes
6006(mdo sde): bshad dug bzhin yongasu spangs/ rin chen snying po mkhyen khyod kyi/ legs bshad srog gis 'jal po na/ skye ba de dang de ga tu/ byang chub slad du dpal tsal bskrun/
6007(mdo sde): de slad grangs med gsum dag tu ni de ltar brtson pa na/ brtson 'grus 'ba' shig grogs gyur pas/ go 'phang bla na med pa brnyes/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
6008(mdo sde): bstod pa/ dang lhas spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las rgyu'i sgo nas/ bstod pa ste/ le'u gnyis pa'o// mtho la phrag dog mi mdzad cing / dman la mnga' can
6009(mdo sde): mdzad la/ mnyam la gran pa ma mchis/ pas khyod ni 'jig rten gtso bor gyur/ khyod ni yon tan rgyun rnams la mngon par dgyes 'bras bu rnams la min/ yang dag
6010(mdo sde): sgrub pa de nyid kyis khyod kyi yon tan pha mthar phyir/ ji ltar khyod kyi zhabs rdul da yang / bsod nams skyes pa mcher 'gyur ba/ de ltar mkhyen pa legs spad pas/
6011(mdo sde): bdag nyid rab tu skrun pa mdzad/ nyes pa nyam smad rtsa nas bton/ yon tan spel nas rnam par byangs/ gzhung lugs bzang po des na khyod/ grub mchog lhag pa
6012(mdo sde): brnyes pa lags/ ji ltar bdag gi rgyud de la/ bag chags lhag ma ma lus pa/ de ltar rnam pa thams cad du/ nyes pa khyod kyis rab tu bcom/ ji lta gzhan pa
6013(mdo sde): de dag dang / 'dra ba tsam yang mi gda' ba/ de ltar khyod kyis/ gsags gsags nas/ bdag nyid la ni yon tan bsgrubs/ 'jig rten pa yi dge dngos kun/
6014(mdo sde): gags bgyid pa dang / sgrib pa can re shig pa dang / nye rtse ba/ shin tu rnyed par sla ba lags/ khyod kyis yon tan bla med/ gags bgyid ma mchis rtogs ma mchis/
6015(mdo sde): brtan pa dang ni rgyun chags pas/ dpe' lta mchis par ga la 'gyur/ gang tshe khyod kyi dgongs pa'i dkyis/ gting dang pha rol/ med brtags na/ rgya mtsho'i zab pa
6016(mdo sde): nyid kyang ni/ gnag rje su lta bur sa le gdang / chos rnam kun gyis mi bskyod pa/ khyod kyi brtan pa mngon bsam na/ sa yid brtan pa nyid kyang ni/
6017(mdo sde): shir sha'i gser rtse/ ltar byung / 'jig rten legs pa gang ci'ang rung / thams cad bsngos na'ang der bas te/ nyon mongs 'jig rten chos rnams kyi/ snang sangs rgyas
6018(mdo sde): chol la/ khyad mi 'khor/ rin chen chos gang brnyes nas khyod/ mchog tu gyur bde nyid dang / khrod du bskrun zhing de yang ni/ khong du dang brnyes bskrun ldom kho nar bas/
6019(mdo sde): thub pa khyod kyi ye shes kyi snang ba mi shes rab rib dang / 'joms pa'i thang na nyid ma yang / me khyer tsam du mi spyod do// khyod kyis gsung thugs mdzad spyod rnams
6020(mdo sde): dag pa'i gan na/ ston zla dang / chu nang na mkha'i dag pa rnams/ dri ma can nyid lta bur gdanga' / gang la ci tsam bstan nas ni/ chu zad rjod par bgyid pa de/ smra ba po/
6021(mdo sde): rang dga' dang / thabs dang / gtsam bu tsam du bas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad las/ spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las dpe med par bstod/
6022(mdo sde): pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// khyod ni bdud las rnam rgyal ste/ 'gro kun dad par mdzad pa yang / bdag gis chos nyid rjes bsams na/ chen po lags par ma mthong ngo //
6023(mdo sde): sdang bas rgol bar rtsom byed pa/ mang po 'ang gzhom par bya ba min/ khyad par gnas la rten pa ni/ bzod pa'i tshigs su mtshar mi che/ gang tshe bdud rnams mngon btu lta ga
6024(mdo sde): de yi nub mo kho na la/ nyon mongs shin tu che spangs pa/ de nyid rmad du byung ba lags/ 'od zer 'phreng ba stong ldan pa'i/ nyi mas mun bsal gang lags dang / dpe'o//
6025(mdo sde): khyod kyi mu stegs las/ rgyal bar mdzad pa ci zhig mtshar/ 'dod chags bral bas chags bcas dang / zhes sdang bral bas zhe sdang can/ gti mug bral bas/
6026(mdo sde): rmongs pa ste/ gsum pos rtag tu gsum btul/ dam chos rab tu bstod pa dang / dam chos ma lags smod mdzad kyang / dam pa dag dang tha ma la/ khyod ni chags
6027(mdo sde): dang khro mi mnga'/ dgra bcom pa dang mu stegs la/ rjesu chags dang khong khro ba/ khyod kyi thugs ni mi 'gyur ni/ khyod la bstod du ci zhig mchis/ yon tan rnams
6028(mdo sde): la'ang ma chags la/ yon tan can la'ang bzhed mi ma'ang kye ma'o khyod kyi thugs stobs ni/ rab dang yongs su dag pa lags dbang po rnam ni rab dang ba/ dus rnaMs
6029(mdo sde): rtag tu mi nyams par/ khyod thugs rtag tu dang ba dag/ mngon sum gyur pa bzhin du gda'/ rang bzhin 'dam po lags gsung dang / mdzad spong bzang pos
6030(mdo sde): bsgrags pas na/ khyod kyi blo gros dgongs pa dag/ rnam dag byis pa'i ral pa grags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa la spobs pa skyes pa
6031(mdo sde): zhes bya ba las rmad du byung bar stong pa zhes bya ba'i le'u bzhi pa'o// nye bar zhi la yid du 'ong / 'bar la gdon pa mdzad mi mnga'/ dul la dngos rjid che ba yi/
6032(mdo sde): sku 'dis su zhig dang mi mdzad/ khyod kyis sku de gang gis ni/ lan brgyad mthong dang gang zhig gis/ dang por mthong ba de gnyi ga/ bar mig
6033(mdo sde): ni mgu bar mdzad/ khyod kyi sku ni mdzes pa dang / blta bas mi ngoms rang bzhin pas mthong ngo cog ni phyir zhing / dga' ba skyed par mdzad pa lags/ rten gyi yon tan
6034(mdo sde): dang dag ni/ rten gyi yon tan phun sum de/ 'tsham pas khyod kyi sku dang ni/ yon tan phun sum mtshogs dang ldan/ mtshan dang dpe byed bzang 'bar ba/ khyod kyi
6035(mdo sde): ska la ma gtogs par/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i/ yon tan 'di gzhan gang zhig la legs gnas 'gyur/ khyod skra rten pa'i yon tan la/ nga dpal che zhes
6036(mdo sde): gsung gsung lta/ de yi yon tan rnams kyang slar/ nged legs bkod ces gsung ba 'dra/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das las stong pa dang las spobs pa
6037(mdo sde): skyes pa zhes bya ba las/ sku la bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u lnga pa'o// 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad ni/ khyod med nyon mongs rnams kyis bcings khyod ni 'gro ba'i
6038(mdo sde): nyon mongs dag/ 'grol slad yun rigs thugs rjes bsdams/ dang por khyod la phyag bgyid 'am/ 'on te gang gis 'khor bar khyod/ skon mkhyen yun ring de
6039(mdo sde): lta bur/ bzhugs mdzad thugs rje che la bgyi/ dben pa'i bde ba dang gyur khyod/ mang po'i nang na bzhugs pa gang / de ni khyod kyi thugs rje yos glags shig thod
6040(mdo sde): nas bgyis bar bas/ rig pa yi ni mtsho nang nas/ klu bzhin khyod kyang thugs rje yis/ dgon pa zhi nas grong mi mthar/ gdul ba'i don gyi slad drangs nyer ba zhi
6041(mdo sde): mchog la gnas bzhin du/ thugs rje gco dang ldan pas ni/ rol mo mkhan gyi rgyu rtsal yang / khyod kyis zhal gis bzhes pa mdzad/ rdzu 'phrul seng ge'i sgra
6042(mdo sde): dang ni/ nyid kyi yon tan brjod pa gang / de ni spyod pa mi mnga' ba/ khyod kyi thugs rjes bstar ba lags/ gzhan gi don du bar bzang gi nyid kyi don la brtse med pa
6043(mdo sde): mgon po khyod nyid 'ba' shig la/ thugs rjes thugs rje mdzad ma gyur/ 'di ltar res 'ga' brten pa yis/ gzhan don grub par mdzad slad khyod ni lan brgyar
6044(mdo sde): phyogs dag du/ gtor ma bzhin du btang ba lags/ de ltar khyod la gdon mdzad kyang / nongs can du mi brtsi bas/ khyod gzheng pa kho na dang / 'thun 'jug pa ni
6045(mdo sde): legs par gdar / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dang las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las/ thugs rje la bstod zhes bya ba ste le'u drug pa'o//
6046(mdo sde): tshig bzang ba dang don che ba/ bde ba dang mi snyan pa dang / zab gsal gnyi ga'i don dang ldan/ bsdus dang spros pa dang ldan pa/ khyod kyi gsung ni de lta bu/ khyod dang
6047(mdo sde): 'grangs thos na yang / thams cad mkhyen la lagaso zhes/ su zhig des/ bskye mi 'gyur mang po'i ril gyis snyen pa lags/ bcom pa 'ga' tsam snyan par das/
6048(mdo sde): khyod kyi gsung ni don grub pas/ thams cad legs gsungs kho na lags/ khyod kyi gsung ni rnams rtag ni/ gang zhig 'jam dang rtsub pa
6049(mdo sde): dang / gang yang de gnyis ldan pa dag/ thams cad ro gcig nyid du 'gyur/ e ma'o// shin du yongs dag pa'i/ phrin las rnams ni rab tu gzo// de yi rin
6050(mdo sde): gsung rnams kyi/ gnod 'di 'dra ba 'di bgyis so// khyod zhal blta na rab sdug pa/ de las mnyan ni snyan pa yi/ gsung 'di dag ni zla ba las/ bdang rtsi 'jag
6051(mdo sde): pa bzhin du 'byung / khyod kyi gsung ni 'dod chags kyi/ rdul rab zhi mdzad char sprin 'dra/ zhes sdang sprul ni 'byung ba la/ nam mkha' lding dang / 'dra ba lags yang dang
6052(mdo sde): yang du mi shes pa'i/ rab rib 'joms pas gdugs dang 'dra/ rang rgyal ri bo mngon 'joms pa/ rdo rje dang / yang 'dra ba lags/ don gzigs pas na mi slu/
6053(mdo sde): nongs mi mnga' phyir rjesu 'thun legs par sbyang bar go sla ste/ khyod kyi gsung ni legs gsum ldan/ re shigs dang por khyod kyi gsung / nyan pa rnams kyi yid
6054(mdo sde): 'brog mdzad/ de nas yid la bsam bgyis na/ 'dod chags gti mug rnams kyang sel/ phongs pa rnams kyi ni dbugs byin cing / bag med rnam kyi skabs
6055(mdo sde): kyang mdzad/ bde ba tsan dag skyo bgyis pas/ khyod gsung kun dang mtsham par 'jug/ mkhas pa rnams kyi dga' ba dang / bar ma rnams kyi blo yang spol/
6056(mdo sde): tha mi'i rab rib rnam 'joms pas/ gsung 'di skye bo kun la sman/ lta ba dag las dga' mdzad cing / mya ngan 'das pa nye bar 'dren/ nyes pa sel mdzad khyod kyi
6057(mdo sde): gsung yon tan rnams kyi char yang 'bebs/ kun mra thogs thugs mda' zhing / dgongs pa 'ang kun tu nyer gnas pas/ de slad khyod kyis lung stan kun/ thams
6058(mdo sde): cad la yang sru mi mnga'/ gang slad dus min yul min dang / snod min rnamasu mi 'jug pa/ de slad khyod gsung don mchis te/ brtson 'grus legs par brtsam
6059(mdo sde): pa bzhin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dang pa las spobs pa smos pa zhes bya ba las gsung la bstod pa ste le'u bdun pa'o// bgrong ba gcig dang thab
6060(mdo sde): bde dang / legs par 'brel dang nyes pa med thog ma bar dang mthar dge bas/ khyod kyi bstan 'dra gzhin la med/ khyod kyi gzhung lug de lta bur/ cig tu phangs la
6061(mdo sde): lha chags pa'i/ byis pa lags te smod bgyi na/ lha dang 'dra ba'i dgra ma mchis/ 'gro ba yi ni don slad du/ sdug bsngal mang gtar gang lags pa/ de bas khyod bstan
6062(mdo sde): ngan na yang / gnas par bgyi ba la thugs na/ phan pa gsung zhing phan mdzad pa/ khyod kyi bstan pa ce smos te/ mgo la zhugs ni 'bar bas kyang / ci slad du bsgrub
6063(mdo sde): mi bgyi khyod kyi bstan pas rang dbang dang / byang chub bde dang zhi ba dang / khyod kyi yon tan bsngags pa dang / legs pa bzhi po 'di kun kun 'thob dpa' bo kyi bstan
6064(mdo sde): pa 'di/ mu stegs thams cad sgrags mdzad la/ bdud ni sems kongs chung mdzad cing lha dang mi rnams dbugs kyang 'byin/ 'chi bdag
6065(mdo sde): stan pa khams gsum gyi/ sa chen dag ltar gyur cig/ g.yang sa'i mun gnas rnams la/ ra ba lta bur gyur pa'ang khyod/ 'jig rten gnyi gar dman gdags dang /
6066(mdo sde): 'jig rten las ni bzla slad du/ mun par gyur pa'i 'jig rten la/ khyod kyis shes rab snang ba mdzad/ yul la nye bar spyod pa na/ lha mi sbrid pa thadad kyi/ chos kyi
6067(mdo sde): longs spyod thun mong bas/ khyod la dbye ba mi mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis skyes pa dang / na chod rigs dang yul dang ni/ dus kyi skyon med chos rnams kyi/
6068(mdo sde): 'di dag kun la sman yon btags/ khyod kyi nyan thos sred bla ba kyi/ ya mtshan 'dzin pa med pa rnams la'ang / lha rnams thal sbyar smon bgyid cing / ya mtshan
6069(mdo sde): che ba lta bur mchod/ e ma'o sangs rgyas 'khor ba yi/ nyid kur gyur pa byung ba bgyid/ de na mi rnams lha rnams kyis/ smod par bya nyid du gyur/ sangs rgyas
6070(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dang pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las lam la bstod pa ste le'u bcu pa'o// mnyel dang zhib de nyams 'gyur dang / skye bo ngan
6071(mdo sde): dang 'grogs pa dang / mi 'thun pa dang mang po yi/ skyon yang yon tan bzhin dgongs shing / 'gro ba'i don slad ma chags pa'i/ thugs kyis brtson pa mdzad pa dang /
6072(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi/ chos nyid bcom ldan de rmad do// mgon khyod gtso bor gyur lags kyang / bdul ba rnams la byams slad du/ bshes
6073(mdo sde): kyang phal pa gsol mdzad cing / ser 'ga' smyung ba dag kyang mdzad/ nyam nga'i shul du'ang gshegs mdzad cing / rang rong can du'ang mnal ba mdzad/ sku ngas bsngo
6074(mdo sde): dang 'cham tshul dang / skad cha lugs sgyur ba 'ang mdzad/ kun gyis dga' dgur rang don phyir/ bran bzhin bsgo bar dgrangs pa las/ mgon khyod rtag tu bdog nyid pa/
6075(mdo sde): mnga' mchis pa yang ma lags so// khyod la gang dang gang du yang / ji skad bskal yang mi bsngo ste/ nyid kyi bsgrub pa bzang po las/ 'da' bar gyur pa ma mchis so//
6076(mdo sde): ji ltar khyod ni gdon bgyid la/ phan be lhur mdzad de lta bur/ skye bo dag ni phan bgyid la 'ang / phan pa de ltar du mi bgyid/ khyod ni gnod bgyid po la/ phan pa mdzad pa
6077(mdo sde): bshes lags te/ rtag tu skyon dag tshol ba la yon tan 'ba' zhig tshol 'ba'ang lags/ khyod ni gang nas dag bcas shing / zhugs dang bcas pa spyan drangs pa/ der
6078(mdo sde): ni brtser bcas gshegs pa dang / khyod la bdud rtsi chen du gyur/ bzod pas mi snyan brjod pa dang / 'khu ba dag ni bde legs kyis/ mi snyan smra la bden pa ste//
6079(mdo sde): khyod kyis sdang ba byams pas/ btul thogs ming du goms pa yi/ mi yi rang bzhin mang po yang / khyod kyis ngan song rnam bzlogs nas/ skad cig nyid la yongs
6080(mdo sde): su bskur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dang pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las/ bka' ba mdzad pa la bstod pa ste
6081(mdo sde): le'u bcu gcig pa'o// rtsub po dang 'dzam bgyis pa dang / 'jugs pa rnams ni gtong pod dang / gtumo po nges par bgyis pa gang / de ni khyod kyi thabs mkhas
6082(mdo sde): lags/ dga' bo'i dbang po nyer zhi dang / nga rgyal khengs pa 'dud pa dang / sor mo'i 'phreng ba 'ang zhi bgyis na/ su zhig ngo mtshar skyed mi bgyid/ khyod kyi chos
6083(mdo sde): kyi rol tshims pa/ gser las bgyid pa'i mal spangs nas/ ran mang bting ba'i gnas/ mal du brtan rnam bsod nyams par bgyid/ khyod kyi dus dang bsam
6084(mdo sde): mkhyen pas/ res 'ga' zhus na'ang mi gsung la/ spro gyur gzhan la bstan pa dang / drag du gshegs nas bshad pa 'ang mdzad dri med gos la tshon bzhin du/ thog mar
6085(mdo sde): sbyin stsogs gtam dag gis/ sems la spro ba bskyed nas ni/ phyi nas chos ni bstan pa mdzad/ 'khor ba ma zad gting nas ni/ 'gro ba nyon mongs drang slad du/ khyod
6086(mdo sde): kyi gang gis ma bstsal ba'i/ thabs dang spyod pa de ma mchis/ sku'i cha lugs rnam mang dang / gsung gis so'i skad bzhin du/ bdul ba'i bsam pa tha dang dag
6087(mdo sde): de dang der ni khyod kyis mdzad/ de dag kun kyang dag pa dang / mi 'gal ba dang / mchod 'os dang / brjid dang lha mi rnams la ni/ sman 'dogs bkur ba sha stag
6088(mdo sde): lags/ smra dang bgyid pa phal cher ni/ legs par rje thogs ma 'gal gyi/ bden par gsung ba khyod la ni/ de gnyis gzhan du gda' ba lags/ bdag nyid dga' ba
6089(mdo sde): 'ba' zhig gis/ khyod kyi 'gro ba'i dpal zhing mdzad/ 'di ltar rnam pa 'di 'dril zhing / 'jig rten gzhan la mchis ma lags/ thog med srid pa nyam nga bar//
6090(mdo sde): snga nas gcig tu nyams pa yi/ sems can rnams la sman slad du/ khyod ni de ltar brtson pa lags/ gang gis khyod drin lan lon pa'i/ sgrub de mchis snyam
6091(mdo sde): mi bgyid de/ skye bo gang dag mya ngan 'das/ de dag gis kyang lan ma lon/ khyod kyi chos la gnas de dag/ rang don kho na bgyid par bas/ de yi slad du 'o rgyal
6092(mdo sde): gang / de la lan go cig zhig lon/ khyod ni sems can gnyid log pa'i/ rgyud la gzigs pa'i zhugs rtse ba/ bag med gyur pa rnams kyi ni/ grogs bzang bag
6093(mdo sde): dang bcas pa lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dang pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bye ba las mkhas par bstod pa ste le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// /
6094(mdo sde): khyod kyi nyon mongs gzhon pa bshad/ bdud kyi g.yo dag bstan pa mdzad/ 'khor ba'i rang bzhin mi bzang brjod/ 'jigs pa med pa'i phyogs kyang bstan/
6095(mdo sde): ban dgong thugs rje can gyis ni sems can rnams la bgyis 'tshal ba/ gang zhig khyod kyis ma mdzad pa/ gzhan go ci zhig mchis lags kyi gal te chos ni 'di dag
6096(mdo sde): dag kyang spo ba zhig btub na ni/ gdon ma 'tshal bar khyod kyis ni/ las byin la sogs kun la stsal/ de slad 'gro la brda' sprod pa/ 'gro ba'i
6097(mdo sde): mgon po khyod la ni/ 'di na phan tshun byed pa po// med pa skad du nges par gsungs 'jig rten rnams la thugs rtse bas/ yun rings steng dam chos bshad/ 'phri//
6098(mdo sde): rten gsum phan 'dogs nus pa'i/ slob ma dam 'ang mang du bsgran/ mngon du bdul ba'i tshogs kyang ni/ mdzes bzang yan chad btul lags pas/ de go khyod
6099(mdo sde): la sems can gi bu lon lhag ma ci mchis na/ 'jug tu'ang khyod kyis shin tu ni bka' bcad yal bar ma bor te/ 'di ltar rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis sku gdung til 'bru
6100(mdo sde): bzhin du blags/ gzugs kyi sku dang chos 'di dag/ gzhan don kho nar zad do zhes/ 'jig rten yid ches dka' 'di la/ khyod kyis mya ngan 'das pa bstan de skad
6101(mdo sde): chos sku ma lus pa/ sras kyi mchog la gtang mdzad de/ gzugs skra tis 'bru ltar bshig nas/ khyod ni yongs su mya ngan 'das/ e ma'o gnas pa e ma'o tshul
6102(mdo sde): e ma'o yon tan e ma'o sku/ sangs rgyas kyi ni chos rnams la/ ya mtshan mi tshe 'ga' ma mchis/ phan 'dogs mdzad cing blta na sdug/ sku gsung phrin las zhing
6103(mdo sde): gyur pa/ khyod la'ang sdang bar bgyid pa yi/ rmongs pa mi mdzad pa la gzugs bsod nams rgya mtsho rin chen gter/ yon tan 'byung gnas chos kyi tshogs kyi tshogs
6104(mdo sde): khyod la sems can gang 'dud pa/ de dag la yang phyag 'tshal legs mgon khyod yon tan mi bas kyang bdag gi zho sha bas 'tshal bas/ des na 'dzem pa bgyid slad
6105(mdo sde): du glo ba la ni gcags bzhin mchis/ khyod kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid/ tshad ma mchis la bsam mi khyab/ bstan mi grangs kyang ma mchis la/ khyod bdag nyid kyis mkhyen
6106(mdo sde): lags grang / mtsho chen bab ni bas par ma gyur kyang / skye bo'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bgyid ltar/ khyod kyi yon tan 'chan tsam ma sgrogs kyang dag ni mchog tu blo ba dag
6107(mdo sde): zhing mchis bdag gi thub la dang pas spobs skyes pa'i dge ba'i las 'di 'bras bu 'khrungs pa yi ngan rtog rlung mar 'tshub pa dkrugs pa yi// 'gro sems ni rnal da
6108(mdo sde): gnas par shog sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa mdzad pa dang pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las bu lon med par bstod pa'i le'u bcu gsum pa'o//
6109(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la stong pa dang las spobs pa skyes zhes bya ba slob dpon ma gol gis mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de ba dang / lo tsA ba
6110(mdo sde): ban de rin chen mchog gyis 'gyur cing zhus chen gi lo ts+tsha ba ban de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa// @#rgya gar skad du/ be she Sha sta da/
6111(mdo sde): bod skad du/ khyad par du 'phags par bstod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni ston pa gzhan spangs nas bcom ldan khyod la
6112(mdo sde): skyabs mchis pa de ci slad du zhen khyod/ skyon mi mang la yon tan ldan gang phyir 'jig rten skyon la dga'/ yon tan 'dzin la zhan pas na
6113(mdo sde): skyon yang yon tan ltar brtsis nas gzhan la skyabs su mchis par gyur khyab 'jug dbang phyug la sogs pa de la skye bo dga' dad pa'i de yi tan gang sgrags pa khyod kyi
6114(mdo sde): bstan la de dag ston lha chen khros pa'i mang gcig gis grong khyer sum rtseg pa sregs shes gda' khyod kyi ye shes mda' chen gyis khro ba'i me nyid nges par bsregs lha chen
6115(mdo sde): gyi ni 'dod pa dag baspogs nyes pas na phyir yang drangs khyod kyi shes zhugs kyi ni/ 'dod pa rtsar bcas bsregs gton lha chen thig le mchog ma la/ chags pa skyes
6116(mdo sde): pas gdong bzhi byung bdud kyi bu mo bsregs pa yis khyod kyi ba spu'i rtse mo g.yos// lha chen phyed ni chung ma bas// rung pa yis kyang thug ma lags// khyod ni bde bar bgyid
6117(mdo sde): pa yi// 'dod pa nyid kyis rmongs ma gyur// 'khor lo mdung thung can dag gis// bdud stobs de las rgyal mi nus// khyod ni 'khor lo mdung med par// byams pa'i mtshon
6118(mdo sde): gang lags pas rgyal rgan pos khyab 'jug mda' yis bsnun/ lha chen mgrin pa sngon gyur pas// lha 'di gnyis la gnod bgyid mchis mgon khyod gnod bgyid bral ba
6119(mdo sde): lags/ khyab 'jug mi'u zung gzugs bsgyur nas/ g.yo thabs kyis na stobs ldan bslus khyod ni g.yo yang ngo zin la gzhan dag yang slu mi mdzad pa mgon khyod rdzu 'phrul
6120(mdo sde): tsam rlang gyi// rmad byung gang gis mthong ba des// khyab 'jug 'jig rten gsum rgal ba// 'bye 'o mchi ba bzhin du mthong gzhon nu tshangs par spyod pa na/ drug ldan ma dang lhan
6121(mdo sde): cig spyod khyod kyi 'khrug pa'i sbyar ba bdun/ thal ba bzhin du bgyis par gyur// tshangs stsol 'jig rten byin pa po// bdag cag yin par smra zhes grag/ de nyid gzig
6122(mdo sde): khyod 'jig rten dang // de yang las skyes shes bstan brgya byin gyis ni gshol med ma mthon na 'dod pas rmongs shes grag dpa' khyod 'dod pa nyid kyis na/ ma rmongs
6123(mdo sde): slad du btsun mo btang // sgra can log pas zla ba dang // dbang med par ni min pa lags mda' ba skyes khyod la sems can gang dbang med bgyid pa de ma mchis//
6124(mdo sde): mi dbang dga' byed gos sreg stsogs/ nags tshal nas ni phyir yang mchis/ bder gshegs khyod ni dben pa yi/ 'dud rtsis ngoms pas phyir mi byon mchod
6125(mdo sde): sbyin la ni phyugs mgum par dra snga srong rnams ni smra zhes grag/ sdig med khyod kyi grong ma la 'ang / gnod pa bgyid par rjes ma gnang gzhan nag rang don mchod sprin la/
6126(mdo sde): gzhan srog mar gyi sprin sreg bgyid bzhan gyi don du khyod cig pu rang gi sprin sregs mdzad drang dmod pa grub pa las dka' thub grub par rje su dpag mgon khyod thugs
6127(mdo sde): rtse grub pa las/ dka' thub grub par rjesu dpag lho chen 'dod pa can gyi mchan drang srong rnams kyi dmong bas lhung / khyod kyis zung khrol bdag gi rtsa ba 'dod bzhin
6128(mdo sde): lhung bgyis drang song dmod med mi bzang bas/ dka' skyes po 'byel pa bsregs par 'gyur khyod kyi ye shes me yis ni skye bo rnams kyi
6129(mdo sde): skye rgyu bsreg rgyas pa dran pa'i mthu chungs pas/ mang po bgyis pa'i tshig rag na/ lho 'og 'gal bar gyur ces thob thub pa khyod kyi kun kyang min gling las skyes stsogs
6130(mdo sde): phal char ni/ gzhan gyi gang smras smra bar bgyid khyod kyis thun mong ma yin chos rang gis thugasu chud nas bstan mu stegs can gyi rig byed tshig dbyen pa kho nar smra
6131(mdo sde): bar gyid khyod kyis bgrags nas seng ge'i sgra yis dag bstan pa 'dzad drangs can ba ra da dza ni/ de nyid mthong yang dpyid ldan la yongasu chags kyi gtso khyod kyi slob ma'ang /
6132(mdo sde): bud med nyid ma chags 'ug pa bas ni sar pa las khyad par can la sprin zhes bstan mgon po khyod ni thugs rje yis/ khyi la'ang sbyin par bya zhes gsungs lus kyi bka'
6133(mdo sde): thub bgyis pa yis/ 'dud pa 'jig par gcer bu 'tshal khyod ni thugs kyi dka' thub kyis mdud pa 'jig par bzhed pa lagaso// rtog pa dag dngos po rnams ltos pa
6134(mdo sde): med par 'grub par 'tshal tshig dbang khyod kyis cung zad kyang / mi ltos med sna legs par gsungs ne chos nyid ma brtol nas ni thar bar mchis par bshad ces gra/
6135(mdo sde): khyod ni khyod mya ngan 'das bsnyes la gang du yang ni gshegs ma mchis thar pa gzhan gyur pa dang ni/ ne tse'ang lam gzhan mongs par gyur khyod nyid lam gang nas gshegs
6136(mdo sde): ba/ de nyid nas ni slob ma'ang mchis/ khyab 'jug gis ni bud med dag stong phrag bcu drug yongs gzung gyur ston sa 'jig rten 'das khyod la bdag gis med cing yongs 'dzin
6137(mdo sde): ba med ka shing mdzes dga' mo la ni rgyas pa yongs chags rnams par bsgyur khyod khab bzhugs na'ang phung khrol ba'i don gyis dbang po rmongs ma gyur rgyas pa 'dod gdung
6138(mdo sde): g.yen spong ba bud med kyis ni rdog pas bsnan khyod ni khyim pas gyur pa na'ang phyir zhing 'khrugs par gyur pa med dga' byed chung ma'i don gyi phyir rgya mtsho'i pha rol song
6139(mdo sde): zhes grag khyod kyis bud med stong phrag ni brgyad bcu spangs nas ga su gshegs rna can thab dka' la sogs la/ khyab 'jug gis ni gnod pa bsams sems can rnams
6140(mdo sde): la phan bzhed pa/ khyod kyis srog btang ba mdzad khyab 'jug gis ni sgyur byas nas/ go ma gsum gyis 'phrogs gang yin pa'i sa de nges par thar bzhed pa/
6141(mdo sde): khyod kyis rtsa bzhin btang bar gyur/ dag byed srog bcod byed pa'i mdaso/ 'jig rten rgyal rigs med byas pas/ grags pa thob pa gang yin de khyod kyis bsten la
6142(mdo sde): grags pa min/ sgra ngan dang ni skya bseng dag gang gis phyir ni g.yul bkye ba'i/ dpal de khyod kyis 'khri shing ni/ gdug pa bzhin du spangs nas gshegs khyod
6143(mdo sde): bstan pasnyed pa na/ zang shing nags na lhag chen po// rnal 'byor dbang phyug spyod par bas/ dbang po gshol med po zhes/ bram zeng dung bar du sgrags
6144(mdo sde): khyod kyis 'bras bu mchog brnyes pa'i/ grag brgya byin sgrogs par 'gyur khyab 'jug ni nag bkrabo// byed 'thobs gyur
6145(mdo sde): nas kun dag gtong khri'i 'og tu zhugs par gyur/ gtso khyod kun tu brnyengs mi mnga' skye dgu bdag por rang nyid kyi bu mo dag ni 'khrig zhes thos/ thub pa khyod kyi
6146(mdo sde): slob ma yang / tshangs par spyod la skyon ma mchis/ bram ze rnams ni dge sdig dag/ sbyin pa len bzhin 'phro bar smra khyod kyis byas chud mi za dang / ma byas pa
6147(mdo sde): dang pad med gsungs/ ser skyob bdag gi mtshan nyid ni/ shes dang ldan pa yongs su rtag so/ khyod kyis de yin na bdag/ mi rtag nyid dang ldan zhes bstan
6148(mdo sde): gzigs zan gis ni shes las bdag/ gzhan dang khyad par yongs su brjod khyod kyis de ni shes med na shing 'bral bar thal 'gyur bar gsungs gcer bu lus
6149(mdo sde): kyi tshad bzhin du srogs ni zhum dang rgyas par smra/ khyod kyis de ni phyogs gcig phyir/ rnam par 'jig par 'gyur zhes gsungs bram ze 'gro ba rnams kyi
6150(mdo sde): rgyu/ skyes bu brtag pa yin zhes brtags khyod kyi rtag pa zhes bya ba'i/ rgyun ni ci yang med ces gsung bdag nyid chen po dgu can pa'i/ sras po
6151(mdo sde): stong phrag drug bcu dag ser skyas ltas pa tsam gyis bsregs de'ang khyod ni thugs rje mdzad/ ser skye la sogs thar pa yi/ bdag ni srid pa'i rgyu zhes
6152(mdo sde): mchi/ khyod ni zhi bar gshegs gyur nas zhugs gum lta bur bgrang du med mu stegs byed pa kha cig ni thor ba 'gro dang ldan zhes smra/ gang la 'gro yod
6153(mdo sde): de 'khor bar/ khyod kyi thugs su chud nas bstan bcer bu kun dga' ra ba sogs/ brtsigs pa sdig pa'i rgyu zhes zer/ thams cad mkhyen
6154(mdo sde): pa khyod kyis ni/ 'di nyid bsod nam rgyu zhes gsungs/ lus las lus gzhan dag tu ni rtag pa'i srog ni 'pho zhes grag khyod kyis lus la gzhan gyur
6155(mdo sde): pa'i/ srog yod pa ni min zhes gsungs khros pas yul dor gsad na ni/ bde 'gror 'gyur ba rgyas pa zer/ mgon po khyod kyis gnas skabs de'i/
6156(mdo sde): sems ni ngan 'gro yin zhes gsungs/ skya bsang bu ni brjod byas na/ bsod nam 'gyur zhes so so smra/ gang zhig bgrod min 'gro byed pa/ de dag
6157(mdo sde): khyod ni bstan la spang / skem byed dbang po nyes dbang po nye dbang po// drag po la sogs 'jigs pa dang / bsdigs phyir mtshon ma rtag tu thogs khyod ni
6158(mdo sde): brnyengs bral sdigs mi mdzad/ khyod ni sus kyang mi brnyengs la/ su la'ang sdigs par mi mdzad pas/ khyod nyid gcig pu mtshon ma snga mas/ des
6159(mdo sde): ni 'gro ba rnams las dpags smra bo nyon mongs bcas pa'i tshig rig byed la sogs tshig dag ni/ phal cher lta 'og 'gal ba
6160(mdo sde): lags khyod kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung / gzhan gyi bcos gzhan dag ni phal phyer snga phyi 'gal ba lags khyo nyid kyi ni gzhung lugs dag/ thog ma par
6161(mdo sde): thar skyon ma mchis chos 'don pa dag dmangs rigs la blo gros smin par bya min zer khyod ni gdol pa rnam la yang / thugs rjes dam chos ston par mdzad ljon shing
6162(mdo sde): bzang po rnam spangs nas ngan pa la ni su zhig rten/ 'dod chags bral ba rnyes khyod bzhugs na mkhas pa su zhig ston gzhan 'dad ser skya yul rnams la spod
6163(mdo sde): bzhin ye shes 'gyur 'chi sdig bral ba khyod kyis kun nas nyon mongs la thar pag yod ces gsungs bsod nams byas pa'i tshig dag ni sems can rnams la
6164(mdo sde): yongs bsdu bar bcom ldan khyod kyis gang gsung bas/ de gzhin bstan bcod la ma bshad lha rten dang ni mchod sprin la sems can bsod par byed pa dang
6165(mdo sde): 'jig rten pa ni chos 'tshal khyod kyi bstan pa de smad lags/ gang zhig srigs chags la rtag gnod de la chos nyid ga la yod/ gtso bo khyod kyi rang
6166(mdo sde): nyid kyi srogs gis sem can lags par bsrungs/ shAkya rgyal rigs 'khrungs khyod kyi gang zhig bden bder mi slu dang / tshangs par spyod dang dul ba dang /
6167(mdo sde): rtser ldan dam chos lags par dgongs rig byed mtha' la byam pas dang yul ngor dgra mngon 'ongs gsod ces/ 'jig rten smra yi khyod kyis ni dgra la'ang
6168(mdo sde): snying rje byas zhes gsungs/ gzhon nu rang gi zhing po la// mdung gis ma snun ces bka' mchid gda' dpa' bo khyod kyi nyon mongs pa'i/ dra ba
6169(mdo sde): shes rab mtshon gyis dral/ khyab 'jug gis ni rang nyid kyi/ sbas kyang yongs su bskyab ma nus/ gtso bo khyod ni sems can kun sgrub pa'i slad du
6170(mdo sde): brtson pa lags rgan pos 'jig pas 'khrigs nas su/ khyab 'jug gis ni bcom lhag btang thub pa khyod la brnyengs 'gyid pa'i sems can de ni dga' ma
6171(mdo sde): mchis khyab 'jug gi ni gnyen 'dun dag/ le len gis ni btugs par gyur khyod kyis gnyen 'dun thams cad ni 'khror pa las ni rnam par dkrol
6172(mdo sde): ser skye de nyid rigs pas ni/ gtso las 'gro la skye bar ba'i/ bshad/ khyod kyi 'gro ba skye ba ni/ nyon mongs las las byung bar bsgrags/
6173(mdo sde): mu stegs gzhan gyis gzhung lugs la/ ji lta ji ltar rnams bsams pa/ de lta de ltar mgon khyod la/ bdag ni sems ni dang bar gyur/
6174(mdo sde): de ltar thams cad mkhyen min pa'i grub mtha'i skyon gyis glags sems ldan bsam klag rnams kyi skyon med pa'i/ ston pa khyod kyings mi mthong ngo //
6175(mdo sde): 'jig rten lha dang bram ze dang rig byed shAkya 'di dag ces/ sdang bas smra ba rang skon
6176(mdo sde): nyid/ ci'i phyir sems par mi byed kyen gang slad khyod kyi ston pa ni/ bde bas de nyid thob bgyid do/
6177(mdo sde): de slad smra ba'i stags khyod kyi gzhung lugs la ni 'gro 'di dga' khyod kyi yon tan yang dag pa rnam pa 'di
6178(mdo sde): ltar rab brjod pas/ bdag gi bsod nams gang thobs des 'gro ba'i 'jig rten khyod 'dar shig/ mgon po khyad
6179(mdo sde): par 'phags stong pa/ ston pas bdag gis dge bsags pa gang yin des ni 'gro ba kun/ byang chub la ni gzhol
6180(mdo sde): gyur cig khyad bar du 'phags par stong pa slob dpon mtho ba gtsun khyad par rjes mdzad pa rdzogas+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan
6181(mdo sde): sarbad de ba dang / lo tsA ba ban de'i rin chen mchog gi sbyar cing zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de dpal rtsegs kyis brtan la 'phab
6182(mdo sde): rdzogs spyod/
